original: gzhan du mthong ba gzhan du ni //
analyzed: gzhan du mthong ba gzhan du ni //
translated: What is seen as one thing by one person is seen as another by another.üîΩ

original: ji lta bur na khas len byed //
analyzed: ji lta bur na khas len byed //
translated: How can one accept that what is seen in one way is something else?

original: dbang po rnam par 'gyur ba rab rib la sogs pa'i rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su byed pa nyid du dmigs pa ni de las gzhan pa'i rgyus skye ba skyed pa can dang myong ba'i rang bzhin dang rjes su 'brel pa ma yin no zhesüîΩbya bar rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: dbang po rnam par 'gyur ba rab rib la sogs pa'i rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa'i rjes su byed pa nyid du dmigs pa ni de las gzhan pa'i rgyus skye ba skyed pa can dang myong ba'i rang bzhin dang rjes su 'brel pa ma yin no zhes bya bar rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not reasonable to say that the transformation of the sense faculty, which is observed to occur in accordance with the presence or absence of cataracts, etc., is not related to the production of an effect that is of the nature of experience and that has a cause other than that.

original: rab rib la sogs pa'i rnam par 'gyur ba dag gi rjes su byed pa nyid bsgrub par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: rab rib la sogs pa'i rnam par 'gyur ba dag gi rjes su byed pa nyid bsgrub par bya ba yin no //
translated: The transformation of the sense faculty, which is observed to occur in accordance with the presence or absence of cataracts, etc., is the probandum.

original: de lta na yang phyi rol nyid du khas len na ni tshig tsam du zad do //
analyzed: de lta na yang phyi rol nyid du khas len na ni tshig tsam du zad do //
translated: Even if that were so, if one accepts external objects, it is just empty words.

original: 'di ltar / snang dbang yid la byed pa las //
analyzed: 'di ltar / snang dbang yid la byed pa las //
translated: Thus:

original: gzhan ni gcig gis nus rtogs pa //
analyzed: gzhan ni gcig gis nus rtogs pa //
translated: The cognition of the capacity of one thing from anotherüîΩis due to the appearance, the sense faculty, and mental activity.

original: des na gzhan ni rgyu ma yin //
analyzed: des na gzhan ni rgyu ma yin //
translated: Therefore, the other is not the cause.

original: snang ba la sogs pa las gzhan ni mar me nyid kyi nus pa dmigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi ni ma yin no //
analyzed: snang ba la sogs pa las gzhan ni mar me nyid kyi nus pa dmigs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi ni ma yin no //
translated: The capacity of the lamp itself is observed, not the capacity of the circle.

original: des na rgyu gzhan med pa'i phyir yul ma yin te /
analyzed: des na rgyu gzhan med pa'i phyir yul ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, because there is no other cause, it is not the object.

original: rgyu ma yin pa ni yul ma yin no zhes bstan zin to //
analyzed: rgyu ma yin pa ni yul ma yin no zhes bstan zin to //
translated: It has been shown that what is not a cause is not an object.

original: snang ba'i phyir yul yin no zhes bya ba mi 'thad de snang ba ni 'khrul pa la yang yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: snang ba'i phyir yul yin no zhes bya ba mi 'thad de snang ba ni 'khrul pa la yang yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not tenable to say that it is the object because it appears, because appearance exists even in error.

original: rang gi ngo bos ji ltar 'khrul pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: rang gi ngo bos ji ltar 'khrul pa yin zhe na /
translated: How can it be erroneous by its very nature?

original: rang gi ngo bos snang ba ni rang rig pa yin gyi yul ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bos snang ba ni rang rig pa yin gyi yul ni ma yin no //
translated: The appearance by its very nature is self-awareness, not the object.

original: gzhan du snang bas na rang bzhin ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gzhan du snang bas na rang bzhin ma yin no zhe na /
translated: If it appears as other, it is not the nature.

original: rang gi ngo bos snang ba ji ltar gzhan du snang ba zhes bya bar rung /
analyzed: rang gi ngo bos snang ba ji ltar gzhan du snang ba zhes bya bar rung /
translated: How can it be tenable to say that the appearance by its very nature appears as other?

original: gang du snang ba de yang gzhan du snang ba de yin na /
analyzed: gang du snang ba de yang gzhan du snang ba de yin na /
translated: And if that which appears appears as other,

original: thug pa med pa snang ba yin na ni //
analyzed: thug pa med pa snang ba yin na ni //
translated: then there would be an infinite regress.

original: de bzhin du gzhan yang rang gi ngo bo nyid snang ba yin pa'i phyir na rang rig pa nyid do //
analyzed: de bzhin du gzhan yang rang gi ngo bo nyid snang ba yin pa'i phyir na rang rig pa nyid do //
translated: And in the same way, because it appears as its own nature, it is self-awareness.

original: gal te phan tshun du snang ba yin na sngon po la sogs pa yang phan tshun du snang ba yin pa'i phyir myong ba nyid du 'gyur te sngon po la sogs pa myong ba la gnas par gyur pa rnams kyang myong ba'i ngo bo kho na yin pa'i
analyzed: gal te phan tshun du snang ba yin na sngon po la sogs pa yang phan tshun du snang ba yin pa'i phyir myong ba nyid du 'gyur te sngon po la sogs pa myong ba la gnas par gyur pa rnams kyang myong ba'i ngo bo kho na yin pa'i
translated: If it is the appearance of each other, then blue, etc. would also be the appearance of each other and therefore would be experience, because those who are engaged in the experience of blue, etc. are the nature of experience.

original: phyir ro // rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag @83b las nus pa nges pa'i rang bzhin gyi rgyu yul yin no //
analyzed: phyir ro // rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag @83b las nus pa nges pa'i rang bzhin gyi rgyu yul yin no //
translated: The cause is the object of the ascertainment of potentiality from positive and negative concomitance.

original: rma bya'i mdongs ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag las nus pa nges pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rma bya'i mdongs ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag las nus pa nges pa ma yin te /
translated: The eye of a peacock is not the object of the ascertainment of potentiality from positive and negative concomitance.

original: des na 'di ni yul ma yin no //
analyzed: des na 'di ni yul ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is not the cause.

original: myong ba las gnas pa'i rang bzhin las gzhan pa'i rnam pa 'jog pa med pa'i phyir ro //üîΩka ba la sogs pa sad pas /
analyzed: myong ba las gnas pa'i rang bzhin las gzhan pa'i rnam pa 'jog pa med pa'i phyir ro // ka ba la sogs pa sad pas /
translated: Because there is no other aspect of the object than the nature of the experience.

original: dmigs pa dag ni shes pa gzhan gyis mthong bzhin phyir tha dad par rnam par gzhag pa yin no //
analyzed: dmigs pa dag ni shes pa gzhan gyis mthong bzhin phyir tha dad par rnam par gzhag pa yin no //
translated: The pot, etc. are established as different by another cognition, because they are perceived by another cognition.

original: de'i 'bras bu sa gzhi tshig pa yang mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i 'bras bu sa gzhi tshig pa yang mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: And because the result of that, the burnt ground, is also seen.

original: 'dir yang rab rib kyis bslad pa rnams kyis mtshungs par mthong ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: 'dir yang rab rib kyis bslad pa rnams kyis mtshungs par mthong ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Here, too, it is because those affected by eye disease see the same thing.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, it is not so,

original: de dag la yang mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag la yang mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are the same.

original: 'khrul pas dmigs pa'i me la ni sa gzhi tshig pa'i 'bras bu ma dmigs so //
analyzed: 'khrul pas dmigs pa'i me la ni sa gzhi tshig pa'i 'bras bu ma dmigs so //
translated: In the case of a fire that is perceived through delusion, the result of burning the ground is not perceived.

original: des na gnyi ga yang 'khrul pa yin no //
analyzed: des na gnyi ga yang 'khrul pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, both are delusion.

original: 'on te me de ni sreg par byed pa ma yin pa nyid do zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te me de ni sreg par byed pa ma yin pa nyid do zhe na /
translated: But if that fire is not a burner?

original: ma yin te de ltar rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma yin te de ltar rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: No, because there is no such understanding.

original: de lta bu ma yin pa la de lta bur rtogs pa ni 'khrul pa nyid do //
analyzed: de lta bu ma yin pa la de lta bur rtogs pa ni 'khrul pa nyid do //
translated: The understanding of something that is not like that as being like that is delusion itself.

original: 'jig rten gyi tha snyad la ltos nas 'khrul pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi tha snyad la ltos nas 'khrul pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is delusion in dependence on worldly convention,

original: don nyid kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad la ltos pa kho na'o //
analyzed: don nyid kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad la ltos pa kho na'o //
translated: then the object itself is only in dependence on worldly convention.

original: rang gi ngo bor snang ba'i phyir thams cad de lta bu nyid yin pas tha dad par rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bor snang ba'i phyir thams cad de lta bu nyid yin pas tha dad par rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: Because it appears as its own nature, everything is just like that. It is not reasonable to distinguish it.

original: des na don bya ba med pa can don yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no zhe na rigs so //
analyzed: des na don bya ba med pa can don yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no zhe na rigs so //
translated: Therefore, it is reasonable to say that the object is that which is to be acted upon, and not anything else.

original: thams cad don nyid ci ste ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: thams cad don nyid ci ste ma yin zhe na /
translated: Why is it not reasonable to say that everything is an object?

original: thams cad myong ba'o zhes ci ste mi 'dod /
analyzed: thams cad myong ba'o zhes ci ste mi 'dod /
translated: Why not accept that everything is experience?

original: myong ba'i ngo bo yin na yang /
analyzed: myong ba'i ngo bo yin na yang /
translated: Even if it is the nature of experience,

original: thams cad rang rig pa nyid yin pas ji ltar don nyid yin /
analyzed: thams cad rang rig pa nyid yin pas ji ltar don nyid yin /
translated: how can it be an object, since everything is self-awareness?üîΩExperience is hidden.

original: myong ba ni lkog tu gyur pa nyid yin no zhe na ma yin te tshad ma med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: myong ba ni lkog tu gyur pa nyid yin no zhe na ma yin te tshad ma med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: No, because there is no valid cognition.

original: rang rig pa ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: rang rig pa ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How is it self-awareness?

original: mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is seen.

original: gzhan gyis kyang myong ba mthong ngo zhe na /
analyzed: gzhan gyis kyang myong ba mthong ngo zhe na /
translated: But experience is seen by another.

original: 'di la tshad ma ci yod /
analyzed: 'di la tshad ma ci yod /
translated: What is the valid cognition here?

original: khyed la yang ci yod ce na /
analyzed: khyed la yang ci yod ce na /
translated: What do you have?

original: gzhan rig pa ma yin pa nyid do //
analyzed: gzhan rig pa ma yin pa nyid do //
translated: It is not known by another.

original: gal te gsal bar byed pa med na ji ltar gsal ba ma yin pa bum pa bzhin du gsal byed yin zhe na /
analyzed: gal te gsal bar byed pa med na ji ltar gsal ba ma yin pa bum pa bzhin du gsal byed yin zhe na /
translated: If it is not illuminated, how can it be an illuminator, like an unilluminated pot?

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: This is not so.üîΩ

original: gsal ba ma yin par grub pa med pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: gsal ba ma yin par grub pa med pa'i phyir te /
translated: because there is no establishment of the unilluminated.

original: mar me bzhin no //
analyzed: mar me bzhin no //
translated: Like a lamp.

original: bum pa ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: bum pa ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How is it like a pot?

original: mun khung na gnas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mun khung na gnas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is in the dark.

original: de la rang bzhin yod do zhes bya ba ga las she na /
analyzed: de la rang bzhin yod do zhes bya ba ga las she na /
translated: How do you know that it has a nature?

original: tshegs pa gcig la rag las ba'i reg pa la sogs pa mthong ba'i phyir dang / mtshan mo rgyu ba la sogs pa gzhan gyis mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshegs pa gcig la rag las ba'i reg pa la sogs pa mthong ba'i phyir dang / mtshan mo rgyu ba la sogs pa gzhan gyis mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because we see contact, etc. that depend on a single condition, and because others see it at night, etc.

original: don dam par ni de ltar ma yin no @84a * //
analyzed: don dam par ni de ltar ma yin no @84a * //
translated: But in reality it is not so.

original: zhes bya ba 'di ni bdag cag gi 'dod pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'di ni bdag cag gi 'dod pa nyid yin no //
translated: This is just what we believe.

original: de'i phyir rab rib can gyis mthong ba'i rnam pa ni mar me bzhin du rang rig pa nyid do //
analyzed: de'i phyir rab rib can gyis mthong ba'i rnam pa ni mar me bzhin du rang rig pa nyid do //
translated: Therefore, like the lamp, the aspect seen by one with eye disease is self-knowing.

original: gzhan yang gal te mdongs de nus pa yod pa yin na snam bu khra bo bzhin du mar me med par yang phyogs gcig mthong bar thal lo ;
analyzed: gzhan yang gal te mdongs de nus pa yod pa yin na snam bu khra bo bzhin du mar me med par yang phyogs gcig mthong bar thal lo ;
translated: Moreover, if the eye has the potential, then like a multicolored cloth, it would follow that one would see the lamp without a lamp.

original: ;'di ltar / gal te de nyid blo rgyu yin //
analyzed: ;'di ltar / gal te de nyid blo rgyu yin //
translated: If that is the cause of cognition,

original: ji ltar mar me la ltos 'gyur khyon dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin ni de'i phyogs gcig med kyang phyogs gcig po gzhan du 'dzin pa yin no //
analyzed: ji ltar mar me la ltos 'gyur khyon dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin ni de'i phyogs gcig med kyang phyogs gcig po gzhan du 'dzin pa yin no //
translated: The nature of the lamp, which is dependent on the measure of space, is grasped as one part when the other part is absent.

original: de lta bu nyid rgyu yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de lta bu nyid rgyu yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is the cause,

original: ma yin te sngon po la sogs pa rang bzhin gzhan la ltos pa nyid 'dzin pa yin no ;
analyzed: ma yin te sngon po la sogs pa rang bzhin gzhan la ltos pa nyid 'dzin pa yin no ;
translated: no, because the blue, etc., is grasped as another nature dependent on the other.

original: / de lta na gnyi ga rgyu nyid du brtag par bya'o zhe na /
analyzed: / de lta na gnyi ga rgyu nyid du brtag par bya'o zhe na /
translated: If you say that both are to be considered as causes,

original: mar me tsam gyis yod pa'i phyir //
analyzed: mar me tsam gyis yod pa'i phyir //
translated: no, because the existence of the lamp alone is sufficient.

original: gnyi ga dag kyang rgyu ma yin //
analyzed: gnyi ga dag kyang rgyu ma yin //
translated: Neither is the cause of the perception,üîΩbecause the existence of the perception is due to the lamp alone, even when the object is covered.üîΩIf you say that the lamp is not the cause of the perception because the lamp is not perceived when the object is covered,

original: yul de bkab kyang mar me tsam las yod pa yin pa'i phyir mthong ba de ni gnyi ga'i rgyu can ma yin no //üîΩ'on te rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan skye ba'i phyir de dgag pa nyid du mi nus so zhe na /
analyzed: yul de bkab kyang mar me tsam las yod pa yin pa'i phyir mthong ba de ni gnyi ga'i rgyu can ma yin no // 'on te rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan skye ba'i phyir de dgag pa nyid du mi nus so zhe na /
translated: no, because the lamp is perceived when the object is uncovered.üîΩIf you say that the lamp is not the cause of the perception because the lamp is not perceived when the object is covered,üîΩno, because the lamp is perceived when the object is uncovered.üîΩIf you say that the lamp is not the cause of the perception because the lamp is not perceived when the object is covered,üîΩno, because the lamp is perceived when the object is uncovered.üîΩIf you say that the lamp is not the cause of the perception because the lamp is not perceived when the object is covered,üîΩno, because the lamp is perceived when the object is uncovered.üîΩIf you say that the lamp is not the cause of the perception because the lamp is not perceived when the object is covered,üîΩno, because the lamp is perceived when the object is uncovered.üîΩIf you say that the lamp is not the cause of the perception because the lamp is not perceived when the object is covered,üîΩno, because the lamp is perceived when the object is uncovered.üîΩIf you say that the lamp is not the cause of the perception because the lamp is not perceived when the object is covered,üîΩno, because the lamp is perceived when the object is uncovered.üîΩIf you say that the lamp is not the cause of the perception because the lamp is not perceived when the object is covered,üîΩno, because the lamp is perceived when the object is uncovered.üîΩIf you say that the lamp is not the cause of the perception because the lamp is not perceived when the object is covered,üîΩno, because the lamp is perceived when the object is uncovered.üîΩIf you say that the lamp is not the cause of the perception because the lamp is not perceived when the object is covered,

original: 'on te de nyid kyi tshe skye ba yin pas gsal ba ma yin pa'i rang bzhin ma yin no //
analyzed: 'on te de nyid kyi tshe skye ba yin pas gsal ba ma yin pa'i rang bzhin ma yin no //
translated: no, because the lamp is perceived when the object is uncovered.

original: de la mig gi byed pa 'jug pa des na rig pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni 'brel pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de la mig gi byed pa 'jug pa des na rig pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni 'brel pa ma yin te /
translated: The response that the eye does not illuminate because its activity is engaged is not a proper response,

original: dus mtshungs pa nyid kyis de la mig gi byed pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dus mtshungs pa nyid kyis de la mig gi byed pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the eye has no activity with respect to itself, since it is simultaneous with itself.

original: rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag de'i rang bzhin la byed pa 'jug pa yin na ni /
analyzed: rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa dag de'i rang bzhin la byed pa 'jug pa yin na ni /
translated: If the activity of illumination were to be engaged in the intrinsic nature of the eye,

original: 'od bzhin du de nyid kyi tshe mar mes bskyed pa yin no zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'od bzhin du de nyid kyi tshe mar mes bskyed pa yin no zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: then it would be generated by the lamp at that time, just as light is.

original: ji ltar mar me rang gi rgyud las 'od dang bcas pa yin pa de bzhin du mig kyang mdun na yongs su gsal ba'i rang bzhin dang ldan pa yin pas na skyon med do //
analyzed: ji ltar mar me rang gi rgyud las 'od dang bcas pa yin pa de bzhin du mig kyang mdun na yongs su gsal ba'i rang bzhin dang ldan pa yin pas na skyon med do //
translated: There is no error, because just as the lamp is endowed with light in its own continuum, so too the eye is endowed with the intrinsic nature of illumination in front of it.

original: mar me las 'od tha dad pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: mar me las 'od tha dad pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If the light is different from the lamp,

original: tha dad la rag mod /
analyzed: tha dad la rag mod /
translated: then it is certainly different.

original: 'on kyang mar me nyid bzhin du 'od mar mes gsal bar byas pa ma yin no zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'on kyang mar me nyid bzhin du 'od mar mes gsal bar byas pa ma yin no zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: However, it would follow that the light is not illuminated by the lamp, just as the lamp is.

original: de'i phyir mig dang gzugs las ma gtogs pa rnam par shes pa gzhan ni tshad ma med pas yod pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: de'i phyir mig dang gzugs las ma gtogs pa rnam par shes pa gzhan ni tshad ma med pas yod pa ma yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, since there is no valid cognition of a consciousness that is different from eyes and forms, it does not exist.

original: 'on kyang rang gi ngo bo myong bas byin gyis brlabs pa'i rang bzhin gnyis po de nyid myong ba yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang rang gi ngo bo myong bas byin gyis brlabs pa'i rang bzhin gnyis po de nyid myong ba yin no //
translated: However, the experience of the nature of the two, the experience of the nature of the object and the experience of the nature of the consciousness, is the experience of those two.

original: de lta bu'i myong ba'i rgyu gzhan ni brtags par bya ba yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de lta bu'i myong ba'i rgyu gzhan ni brtags par bya ba yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Since the cause of such an experience is to be investigated,

original: blo tshul gnyis par grub po //
analyzed: blo tshul gnyis par grub po //
translated: the two modes of cognition are established.

original: gal te mdun na gnas pa'i rnam pa can don nyid yin la /
analyzed: gal te mdun na gnas pa'i rnam pa can don nyid yin la /
translated: If the object itself has the aspect of that which is present in front,üîΩand if it is the object of consciousness, then at that time,

original: de nyid rnam par shes pa'i gzung ba yin na de'i tshe don rang @84b gi ngo bos bzung ba'i phyir na /üîΩnye ring la sogs khyad par gyis //
analyzed: de nyid rnam par shes pa'i gzung ba yin na de'i tshe don rang @84b gi ngo bos bzung ba'i phyir na / nye ring la sogs khyad par gyis //
translated: because the object is apprehended by its own nature,üîΩit is not tenable that it is clear or unclear

original: gsal dang mi gsal mi rung ngo //
analyzed: gsal dang mi gsal mi rung ngo //
translated: due to the difference of near and far, etc.

original: gal te snang khyad las der 'gyur //
analyzed: gal te snang khyad las der 'gyur //
translated: If you say that is due to the difference in appearance,üîΩthen seeing and not seeing what is obstructed and not obstructed

original: de ni chod dang ma chod dag / mthong dang mi mthong mtshungs par 'gyur //
analyzed: de ni chod dang ma chod dag / mthong dang mi mthong mtshungs par 'gyur //
translated: would be the same.

original: mthong ba'i yul gyi mtshams las ma 'das pa gnas pa'i don ni rang gi rgyu brgyud pa las gzhan gyi rang bzhin dang bral bar skye ba rang bzhin nges pa dang 'brel pa yin pa'i phyir rang gi ngo bo nyid snang ba yin pas gang gis gsal ba
analyzed: mthong ba'i yul gyi mtshams las ma 'das pa gnas pa'i don ni rang gi rgyu brgyud pa las gzhan gyi rang bzhin dang bral bar skye ba rang bzhin nges pa dang 'brel pa yin pa'i phyir rang gi ngo bo nyid snang ba yin pas gang gis gsal ba
translated: Since it appears as its own nature, by what is it illuminated?

original: dang gzhan pa'i rang bzhin dang 'brel pa yul nye ba dang ring ba la sogs pa nyid yin yang 'di tha dad par snang bar ji ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: dang gzhan pa'i rang bzhin dang 'brel pa yul nye ba dang ring ba la sogs pa nyid yin yang 'di tha dad par snang bar ji ltar 'gyur /
translated: Even though it is related to the nature of something else, it is not the case that it appears as different, even though the object is near or far.

original: 'di ni mthong ba yang yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni mthong ba yang yin te /
translated: This is also seen.

original: des na rnam pa dang ldan pa'i phyi rol nyid gzung bas rang gi snang ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: des na rnam pa dang ldan pa'i phyi rol nyid gzung bas rang gi snang ba ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, the external object that possesses aspects is not apprehended by its own appearance.

original: nges pa dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin ma tshang ba med par bzung ba ni tha dad par snang ba ma yin te /
analyzed: nges pa dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin ma tshang ba med par bzung ba ni tha dad par snang ba ma yin te /
translated: The nature that possesses ascertainment is apprehended without incompleteness. It does not appear as different.

original: de'i rang bzhin tha dad par thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin tha dad par thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because it would follow that its nature would be different.

original: mdun na gnas pa'i rang bzhin du snang ba ni don nyid yin te /
analyzed: mdun na gnas pa'i rang bzhin du snang ba ni don nyid yin te /
translated: The appearance of the nature that is present in front is the object itself.

original: don gyi mtshan nyid ni de yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don gyi mtshan nyid ni de yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because that is the definition of an object.

original: des na de tha dad na don nyid tha dad pa ma tshang ba med pa yin no //
analyzed: des na de tha dad na don nyid tha dad pa ma tshang ba med pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, if they are different, the objects themselves are not different.

original: don tha dad pa yin na yang gsal ba la sogs pa brjod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: don tha dad pa yin na yang gsal ba la sogs pa brjod pa ma yin te /
translated: Even if the objects are different, they are not expressed as distinct, as in the case of the manifestation, etc.

original: don gzhan snang bas gzhan mi gsal ba zhes bya ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: don gzhan snang bas gzhan mi gsal ba zhes bya ba ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not the case that one object is manifest and another is not manifest.

original: de'i rang bzhin ni de nyid yin la /
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin ni de nyid yin la /
translated: That is its nature.

original: de yang gsal ba nyid do //
analyzed: de yang gsal ba nyid do //
translated: And that is manifestation.

original: de'i rang bzhin nyid na /
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin nyid na /
translated: If that is its nature,

original: ji ltar rang bzhin gzhan de ltar //
analyzed: ji ltar rang bzhin gzhan de ltar //
translated: how can it be different from that nature?

original: de yi ngo bor rtogs na de //
analyzed: de yi ngo bor rtogs na de //
translated: If it is understood to be its essence,

original: rang bzhin tha dad ji ltar yin //üîΩtha dad med par rtogs na ni //
analyzed: rang bzhin tha dad ji ltar yin // tha dad med par rtogs na ni //
translated: how can it be different from it?üîΩIf it is understood to be nondifferent,

original: rtogs pa tha dad med par 'gyur //
analyzed: rtogs pa tha dad med par 'gyur //
translated: the understanding is nondifferent.

original: gzung ba'i rang bzhin tha dad min //
analyzed: gzung ba'i rang bzhin tha dad min //
translated: The nature of the object is not different.üîΩHow can it be different?

original: tha dad par yang ji ltar 'dod //
analyzed: tha dad par yang ji ltar 'dod //
translated: If it is different from the object,üîΩis the difference in the object or in the cognition?

original: 'o na nye ba dang ring ba la sogs pa'i dbye ba de nyid dam /
analyzed: 'o na nye ba dang ring ba la sogs pa'i dbye ba de nyid dam /
translated: If it is in the object,üîΩhow can it be in the cognition?üîΩIf it is in the cognition,üîΩhow can it be in the object?üîΩIf it is in the cognition,üîΩhow can it be in the object?üîΩIf it is in the object,üîΩhow can it be in the cognition?üîΩIf it is in the cognition,üîΩhow can it be in the object?üîΩIf it is in the object,üîΩhow can it be in the cognition?üîΩIf it is in the cognition,üîΩhow can it be in the object?üîΩIf it is in the object,üîΩhow can it be in the cognition?üîΩIf it is in the cognition,üîΩhow can it be in the object?üîΩIf it is in the object,üîΩhow can it be in the cognition?üîΩIf it is in the cognition,üîΩhow can it be in the object?üîΩIf it is in the object,üîΩhow can it be in the cognition?

original: snang ba dang mthong ba'i bye brag las gsal ba dang mi gsal ba tha dad pa yin no zhes bya ba ni 'brel pa ma yin te /
analyzed: snang ba dang mthong ba'i bye brag las gsal ba dang mi gsal ba tha dad pa yin no zhes bya ba ni 'brel pa ma yin te /
translated: The distinction between the clear and the unclear is due to the distinction between the appearance and the seeing, is not related,

original: rang gi ngo bor snang ba dag cig shos kyi rnam par rtog pa las mi 'da' ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bor snang ba dag cig shos kyi rnam par rtog pa las mi 'da' ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because the appearance of the own nature does not go beyond the conceptualization of the other.

original: snang ba tha dad kyang gal te rang gi ngo bos snang ba yin na ji ltar mi gsal /
analyzed: snang ba tha dad kyang gal te rang gi ngo bos snang ba yin na ji ltar mi gsal /
translated: If there is a difference in appearance, but the own nature appears, how can it be unclear?

original: mi snang ngo zhe na /
analyzed: mi snang ngo zhe na /
translated: It does not appear.

original: de lta na yang ji lta ji ltar mi gsal te /
analyzed: de lta na yang ji lta ji ltar mi gsal te /
translated: But then, how can it be unclear?

original: des na 'di ni gyi na'o //
analyzed: des na 'di ni gyi na'o //
translated: Therefore, this is just a quibble.

original: snang ba tha dad na der de gzhan gzung bar zad mod don mi gsal ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin du go ba ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: snang ba tha dad na der de gzhan gzung bar zad mod don mi gsal ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin du go ba ltar 'gyur /
translated: If there is a difference in appearance, then it is just that which is grasped as other, and it would be understood as having the nature of an unclear object, etc.

original: 'on te yul thag ring bas bar du chod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'on te yul thag ring bas bar du chod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: But it is because the object is distant and obstructed.

original: @85a * // mthong ba gzhan yin no zhe na /
analyzed: @85a * // mthong ba gzhan yin no zhe na /
translated: The seeing is different.

original: gal te yul thag ring na de'i tshe bcad pa'i phyir mi mthong ba nyid do //
analyzed: gal te yul thag ring na de'i tshe bcad pa'i phyir mi mthong ba nyid do //
translated: If the object is distant, then it is not seen because it is obstructed.

original: 'on te ma bcad na de'i phyir yongs su gsal ba kho nar mthong bar 'gyur bas na gang las tha dad pa nyid yin /
analyzed: 'on te ma bcad na de'i phyir yongs su gsal ba kho nar mthong bar 'gyur bas na gang las tha dad pa nyid yin /
translated: But if it is not cut off, then it would be seen as completely clear. So what is the difference?

original: gal te snang ba mi gsal bas //üîΩde la thun mong 'ga' zhig ni //
analyzed: gal te snang ba mi gsal bas // de la thun mong 'ga' zhig ni //
translated: If the appearance is unclear,üîΩthen some part of it is not seen.

original: ma mthong de phyir tha dad na //
analyzed: ma mthong de phyir tha dad na //
translated: If it is different because of that,

original: yul thag ring ba nyid kyis ni phra mo nye sgrib par byed kyi rags pa'i snang bas ni ma yin no //
analyzed: yul thag ring ba nyid kyis ni phra mo nye sgrib par byed kyi rags pa'i snang bas ni ma yin no //
translated: then the subtle object is obscured by its proximity to the distant object, not by the appearance of the gross object.

original: phra mo ni yul thag ring pos bsal na mi mthong ba nyid do zhe na /
analyzed: phra mo ni yul thag ring pos bsal na mi mthong ba nyid do zhe na /
translated: The subtle object is not seen when it is removed from the distant object.

original: yan lag can gcig nyid khyab par gnas pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: yan lag can gcig nyid khyab par gnas pa ma yin nam /
translated: But isn‚Äôt the whole partless?

original: des na thams cad mthong ba ji ltar mig gsal bar mthong /
analyzed: des na thams cad mthong ba ji ltar mig gsal bar mthong /
translated: So how is it that the eye sees the whole clearly?

original: 'on te gcig ma yin na de'i tshe thams cad phra mo nyid yin pas rtogs pa nyid du mi 'gyur ba 'am /
analyzed: 'on te gcig ma yin na de'i tshe thams cad phra mo nyid yin pas rtogs pa nyid du mi 'gyur ba 'am /
translated: But if it is not one, then all of it is subtle, so it would not be perceived.

original: 'gyur na yang rdul phra rab kyi rang bzhin yongs su gsal bar snang bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'gyur na yang rdul phra rab kyi rang bzhin yongs su gsal bar snang bar 'gyur ro //
translated: But if it is perceived, then the nature of the subtle atom would be clearly apparent.

original: de nyid ston pa ni /
analyzed: de nyid ston pa ni /
translated: To demonstrate this, he says:

analyzed: phyi rol don gcig mthong ba dang // mi mthong tha dad gsal ba yin //

original: phra rdul du ma tha dad mthong //
analyzed: phra rdul du ma tha dad mthong //

original: mi mthong tha dad ga las yin //
analyzed: mi mthong tha dad ga las yin //

original: gal te yan lag can gcig yin yang phra mo dang ldan pa'i phyir de dang bral bar mthong ba ni mi gsal ba'i rnam pa nyid yin na /
analyzed: gal te yan lag can gcig yin yang phra mo dang ldan pa'i phyir de dang bral bar mthong ba ni mi gsal ba'i rnam pa nyid yin na /

original: gzhan du ni gzhan du 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: gzhan du ni gzhan du 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: But if it were different from the subtle particles, it would be different from the other gross objects.

original: de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni ma yin te /

original: 'di ltar / sngon po ser po med par ni //
analyzed: 'di ltar / sngon po ser po med par ni //

analyzed: gzung dang de mi gsal zhe 'am ci //

original: gzhan la gzung yang de yi ni //
analyzed: gzhan la gzung yang de yi ni //

original: rang bzhin gsal bar 'dzin pa nyid //
analyzed: rang bzhin gsal bar 'dzin pa nyid //

original: gal te du ma nyid yin na //
analyzed: gal te du ma nyid yin na //
translated: If the gross object is many,

analyzed: de ma bzung na de las gzhan mi 'dzin pa'i phyir mi gsal ba ni ma yin no zhe na /

original: de yang 'thad pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de yang 'thad pa ma yin te /

original: de la yang mtshungs pa'i phyir ro ;
analyzed: de la yang mtshungs pa'i phyir ro ;
translated: Because the same applies to the subtle particles.

original: / gzhan bzung bas mi gsal ba gang yin pa de ci don gyi rang bzhin yin nam /
analyzed: / gzhan bzung bas mi gsal ba gang yin pa de ci don gyi rang bzhin yin nam /
translated: Is that which is not clear because it is grasped by another the nature of the object?

original: 'on te myong ba yin /
analyzed: 'on te myong ba yin /
translated: Or is it the experience?

original: gal te don gyi yin na des gzhan ma bzung yang de nyid yin pas ji lta ji ltar mi gsal /
analyzed: gal te don gyi yin na des gzhan ma bzung yang de nyid yin pas ji lta ji ltar mi gsal /
translated: If it is the object, then it is that very object even when it is not grasped by another. So how can it be unclear?

analyzed: 'on te las de skye ba yin na 'o na ni de'i tshe de don ma yin pas ji ltar don 'dzin pa yin /

original: de lta na yang de lta bur gyur pa de ni dngos po nyid kyi rang bzhin yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de lta na yang de lta bur gyur pa de ni dngos po nyid kyi rang bzhin yin no zhe na /

original: dngos po rang bzhin yin na gzhan gyis kyang de bzhin nyid du mthong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dngos po rang bzhin yin na gzhan gyis kyang de bzhin nyid du mthong bar 'gyur ro //

original: gzhan gyis ma mthong na ni thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir rtogs pa nyid yin no zhes bstan zan to //
analyzed: gzhan gyis ma mthong na ni thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir rtogs pa nyid yin no zhes bstan zan to //

analyzed: 'di ltar skye bo dag bdag gi rtogs pa nyid mi gsal @85b bar skyes so zhes rtogs pa yin no //

original: 'on te nye bar btags pa las de ltar rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: 'on te nye bar btags pa las de ltar rtogs pa yin no //

analyzed: mi gsal ba'i don mthong ba la rtogs pa yang de lta bu tha snyad byed pa yin te /
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúunclear‚Äù is seeing an object. ‚Äú Realization‚Äù is also used in this way.

analyzed: dper na dbyug pa dang 'brel pa las skyes bu la dbyug par tha snyad byed pa bzhin no zhe na /

original: de yang mi rung ste /
analyzed: de yang mi rung ste /

analyzed: de yi 'bras bu mthong ba las //

analyzed: tha snyad de 'dra de 'gyur na //

original: 'bras bu'ang mthong yin don gzhan ni //
analyzed: 'bras bu'ang mthong yin don gzhan ni //

analyzed: de yi 'bras bur gnas ma yin // gal te de bzhin 'brel las ni //
translated: does not exist as its effect.üîΩIf, in the same way,

analyzed: sngon po la yang brjod 'gyur ro // nga yi mthong 'di rtsig pa zhes //
translated: ‚Äúblue‚Äù is expressed in dependence on it,

analyzed: khyed ni nam yang 'dod ma yin //
translated: you would never assertüîΩ‚ÄúI see this wall.‚Äù

original: de phyir 'jig rten thams cad kyis //
analyzed: de phyir 'jig rten thams cad kyis //
translated: Therefore, because of the realization of all worldly people,

original: rtogs phyir mthong ba mi gsal nyid //
analyzed: rtogs phyir mthong ba mi gsal nyid //
translated: seeing is not clear.

original: rgyu med par ni nges pa kun //
analyzed: rgyu med par ni nges pa kun //
translated: All certainties without a cause

original: 'khrul pa nyid du brjod pa min //
analyzed: 'khrul pa nyid du brjod pa min //
translated: are said to be just confused.

analyzed: tha snyad ma gol bar bsgrub pa'i nyes pa ni gzhan du 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: The fault of not establishing the conventional is not changed.

analyzed: des na don rang nyid snang ba blo tha dad par rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is not reasonable that the object itself appears as a different cognition.

original: gal te snang ba gsal mi gsal //
analyzed: gal te snang ba gsal mi gsal //

analyzed: khyad par gyi blo tha dad na //

analyzed: gzhan tha dad pas tha dad med //

analyzed: gang las tha dad par snang 'gyur //

original: gzhan dag brjod pa ni /
analyzed: gzhan dag brjod pa ni /

analyzed: blo'i rang bzhin tha dad ni ma yin te /

original: de ni tha mi dad de /
analyzed: de ni tha mi dad de /

analyzed: 'di ltar / gal te snang ba dang ldan pa'i //

original: don ni snang ba nyid ma yin //
analyzed: don ni snang ba nyid ma yin //

analyzed: gzhan du lhan cig snang bas ni //

analyzed: 'gyur ba kho na ste /

analyzed: gzhan du srab min yod pa nyid //

analyzed: rdul gyis bsgribs pa ma yin no // yul thag rgyang ring por ni de'i bar thag ring bas na /
translated: because it is faint.üîΩIf it is said that because the distance is great,

original: rdul mang ba nyid do zhe na /
analyzed: rdul mang ba nyid do zhe na /

original: 'di ni gho dha dang ri bong gi tshul yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni gho dha dang ri bong gi tshul yin te /
translated: this is the way of the Ghodhas and rabbits.

original: der ni snang ba yang mang ba nyid de la nye bar ni ji ltar rdul srab pa de bzhin du snang ba yang yin /
analyzed: der ni snang ba yang mang ba nyid de la nye bar ni ji ltar rdul srab pa de bzhin du snang ba yang yin /
translated: There, the appearance is also great. How can the particles be faint there? The appearance is also like that.

original: 'di skad smras pas ci bya /
analyzed: 'di skad smras pas ci bya /
translated: What is the use of saying this?

original: shin tu nye la snang ba ni ;
analyzed: shin tu nye la snang ba ni ;
translated: The object that is very close

original: / cher gsal de yang gsal bar 'gyur //
analyzed: / cher gsal de yang gsal bar 'gyur //
translated: is seen very clearly, and that is also clear.üîΩIf the clear appearance is due to the thinness of the particles, then the object that is very close is seen very clearly because the particles are very thin.

original: gal te rdul srab pa nyid kyi snang ba gsal bar snang ba yin na de'i tshe shin tu nye bar rdul srab pa'i phyir /üîΩshin tu gsal bar 'gyur ro //üîΩde la dbang po'i nus pa med pa'i phyir ro zhe na /üîΩgtan mi mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes bshad zin to//
analyzed: gal te rdul srab pa nyid kyi snang ba gsal bar snang ba yin na de'i tshe shin tu nye bar rdul srab pa'i phyir / shin tu gsal bar 'gyur ro // de la dbang po'i nus pa med pa'i phyir ro zhe na / gtan mi mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes bshad zin to//
translated: If you say that the sense faculty has no power to see the object that is very close,

original: gal te der yang mthong med la //
analyzed: gal te der yang mthong med la //
translated: then it would not see at all.

original: brten nas gzugs gzhan 'byung 'gyur na //
analyzed: brten nas gzugs gzhan 'byung 'gyur na //
translated: If another form arises in dependence on that,

original: de dag rnams ni phan tshun du //
analyzed: de dag rnams ni phan tshun du //
translated: then those two would establish each other.üîΩTherefore, the object that is very close

original: sgrub 'gyur de'i phyir snang ba ni //
analyzed: sgrub 'gyur de'i phyir snang ba ni //
translated: is seen very clearly.üîΩTherefore, the object that is very closeüîΩis seen very clearly.üîΩTherefore, the object that is very closeüîΩis seen very clearly.üîΩTherefore, the object that is very close

original: sgrib 'gyur de'i phyir snang ba ni //üîΩsgrib byed byed mthong ba'i ming can sems med pa'i dngos po la brten nas gzugs gzhan nyid der skye ba yin te /
analyzed: sgrib 'gyur de'i phyir snang ba ni //üîΩsgrib byed byed mthong ba'i ming can sems med pa'i dngos po la brten nas gzugs gzhan nyid der skye ba yin te /
translated: is seen very clearly.üîΩTherefore, the object that is very closeüîΩis seen very clearly.üîΩTherefore, the object that is very closeüîΩis seen very clearly.üîΩTherefore, the object that is very closeüîΩis seen very clearly.üîΩTherefore, the object that is very closeüîΩis seen very clearly.üîΩTherefore, the object that is very closeüîΩis seen very clearly.üîΩTherefore, the object that is very closeüîΩis seen very clearly.üîΩTherefore, the object that is very closeüîΩis seen very clearly.üîΩTherefore, the object that is very closeüîΩis seen very clearly.üîΩTherefore, the object that is very closeüîΩis seen very clearly.

original: des snang ba de bsgribs shing bcad pa de'i phyir de las gzhan mi mthong ngo zhe na /
analyzed: des snang ba de bsgribs shing bcad pa de'i phyir de las gzhan mi mthong ngo zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is because the light obscures and cuts off the other object, therefore one does not see it,

original: de lta yin na thams cad kyis de la gcig nyid mthong bar 'gyur gyi gzhan ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de lta yin na thams cad kyis de la gcig nyid mthong bar 'gyur gyi gzhan ni ma yin te /
translated: then in that case, everyone would see it as one, not as another,

original: snang ba bsgribs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: snang ba bsgribs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the light obscures it.

original: nye bar ni sgrib pa de med do //
analyzed: nye bar ni sgrib pa de med do //
translated: But it is not obscured in the near place.

original: de rgyab tu gnas pa'i phyir ro zhe na ma yin te yul gcig tu mthong ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de rgyab tu gnas pa'i phyir ro zhe na ma yin te yul gcig tu mthong ba'i phyir ro //
translated: If you say that it is because it is behind it, no, because it is seen in one place.

original: yul thag ring po na gnas pas yul nye ba na gnas pa'i rgyab tu mi gsal bar 'dod pa'i rang bzhin de dmigs pa de ni ma yin no //
analyzed: yul thag ring po na gnas pas yul nye ba na gnas pa'i rgyab tu mi gsal bar 'dod pa'i rang bzhin de dmigs pa de ni ma yin no //
translated: The object that is seen in the far place is not the object that is seen in the near place, because the nature of the object that is seen in the near place is not obscured by the object that is seen in the far place.

original: de ni 'khrul pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de ni 'khrul pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is an error,

original: don gyi de kho na nyid mthong ba la 'khrul pa ga na srid /
analyzed: don gyi de kho na nyid mthong ba la 'khrul pa ga na srid /
translated: how can there be an error in seeing the reality of an object?

original: yul la 'khrul pa yod pa nyid de /
analyzed: yul la 'khrul pa yod pa nyid de /
translated: There is an error in the object.

original: nyi ma shing gi rtse mo dang 'byar bar mthong ba bzhin @86b no zhe na /
analyzed: nyi ma shing gi rtse mo dang 'byar bar mthong ba bzhin @86b no zhe na /
translated: It is like seeing the sun as if it were attached to the top of a tree.

original: gal te de na med pa yi //
analyzed: gal te de na med pa yi //
translated: If an object that does not exist there

original: dngos por 'ang yul der mthong na ni //
analyzed: dngos por 'ang yul der mthong na ni //
translated: were seen in that place,

original: dus der nges par der mthong dang // 'brel pa ci ste 'gyur ma yin //
analyzed: dus der nges par der mthong dang // 'brel pa ci ste 'gyur ma yin //
translated: between seeing and that which is not seen?

original: gal te de yi dus su ni //
analyzed: gal te de yi dus su ni //
translated: If it is said that at that time

original: med pa mthong na thams cad ni //
analyzed: med pa mthong na thams cad ni //
translated: the non-existent is seen,üîΩthen it follows that

original: don rnams thams cad mthong zhes par //
analyzed: don rnams thams cad mthong zhes par //
translated: all things are seen.

original: 'gyur na de yang mthong ba min//üîΩgal te ma mthong dang 'brel pas //
analyzed: 'gyur na de yang mthong ba min// gal te ma mthong dang 'brel pas //
translated: But that is not seen.

original: 'di dag thams cad gzhung 'dzugs na //
analyzed: 'di dag thams cad gzhung 'dzugs na //
translated: If you posit all of this

original: gzhan yang de phyir ma mthong las //
analyzed: gzhan yang de phyir ma mthong las //
translated: on the basis of seeing what is not seen,

original: mthong ba thams cad skye bar 'gyur //
analyzed: mthong ba thams cad skye bar 'gyur //
translated: then all seeing would ariseüîΩfrom not seeing.

original: gang gi tshe khyed gzhan gyi lta ba sun phyung ba'i phyir khyad cung zad cig brjod pa de'i tshe gzhan yang khyed la skyon snang gi /
analyzed: gang gi tshe khyed gzhan gyi lta ba sun phyung ba'i phyir khyad cung zad cig brjod pa de'i tshe gzhan yang khyed la skyon snang gi /
translated: When you state some slight difference in order to refute the views of others, then we can say that you are at fault,

original: gzhung bsgrub pa ni ma yin pa 'di thams cad ni de lta bur gyur pa'i ma mthong ba'i mthus yin pas 'di ni khyed kyi nyes pa yin no zhes brjod par nus pa nyid do //
analyzed: gzhung bsgrub pa ni ma yin pa 'di thams cad ni de lta bur gyur pa'i ma mthong ba'i mthus yin pas 'di ni khyed kyi nyes pa yin no zhes brjod par nus pa nyid do //
translated: because all of this is due to the power of not seeing, and this is your fault.

original: ji ltar yod pa'i mthong ba'i mthong ba bzlog pa de bzhin du med pa nye bar ston pa yang yin no //
analyzed: ji ltar yod pa'i mthong ba'i mthong ba bzlog pa de bzhin du med pa nye bar ston pa yang yin no //
translated: Just as the seeing of existence is refuted, so too the teaching of nonexistence is refuted.

original: des na khyed med pa nyid kyi skyon las spobs shing yod pa yin yang gzhung mi tshugs pa yin no //
analyzed: des na khyed med pa nyid kyi skyon las spobs shing yod pa yin yang gzhung mi tshugs pa yin no //
translated: Thus, you are refuted by the fault of nonexistence, and even if you exist, your doctrine is not established.

original: de bzhin du rtogs pa'i tshig kyang yin pas 'ga' yang yang dag pa ma yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du rtogs pa'i tshig kyang yin pas 'ga' yang yang dag pa ma yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: In the same way, the word ‚Äúrealization‚Äù is also refuted, so nothing is unreal.

original: dngos gang ji ltar mthong 'gyur ba //
analyzed: dngos gang ji ltar mthong 'gyur ba //
translated: Whatever thing is seen

original: de ni de lta nyid rtogs bya //
analyzed: de ni de lta nyid rtogs bya //
translated: is realized just as it is.

original: mi gsal sgrib pa de yi ni //
analyzed: mi gsal sgrib pa de yi ni //
translated: The unclear obscuration

original: rgyab tu me zhes rtogs par bya //
analyzed: rgyab tu me zhes rtogs par bya //
translated: is realized as fire in the back.

original: sgrib pa de 'ga'i yang rgyab tu ma yin pas na /
analyzed: sgrib pa de 'ga'i yang rgyab tu ma yin pas na /
translated: Since it is not in the back of any of those obscurations,

original: mdun na gsal ba'i phyir thams cad kyi mi gsal ba'i rang bzhin gyis sgrib pa gcig pu mthong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mdun na gsal ba'i phyir thams cad kyi mi gsal ba'i rang bzhin gyis sgrib pa gcig pu mthong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: because it is clear in front, the single obscuration of the nature of the unclear is seen by all.

original: de ma bsgribs pa yin na ni yul thag ring po na gnas pas kyang gcig par gsal ba dang mi gsal ba'i mtshan nyid gang yang gcig par mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes bshad zin pa ni /
analyzed: de ma bsgribs pa yin na ni yul thag ring po na gnas pas kyang gcig par gsal ba dang mi gsal ba'i mtshan nyid gang yang gcig par mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes bshad zin pa ni /
translated: If it is not obscured, then even if it is located far away, it would be seen as one, having the character of being either clear or unclear.üîΩIt has been explained:

original: de la gcig tu snang bar 'gyur //
analyzed: de la gcig tu snang bar 'gyur //
translated: It would appear as one.

original: de ma bsgribs nas gcig par ni //
analyzed: de ma bsgribs nas gcig par ni //
translated: If it is not obscured,

original: gsal dang mi gsal rang bzhin dag / mthong 'gyur ci ste yang gcig snang ba yin te /
analyzed: gsal dang mi gsal rang bzhin dag / mthong 'gyur ci ste yang gcig snang ba yin te /
translated: then why would it appear as one?

original: gzhan gyi mthong ba ni ma mthong pas bsgribs pa'i phyir ro zhes brjod do zhe na /
analyzed: gzhan gyi mthong ba ni ma mthong pas bsgribs pa'i phyir ro zhes brjod do zhe na /
translated: If it is obscured, then it is not seen by the other.

original: 'di la bshad pa /
analyzed: 'di la bshad pa /
translated: To this we reply:

original: gal te de las mthong med kyis gcig bsgribs //
analyzed: gal te de las mthong med kyis gcig bsgribs //
translated: If it is not seen because it is obscured,

original: ma mthong ba zhes bya ba ni tshig gi lhag ma'o //
analyzed: ma mthong ba zhes bya ba ni tshig gi lhag ma'o //
translated: the word ‚Äúnot‚Äù is left out.

original: de ni mi 'thad de /
analyzed: de ni mi 'thad de /
translated: That is not tenable.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /üîΩgang gis don dang don min byed //
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na / gang gis don dang don min byed //
translated: Why?üîΩWhat is the use of not seeing

original: de la ma mthong ba ci byed //
analyzed: de la ma mthong ba ci byed //
translated: what is to be done and what is not to be done?üîΩWhat is the use of not seeing

original: ma mthong zhes bya ba 'di @87a * //
analyzed: ma mthong zhes bya ba 'di @87a * //
translated: what is called ‚Äúnot seeing‚Äù?

original: chos dang chos ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas /
analyzed: chos dang chos ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas /
translated: This is the characteristic of what is morally good and what is not morally good.

original: glo bur du don dang don ma yin pa'i nye bar gyur pas rtogs par bya ba yin gyi /
analyzed: glo bur du don dang don ma yin pa'i nye bar gyur pas rtogs par bya ba yin gyi /
translated: It is understood through the adventitious occurrence of the object or non-object.

original: mngon sum gyis ni ma yin no //
analyzed: mngon sum gyis ni ma yin no //
translated: It is not by direct perception.

original: des na thag ring po nas ma mthong ba dang mi gsal bar mthong ba dag la don dang don ma yin par med pa yang tshig ji ltar ma mthong bas byas pa nyid yin /
analyzed: des na thag ring po nas ma mthong ba dang mi gsal bar mthong ba dag la don dang don ma yin par med pa yang tshig ji ltar ma mthong bas byas pa nyid yin /
translated: Therefore, in the case of not seeing from a distance or seeing unclearly, how can one determine the object or non-object based on what is not seen?

original: 'di yang byed do zhe na /
analyzed: 'di yang byed do zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is also done by what is seen,

original: 'di la legs par brjod pa yang ma mthong ba'i dbang gis ma rtogs pa'i phyir sun 'byin pa dang gzhung 'dzugs pa 'di thams cad de kho na nyid du mi 'gyur ro zhes lan bstan zin to //
analyzed: 'di la legs par brjod pa yang ma mthong ba'i dbang gis ma rtogs pa'i phyir sun 'byin pa dang gzhung 'dzugs pa 'di thams cad de kho na nyid du mi 'gyur ro zhes lan bstan zin to //
translated: we have already explained the response that all of these refutations and presentations are not tenable in reality because of not understanding through the power of not seeing.

original: de phyir don ston skye 'gyur ba'i //
analyzed: de phyir don ston skye 'gyur ba'i //
translated: Therefore, the arising of the cognition that reveals the object

original: myong ba ji lta'i rgyu bzhin du //
analyzed: myong ba ji lta'i rgyu bzhin du //
translated: is in accordance with the cause of experience.

original: rnam pa tha dad 'dzin byed de //
analyzed: rnam pa tha dad 'dzin byed de //
translated: It apprehends the different aspects,

original: lhag ma blo nang lugs ma yin //
analyzed: lhag ma blo nang lugs ma yin //
translated: but the remaining cognition is not internal.

original: gzhan yang / shes pa sgra dang mar me rnams //
analyzed: gzhan yang / shes pa sgra dang mar me rnams //
translated: Moreover, consciousness, sound, and lamps

original: mngon sum dang ni cig shos kyis //
analyzed: mngon sum dang ni cig shos kyis //
translated: are either direct perception or otherwise.

original: skyed byed nyid kyis snga ma yi //
analyzed: skyed byed nyid kyis snga ma yi //
translated: Because of the destruction of the prior

original: skad cig rnams ni zhig pa'i phyir //
analyzed: skad cig rnams ni zhig pa'i phyir //
translated: moments by the very cause of their production.

original: gang gi shes las mi gsal 'gyur //
analyzed: gang gi shes las mi gsal 'gyur //
translated: How could it be clear from a cognitionüîΩof something that does not exist?

original: med pa ni rang gi ngo bos mthong ba ma yin no //
analyzed: med pa ni rang gi ngo bos mthong ba ma yin no //
translated: Something that does not exist is not seen by virtue of its own nature.

original: rgyu yin pa nyid kyis shes pa las sngar 'gyur ba nyid la /
analyzed: rgyu yin pa nyid kyis shes pa las sngar 'gyur ba nyid la /
translated: Because of being the cause, it must be prior to the cognition.

original: snga ma nyid yin na yang skad cig ma nyid kyis shes pa'i dus na med pa nyid do //
analyzed: snga ma nyid yin na yang skad cig ma nyid kyis shes pa'i dus na med pa nyid do //
translated: And if it is prior, then because of momentariness, it does not exist at the time of the cognition.

original: 'on te gang gi tshe yod pa de'i tshe 'dzin pa yin te /
analyzed: 'on te gang gi tshe yod pa de'i tshe 'dzin pa yin te /
translated: But if it exists at that time, then it is apprehended.

original: rgyu'i dngos po nyid ma yin pas dus mnyam pa nyid du rgyu yin pas so zhe na /
analyzed: rgyu'i dngos po nyid ma yin pas dus mnyam pa nyid du rgyu yin pas so zhe na /
translated: Because it is not the cause, it is simultaneous with the cognition.

original: de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni ma yin te /
translated: That is not so.

original: shes pa la phan 'dogs pa ma yin pa /
analyzed: shes pa la phan 'dogs pa ma yin pa /
translated: Because it does not assist the cognition.üîΩWhat is not an assisting cause

original: phan 'dogs byed pa ma yin gzhan //
analyzed: phan 'dogs byed pa ma yin gzhan //
translated: is not apprehended.

original: gang yin pa de gsal na don kun med par 'gyur //
analyzed: gang yin pa de gsal na don kun med par 'gyur //
translated: If it is clear, then all objects would be nonexistent.

original: dus mnyam pa ni rgyu ma yin te /
analyzed: dus mnyam pa ni rgyu ma yin te /
translated: A simultaneous entity is not a cause,

original: de ltar rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ltar rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no cognition of it.

original: 'brel pa med par 'dzin na ni //
analyzed: 'brel pa med par 'dzin na ni //
translated: If it is apprehended without a connection,

original: thams cad 'dzin pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thams cad 'dzin pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: then everything would be apprehended.

original: gal te rgyu las nges na thams cad 'dzin par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te rgyu las nges na thams cad 'dzin par mi 'gyur te /
translated: If they were determined by cause, then all would be apprehended.

original: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa dag rgyu las nges pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa dag rgyu las nges pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the apprehended object and apprehending subject would be determined by cause.

original: gang gis so sor nges pa nyid 'dzin par byed pa'i 'dzin pa 'di 'dra ba'am /
analyzed: gang gis so sor nges pa nyid 'dzin par byed pa'i 'dzin pa 'di 'dra ba'am /
translated: The opponent says: This apprehending subject is like that which causes determination as distinct,

original: gang gis de nyid kyis gzung bar 'gyur ba'i gzung ba'am /
analyzed: gang gis de nyid kyis gzung bar 'gyur ba'i gzung ba'am /
translated: or that which is apprehended by that, the apprehended object,

original: yang na gnyi ga yang mig las nges par 'gyur ba yin no zhes pha rol po dag brjod do //
analyzed: yang na gnyi ga yang mig las nges par 'gyur ba yin no zhes pha rol po dag brjod do //
translated: or else both are determined by the eye.

original: de ni mi rung ste /
analyzed: de ni mi rung ste /
translated: That is not tenable.

original: 'di ltar / shes la rtogs pa 'di yang med //
analyzed: 'di ltar / shes la rtogs pa 'di yang med //
translated: Thus: There is no such realization in consciousness.

original: so sor nges par 'dzin na rtogs pa 'dis 'grub pa ma yin no //üîΩdes na rang @87b gi ngo bo nyid du thal bas na de rang gi rgyu la rag las pa yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: so sor nges par 'dzin na rtogs pa 'dis 'grub pa ma yin no // des na rang @87b gi ngo bo nyid du thal bas na de rang gi rgyu la rag las pa yin pa'i phyir /
translated: If there were determination as distinct, this realization would not be established.

original: phan tshun gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i dngos po ni ma yin te /
analyzed: phan tshun gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i dngos po ni ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, because of the consequence that it would exist by its own intrinsic reality, it is not the case that the mutual relationship of apprehended object and apprehending subject exists, because it is dependent on its own cause.

original: dus mtshungs par skyes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dus mtshungs par skyes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they are produced at the same time.

original: gang la rag las nas gzung ba dang 'dzin par 'gyur ba gzung ba dang 'dzin pa ni de nyid kyi yin no zhes rigs so //
analyzed: gang la rag las nas gzung ba dang 'dzin par 'gyur ba gzung ba dang 'dzin pa ni de nyid kyi yin no zhes rigs so //
translated: It is reasonable to say that the apprehended object and apprehending subject belong to that which is dependent on them, since the apprehended object and apprehending subject are dependent on them.

original: myong bar 'gyur ba'i rang bzhin las gzung ba dang 'dzin pa nyid gzhan ni med do //
analyzed: myong bar 'gyur ba'i rang bzhin las gzung ba dang 'dzin pa nyid gzhan ni med do //
translated: The apprehended object and apprehending subject do not exist separately from the nature of experience.

original: 'o na ji ltar bdag ni 'dzin par byed pa'o //
analyzed: 'o na ji ltar bdag ni 'dzin par byed pa'o //
translated: How is it understood that the self is the apprehender,

original: 'di ni nga'i gzung ba'o zhes rtogs she na /
analyzed: 'di ni nga'i gzung ba'o zhes rtogs she na /
translated: and this is the apprehended object of the self?

original: ma yin te des gzhan pa'i 'brel pa mi snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma yin te des gzhan pa'i 'brel pa mi snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: No, because the connection with something else is not evident.

original: 'di ni thog ma med pa'i bag chags la rag las pa can gyi rtog pa tsam 'ga' zhig tu zad do //
analyzed: 'di ni thog ma med pa'i bag chags la rag las pa can gyi rtog pa tsam 'ga' zhig tu zad do //
translated: This is simply a conception that is dependent on beginningless latent impressions.

original: de skad du yang /
analyzed: de skad du yang /
translated: As it is said:

original: byed dang bcas pa lta bur snang //
analyzed: byed dang bcas pa lta bur snang //
translated: It appears as if it has an agent.

original: zhes bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bshad pa yin no //
translated: This is the explanation.

original: des na rang gi ngo bo rang gi rgyu las nges pa'i phyir ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i dngos po ma yin no //
analyzed: des na rang gi ngo bo rang gi rgyu las nges pa'i phyir ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i dngos po ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, since its own nature is determined from its own cause, it is not the entity of the apprehended object and apprehending subject.

original: 'on te rgyu dang 'bras bu rang gi rgyu las nges pa yin na /
analyzed: 'on te rgyu dang 'bras bu rang gi rgyu las nges pa yin na /
translated: If the cause and effect are determined from their own cause,

original: de'i tshe yang gal te de dag las so sor nges pa'i bdag nyid kyi 'bras bu bskyed pas gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i dngos po ji ltar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i tshe yang gal te de dag las so sor nges pa'i bdag nyid kyi 'bras bu bskyed pas gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i dngos po ji ltar 'gyur te /
translated: In that case, how could there be the things of the object and subject, since they generate effects that are determined individually?

original: lhan cig byed pa'i dngos po tsam nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: lhan cig byed pa'i dngos po tsam nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: They would be mere things that are co-originating.

original: de tsam gyis ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i dngos po ma yin no //
analyzed: de tsam gyis ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i dngos po ma yin no //
translated: But that much is not the thing of the object and subject.

original: yang na / shes pa rtogs pa 'di yang med //üîΩces bya ba ni gang gi tshe shes pa gzhan nam /
analyzed: yang na / shes pa rtogs pa 'di yang med // ces bya ba ni gang gi tshe shes pa gzhan nam /
translated: Moreover, this cognition of cognition does not exist.

original: mngon sum gyis gzung ba ma yin de'i tshe ci shes pa gnyis su mnyam pa yin nam /
analyzed: mngon sum gyis gzung ba ma yin de'i tshe ci shes pa gnyis su mnyam pa yin nam /
translated: When cognition is not apprehended by another cognition or by direct perception, then what is the cognition of the two?

original: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa ni rgyu las byung ba yin na /
analyzed: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa ni rgyu las byung ba yin na /
translated: If the thing of the object and subject arises from a cause,

original: gnyis dus mnyam par mi 'dod do //
analyzed: gnyis dus mnyam par mi 'dod do //
translated: the two are not asserted to be simultaneous.

original: dus mnyam pa nyid ma yin na yang de las gzhan dang gzhan yang dus mnyam par 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: dus mnyam pa nyid ma yin na yang de las gzhan dang gzhan yang dus mnyam par 'gyur zhing /
translated: If they are not simultaneous, then something else would be simultaneous with it.

original: de las gzhan dang yang 'gyur bas shes pa rnams mtha' yas pa kho nar 'gyur na don yang de'i tshe 'dzin par 'gyur na 'dod pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: de las gzhan dang yang 'gyur bas shes pa rnams mtha' yas pa kho nar 'gyur na don yang de'i tshe 'dzin par 'gyur na 'dod pa yang ma yin no //
translated: If it were otherwise, consciousness would be infinite, and it would also apprehend objects at that time, but that is unacceptable.

original: dang po gzung ba ma yin na ni phyis kyang 'gyur ba ma yin te /
analyzed: dang po gzung ba ma yin na ni phyis kyang 'gyur ba ma yin te /
translated: If it does not apprehend objects at first, it will not do so later,

original: de'i rnag bzhin ma rtogs par thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i rnag bzhin ma rtogs par thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would follow that the aspect of that object would not be realized.

original: sngar yang gzung ba'i rnag bzhin nyid do zhe na /
analyzed: sngar yang gzung ba'i rnag bzhin nyid do zhe na /
translated: If it is said that it is the aspect of the object that is apprehended at first,

original: sngar yang gzung bar thal lo //
analyzed: sngar yang gzung bar thal lo //
translated: then it would follow that it is apprehended at first.

original: yin mod ci skyon zhe na /
analyzed: yin mod ci skyon zhe na /
translated: What is wrong with that?

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: It is not so,

original: sngar yang 'dzin par byed pa yod par thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sngar yang 'dzin par byed pa yod par thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would follow that the apprehender would exist at first.

original: gal te mig la sogs pa'i tshogs pa nyid kyi dbang gis bskyed pa yin na ni /
analyzed: gal te mig la sogs pa'i tshogs pa nyid kyi dbang gis bskyed pa yin na ni /
translated: If it is generated by the power of the assembly of eye and so on,

original: gzung ba'i rnam pa de shes pa @88a * //
analyzed: gzung ba'i rnam pa de shes pa @88a * //
translated: then the aspect of the object would be consciousness,

original: nyid du 'gyur gyi don nyid ni ma yin te /
analyzed: nyid du 'gyur gyi don nyid ni ma yin te /
translated: but it would not be the object,

original: de lta bu yang don yin na ni 'dzin pa'i rnam pa la yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bu yang don yin na ni 'dzin pa'i rnam pa la yang 'gyur ro //
translated: because if that were an object, it would also be the aspect of the apprehender.

original: 'on te de don ni sngar yod pa'i phyir dang 'dzin pa'i rnam pa ni gzhan du 'gyur ba yin pa'i phyir de lta bu ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te de don ni sngar yod pa'i phyir dang 'dzin pa'i rnam pa ni gzhan du 'gyur ba yin pa'i phyir de lta bu ma yin no zhe na /
translated: But if you say that the object is not like that because it exists previously and the aspect of apprehension changes,

original: sngar yod pa ni 'dzin par mi 'gyur ro zhes bshad zin to ;
analyzed: sngar yod pa ni 'dzin par mi 'gyur ro zhes bshad zin to ;
translated: we have already explained that what exists previously is not apprehended.

original: / rtogs pa yin na thams cad rtogs par thal lo zhes bshad zin to //
analyzed: / rtogs pa yin na thams cad rtogs par thal lo zhes bshad zin to //
translated: And we have already explained that if it is a realization, it follows that everything would be realized.

original: 'o na ji ltar don du rtog ce na /
analyzed: 'o na ji ltar don du rtog ce na /
translated: But how is the object conceived?

original: gzhan gyi lta ba la ltos so zhes bshad zin to //
analyzed: gzhan gyi lta ba la ltos so zhes bshad zin to //
translated: We have already explained that it is in dependence on the view of others.

original: de nyid kyi phyir bshad pa /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir bshad pa /
translated: Thus it is said:

original: des byas shes pa de med kyang //üîΩdon du snang ba nyid kyi phyir //
analyzed: des byas shes pa de med kyang // don du snang ba nyid kyi phyir //
translated: Even though that consciousness is not produced by it,üîΩit is said to manifest that object

original: de gsal ba zhes brjod pa yin no//
analyzed: de gsal ba zhes brjod pa yin no//
translated: because it appears as the object.

original: don med kyang de'i rnam par snang ba'i phyir na snang ngo zhes bya ba'i tha snyad du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: don med kyang de'i rnam par snang ba'i phyir na snang ngo zhes bya ba'i tha snyad du 'gyur ro //
translated: Even though the object does not exist, it is said to appear because it appears in the aspect of that object.

original: rang ngam gzhan gyis mthong ba ni rjes su dpag pa las rtogs pa'i phyir don yod do zhes rnam par gnas na /
analyzed: rang ngam gzhan gyis mthong ba ni rjes su dpag pa las rtogs pa'i phyir don yod do zhes rnam par gnas na /
translated: If you maintain that the object exists because it is perceived by oneself or another, it is understood through inference.

original: de las de'i rnam pa can gyi shes pa skye bas na gzung ba zhes rigs kyi /
analyzed: de las de'i rnam pa can gyi shes pa skye bas na gzung ba zhes rigs kyi /
translated: And because a consciousness having its aspect is produced from that, it is called the apprehended object.

original: de med par skye ba'i shes pa ni 'khrul pa nyid do zhes bya bar gnas so //
analyzed: de med par skye ba'i shes pa ni 'khrul pa nyid do zhes bya bar gnas so //
translated: The consciousness that is produced without that is just an error.

original: don dam par ni rjes dpag pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: don dam par ni rjes dpag pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: But in reality, there is no inference.

original: rjes dpag 'jug pa thams cad ni //
analyzed: rjes dpag 'jug pa thams cad ni //
translated: All the operations of inference

original: mngon sum sngon du 'gro ba can //
analyzed: mngon sum sngon du 'gro ba can //
translated: are preceded by perception.

original: gal te mngon sum rjes dpag la //
analyzed: gal te mngon sum rjes dpag la //
translated: If perception and inference

original: ltos nas phan tshun rten pa yin //üîΩji srid rjes su dpag pa tshad ma ma yin pa de srid du phyi'i don la mngon sum tshad mar mi 'jug go //
analyzed: ltos nas phan tshun rten pa yin // ji srid rjes su dpag pa tshad ma ma yin pa de srid du phyi'i don la mngon sum tshad mar mi 'jug go //
translated: are mutually dependent,üîΩas long as inference is not a valid cognition, perception does not engage in the valid knowledge of external objects.

original: mngon sum tshad ma ma yin par yang rjes dpag 'jug pa ma yin te /
analyzed: mngon sum tshad ma ma yin par yang rjes dpag 'jug pa ma yin te /
translated: And if perception is not a valid cognition, inference does not engage.

original: de mngon sum du 'gro ba can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de mngon sum du 'gro ba can yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is directed toward perception.

original: de lta ma yin na ni long ba brgyud pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na ni long ba brgyud pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: Otherwise, it would be like a series of blind men.

original: de'i phyir don dam par ni rang rig pa'i rang bzhin nyid myong ba yin gyi don ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir don dam par ni rang rig pa'i rang bzhin nyid myong ba yin gyi don ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, in reality, it is reflexive awareness that is the nature of experience, not an object.

original: khas blangs nas de ltar bshad pa yin te /
analyzed: khas blangs nas de ltar bshad pa yin te /
translated: I have explained it in that way after having accepted it.üîΩ

original: thams cad de kho na nyid rnam par gzhag pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: thams cad de kho na nyid rnam par gzhag pa ni ma yin no //
translated: We do accept that, but we do not say that all objects are posited as such.

original: des na don sngar yod pas rnam pa gang skyed par byed pa de gzung ba yin no //üîΩlhan cig byed pa'i don gzhan ni //üîΩphan 'dogs min phyir rnam mi byed //
analyzed: des na don sngar yod pas rnam pa gang skyed par byed pa de gzung ba yin no // lhan cig byed pa'i don gzhan ni // phan 'dogs min phyir rnam mi byed //
translated: Therefore, since the object exists previously, the aspect that is produced is the apprehended object.üîΩThe other meaning of the term ‚Äúcooperating condition‚Äù is not the object of cognition.

original: lhan cig byed pa'i don gyi bdag nyid de ni shes pa'i gzung ba ma yin te /üîΩrang gi rgyu las de ltar skyes pa des phan 'dogs pa med pa'i phyir na /
analyzed: lhan cig byed pa'i don gyi bdag nyid de ni shes pa'i gzung ba ma yin te / rang gi rgyu las de ltar skyes pa des phan 'dogs pa med pa'i phyir na /
translated: It is not the object of cognition, because it is not the cause of the aspect of the cognition.

original: de'i rnam pa can gyi shes pa mi bskyed pa'i phyir ro //üîΩdes na / shes la rang gi ngo bo yis //
analyzed: de'i rnam pa can gyi shes pa mi bskyed pa'i phyir ro // des na / shes la rang gi ngo bo yis //
translated: It is not the cause of the aspect of the cognition, because it does not assist the cognition.üîΩHow can the cognition be differentiated by its own nature?

original: rnam 'byed mi gsal ji ltar 'gyur //
analyzed: rnam 'byed mi gsal ji ltar 'gyur //
translated: How can it be unclear?

original: don gyi bdag nyid @88b lkog tu gyur pa ni /
analyzed: don gyi bdag nyid @88b lkog tu gyur pa ni /
translated: The nature of the object is hidden.

original: de'i rnam pa can gyi shes pa skyed par byed pa nyid du gnas pa dang rang gi ngo bos rig pa ma yin pa yin pa'i phyir de'i rnam pa can gyi shes pa rig pa nyid kyis rig pa yin te /
analyzed: de'i rnam pa can gyi shes pa skyed par byed pa nyid du gnas pa dang rang gi ngo bos rig pa ma yin pa yin pa'i phyir de'i rnam pa can gyi shes pa rig pa nyid kyis rig pa yin te /
translated: Because it is the cause that generates consciousness that has its aspect, and because it is not intrinsically aware, consciousness that has its aspect is aware by virtue of being aware of that.

original: des na gsal ba nyid yin no //
analyzed: des na gsal ba nyid yin no //
translated: Therefore it is clear.

original: rang gi rgyu'i nus pa las gsal ba nyid yin na ni /
analyzed: rang gi rgyu'i nus pa las gsal ba nyid yin na ni /
translated: If it is clear by the power of the potential of its cause,

original: de la dus mtshungs par byung ba gzhan gyis ci yang byas pa med pa'i phyir te de ltar rig na de'i dbang tsam gyis 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: de la dus mtshungs par byung ba gzhan gyis ci yang byas pa med pa'i phyir te de ltar rig na de'i dbang tsam gyis 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: then it is clear because nothing else that arises at the same time as it does anything to it. If it is understood in this way, it is clear by the power of that alone.üîΩIf the aspect that does not exist at the time of consciousness is not intrinsically aware, then it is clear that consciousness is the aspect of that.

original: shes pa la sos pa'i dus su med pa rnam pa rang gi ngo bos rig pa ma yin pa dang / des na zhugs kyi de la shes pa de'i rnam pa can du yang rtogs par 'gyur mod rdo rje dang rdo la sogs pa brten pa'i don gang yin pa de kho na rang gi ngo bos ji ltar 'thad ce na /
analyzed: shes pa la sos pa'i dus su med pa rnam pa rang gi ngo bos rig pa ma yin pa dang / des na zhugs kyi de la shes pa de'i rnam pa can du yang rtogs par 'gyur mod rdo rje dang rdo la sogs pa brten pa'i don gang yin pa de kho na rang gi ngo bos ji ltar 'thad ce na /
translated: But how is it tenable that the object that is the basis of consciousness is intrinsically clear?

original: de yang gyi na ste /
analyzed: de yang gyi na ste /
translated: That is not so.

original: 'di ltar / brtan gang rdo rje rngo sogs kyi //
analyzed: 'di ltar / brtan gang rdo rje rngo sogs kyi //
translated: The stability of the vajra and so forth

original: don yang gzhan la ltos med phyir //
analyzed: don yang gzhan la ltos med phyir //
translated: is also independent of other objects.

original: 'gro ba kun gyi shes pa ni //
analyzed: 'gro ba kun gyi shes pa ni //
translated: The consciousness of all beings

original: gcig par rang nyid skye bar 'gyur //
analyzed: gcig par rang nyid skye bar 'gyur //
translated: would arise as a single thing.

original: dus kyi cha'i khyon khyab pa ni rtag pa dang brtan pa zhes brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: dus kyi cha'i khyon khyab pa ni rtag pa dang brtan pa zhes brjod pa yin no //
translated: The pervasiveness of the dimension of time is called permanent and stable.

original: gal te de'i rang bzhin de nyid yin na ni de'i tshe de'i rnam pa mtha' dag rang gis bdag gir byed pa'i myong bas de mthar thug pa dang bcas pa 'dzin pa'i phyir na /
analyzed: gal te de'i rang bzhin de nyid yin na ni de'i tshe de'i rnam pa mtha' dag rang gis bdag gir byed pa'i myong bas de mthar thug pa dang bcas pa 'dzin pa'i phyir na /
translated: If that is its nature, then at that time, since the experience that appropriates all of its aspects holds it to be finite,

original: shes pa gcig dus nyid du yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir rtag pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: shes pa gcig dus nyid du yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir rtag pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: because consciousness is completely perfected in a single moment, it would not be permanent.

original: de nyid kyi tshe yongs su rdzogs pa ni rtag pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: de nyid kyi tshe yongs su rdzogs pa ni rtag pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: At that time, what is completely perfected would not become what is called permanent.

original: dus kyi cha mtha' dag mthong ba ni dus ring bar mi 'gyur la /
analyzed: dus kyi cha mtha' dag mthong ba ni dus ring bar mi 'gyur la /
translated: Seeing all the parts of time would not be a long time.

original: dpyid la sogs pa'i dus gcig pa nyid du yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dpyid la sogs pa'i dus gcig pa nyid du yang 'gyur ro //
translated: Spring and so forth would be the same time.

original: shes pa gcig nyid la yang nyes pa 'di yod do //
analyzed: shes pa gcig nyid la yang nyes pa 'di yod do //
translated: This fault also applies to the cognition of a single moment.

original: rim gyis 'byung ba'i dus kyi cha rnams cig car ji ltar 'dzin zhe na /
analyzed: rim gyis 'byung ba'i dus kyi cha rnams cig car ji ltar 'dzin zhe na /
translated: How can the parts of a temporal stage that occur in sequence be apprehended simultaneously?

original: mi 'dzin na 'o na 'di dus khyab pa ma yin pa'i phyir na ji ltar rtags nyid yin /
analyzed: mi 'dzin na 'o na 'di dus khyab pa ma yin pa'i phyir na ji ltar rtags nyid yin /
translated: If they are not apprehended, then how can that be a sign, since it does not pervade the temporal stage?

original: de'i phyir gal te 'di gcig yin na /
analyzed: de'i phyir gal te 'di gcig yin na /
translated: Therefore, if it is one,

original: de lta bu nyid du gcig par 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bu nyid du gcig par 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
translated: it would be apprehended as just that one.

original: 'on te rgyu gzhan la ltos nas rig pa gzhan dang gzhan skye bas na rim gyis 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te rgyu gzhan la ltos nas rig pa gzhan dang gzhan skye bas na rim gyis 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: But if it is a different cognition that arises in dependence on a different cause, then it would be sequential.

original: de yang mi rigs te /
analyzed: de yang mi rigs te /
translated: That also is not reasonable.

original: ltos pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ltos pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not dependent.

original: rang gi rgyu las skyes pa'i rang bzhin gcig po ni de'i ngo bor 'gyur ba gzhan la ltos pa yin no //
analyzed: rang gi rgyu las skyes pa'i rang bzhin gcig po ni de'i ngo bor 'gyur ba gzhan la ltos pa yin no //
translated: The single nature that arises from its own cause is its essence, which does not depend on another.

original: 'on te phyis nyid yul du 'gyur ba gang yin pa gzhan gyis mthong bar 'gyur ba nyid ni phyis 'byung ba yin no zhe na /
