analyzed: 'on te phyis nyid yul du 'gyur ba gang yin pa gzhan gyis mthong bar 'gyur ba nyid ni phyis 'byung ba yin no zhe na /
translated: But if it is said that what becomes the object later is seen by another that arises later,

original: @89a * // 'on te de'i tshe mi rtag pa nyid do zhes bshad pa ni /
analyzed: @89a * // 'on te de'i tshe mi rtag pa nyid do zhes bshad pa ni /
translated: then if it is said that it is impermanent at that time,

original: lhan cig byed pas phan 'dogs phyir //
analyzed: lhan cig byed pas phan 'dogs phyir //
translated: Because they assist by being co-existent

original: 'di yi de dag rim 'byung na //
analyzed: 'di yi de dag rim 'byung na //
translated: If they arise in sequence,

original: skad cig so sor gzhan yin brjod //
analyzed: skad cig so sor gzhan yin brjod //
translated: They are said to be different in each moment.

original: 'dir yang skyon te sngar bzhin no //
analyzed: 'dir yang skyon te sngar bzhin no //
translated: Here too, the error is the same as before.

original: gal te mig la sogs pa'i lhan cig byed pa'i rim gyis rnam par shes pa de dag rim gyis 'byung ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te mig la sogs pa'i lhan cig byed pa'i rim gyis rnam par shes pa de dag rim gyis 'byung ba yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that the consciousnesses that arise from the eyes and so on arise in sequence because their co-existent causes arise in sequence,

original: de lta yin na shes pa rnams rim gyis 'byung na /
analyzed: de lta yin na shes pa rnams rim gyis 'byung na /
translated: then if the consciousnesses arise in sequence,

original: des blta bar bya ba nyid kyang rim gyis 'byung ste /
analyzed: des blta bar bya ba nyid kyang rim gyis 'byung ste /
translated: the object of consciousness would also arise in sequence.

original: shes pa med par ni dngos po blta bar bya ba nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: shes pa med par ni dngos po blta bar bya ba nyid ma yin no //
translated: Without consciousness, an object cannot be an object of consciousness.

original: blta bar bya ba nyid shes pa dang dus mnyam pa nyid yin na yang snga ma dang phyi ma'i rang bzhin ma yin te /
analyzed: blta bar bya ba nyid shes pa dang dus mnyam pa nyid yin na yang snga ma dang phyi ma'i rang bzhin ma yin te /
translated: If the object of consciousness were simultaneous with consciousness, it would not be the object of a previous or subsequent consciousness,

original: shes pa de lta bu ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shes pa de lta bu ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would not be a consciousness of that kind.

original: des na shes pa bzhin du skad cig so so tha dad pas na rang gi rgyun snga ma las 'byung ba'i rgyu la rag las pa'am gzhan du 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: des na shes pa bzhin du skad cig so so tha dad pas na rang gi rgyun snga ma las 'byung ba'i rgyu la rag las pa'am gzhan du 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, like consciousness, it is different in every moment. Thus, it is dependent on the cause that arises from its own continuum, or it is different.

original: des na 'dir yang skyon snga ma bzhin du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na 'dir yang skyon snga ma bzhin du 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, the previous error would also apply here.

original: 'on te mig la sogs pa'i rgyus nye bar bsgrub pa rnam par ma chad pa gcig nyid yin no //
analyzed: 'on te mig la sogs pa'i rgyus nye bar bsgrub pa rnam par ma chad pa gcig nyid yin no //
translated: But if the cause of the eye, etc., is a single, uninterrupted accomplishment,

original: des na de rnam par ma chad pas ma chad par 'gyur ba'i gzung ba nyid gcig nyid de /
analyzed: des na de rnam par ma chad pas ma chad par 'gyur ba'i gzung ba nyid gcig nyid de /
translated: then because it is uninterrupted, the object of apprehension would be a single, uninterrupted entity.

original: de'i phyir na rdo rje dang rdo ba la sogs pa ni rtag pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de'i phyir na rdo rje dang rdo ba la sogs pa ni rtag pa yin no zhe na /
translated: Therefore, a diamond, a stone, etc., are permanent.

original: de ni med de /
analyzed: de ni med de /
translated: That is not so.

original: rnam chad med par rdo rje dang rdo la sogs pa la yang tshad skye min /
analyzed: rnam chad med par rdo rje dang rdo la sogs pa la yang tshad skye min /
translated: A measure of a diamond, a stone, etc., does not arise without interruption.

original: rnam pa kun du ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: rnam pa kun du ma yin zhe na /
translated: If it is not in every way,

original: rnam chad med 'di gang gis rtogs //
analyzed: rnam chad med 'di gang gis rtogs //
translated: how is this non-interruption understood?

original: gang gi tshe rnam par chad pa med pa de'i tshe yang mthar thug pa'i mtshams tshun chad rtogs par thal lo zhes bshad zin to //
analyzed: gang gi tshe rnam par chad pa med pa de'i tshe yang mthar thug pa'i mtshams tshun chad rtogs par thal lo zhes bshad zin to //
translated: This has already been explained.

original: des na rdo rje dang rdo ba la sogs pa la yang mtshungs pa nyid do //
analyzed: des na rdo rje dang rdo ba la sogs pa la yang mtshungs pa nyid do //
translated: Therefore, it is the same for a diamond, a stone, and so on.

original: de'i phyir yod pa ma yin pa'i sgra la sogs pa rnams rtogs pa dang 'brel pa'i phyir na /
analyzed: de'i phyir yod pa ma yin pa'i sgra la sogs pa rnams rtogs pa dang 'brel pa'i phyir na /
translated: Therefore, since non-existent sounds and so on are related to cognition,

original: rnam par shes pa yul gyi rnam pa can yin no zhes bya bar grub po //üîΩslob dpon gyis kyang /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa yul gyi rnam pa can yin no zhes bya bar grub po // slob dpon gyis kyang /
translated: it is established that consciousness has the aspect of the object.üîΩThe master [DignƒÅga] also proves this:

original: dus phyis dran pa las kyang ste //
analyzed: dus phyis dran pa las kyang ste //
translated: Also from memory,

original: de ni shes pa med pa min //
analyzed: de ni shes pa med pa min //
translated: it is not that there is no cognition.

original: zhes bsgrubs pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bsgrubs pa yin no //
translated: This is the proof.

original: de bshad pa ni dran pa las kyang tshul gnyis grub /
analyzed: de bshad pa ni dran pa las kyang tshul gnyis grub /
translated: The explanation of that is: The two modes are established from memory.

original: ci ste rig par bya ba dang rig par byed pa'i rang bzhin gyis tshul gnyis yin gyi /
analyzed: ci ste rig par bya ba dang rig par byed pa'i rang bzhin gyis tshul gnyis yin gyi /
translated: If you think that the meaning of the text is that the two modes are the nature of the object of cognition and the cognizer,

original: yul gyi rnam pa nyid kyis ni ma yin no zhes bya ba gzhung gi don yin no snyam na de ni mi rigs te /
analyzed: yul gyi rnam pa nyid kyis ni ma yin no zhes bya ba gzhung gi don yin no snyam na de ni mi rigs te /
translated: but not by the aspect of the object itself, that is unreasonable.

original: yul shes de de shes pa yi //
analyzed: yul shes de de shes pa yi //
translated: The difference between the object and the cognition of that object

original: bye brag las ni tshul gnyis nyid //
analyzed: bye brag las ni tshul gnyis nyid //
translated: is the basis for the two modes.

original: ces bya ba'i @89b skabs yin na /
analyzed: ces bya ba'i @89b skabs yin na /
translated: This is the context.

original: de yang yul gyi rnam pa bsgrub pa'i skabs yin no //
analyzed: de yang yul gyi rnam pa bsgrub pa'i skabs yin no //
translated: And this is the context for establishing the aspect of the object.üîΩHow do we know that consciousness has two modes?

original: rnam par shes pa tshul gnyis pa zhes ji ltar shes she gang gi phyir /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa tshul gnyis pa zhes ji ltar shes she gang gi phyir /
translated: Because there is no dispute

original: de bdag nyid kyis myong ba la //üîΩrtsod pa 'ga' yin te /
analyzed: de bdag nyid kyis myong ba la // rtsod pa 'ga' yin te /
translated: about the experience of that.

original: rang snang ba dang yul snang ba'o //
analyzed: rang snang ba dang yul snang ba'o //
translated: There is a dispute about the appearance of the object,

original: de la yul snang ba nyid la 'dod pa chen po yod pa yin te gang gi phyir /
analyzed: de la yul snang ba nyid la 'dod pa chen po yod pa yin te gang gi phyir /
translated: because there is great disagreement about the appearance of the object.üîΩBecause there is no dispute

original: de bdag nyid kyis myong ba la //üîΩrtsod pa 'ga' yang yod ma yin //
analyzed: de bdag nyid kyis myong ba la // rtsod pa 'ga' yang yod ma yin //
translated: about the experience of that.

original: de don rnag bzhin nyid ma grub //
analyzed: de don rnag bzhin nyid ma grub //
translated: The object is not established as it appears.

original: de la yang dag dran pa grub //
analyzed: de la yang dag dran pa grub //
translated: The memory of it is established.

original: myong ba la yang rtsod pa yod pa ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: myong ba la yang rtsod pa yod pa ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: Isn‚Äôt there a dispute about experience?

original: de ni ma yin te /üîΩming tsam la bsams nas 'di skad bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: de ni ma yin te / ming tsam la bsams nas 'di skad bshad pa yin no //
translated: No, there isn‚Äôt.üîΩThis is explained in terms of mere names.

original: rang rig pa ni bsgrub par bya ba 'di rigs pa yin no //
analyzed: rang rig pa ni bsgrub par bya ba 'di rigs pa yin no //
translated: It is reasonable to establish reflexive awareness.

original: de ltar yang rang gis myong bar bya ba nyid dam zhes phyis bsgrubs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar yang rang gis myong bar bya ba nyid dam zhes phyis bsgrubs par 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, it would be established later that it is just the experience of itself.

original: des na rang rig pa ma gtogs pa'i myong ba tsam nyid la rtsod pa med do zhes bya ba 'di yin no //
analyzed: des na rang rig pa ma gtogs pa'i myong ba tsam nyid la rtsod pa med do zhes bya ba 'di yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is just the experience itself, apart from reflexive awareness, that is not disputed.

original: de'i don gyi rnam pa la ni rtsod pa yod pa yin te /
analyzed: de'i don gyi rnam pa la ni rtsod pa yod pa yin te /
translated: But there is a dispute about the aspect of its object.

original: de ni ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: That is not established.

original: de'i rnam pa de yang yang dag par dran zhes bya ba rnam par phye nas dran pa las grub pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i rnam pa de yang yang dag par dran zhes bya ba rnam par phye nas dran pa las grub pa yin no //
translated: That aspect of it is remembered, it is established through analysis.

original: rnam pa med pa la yang rnam par phye nas dran pa 'thad pa nyid ma yin nam /
analyzed: rnam pa med pa la yang rnam par phye nas dran pa 'thad pa nyid ma yin nam /
translated: Isn‚Äôt it the case that it is possible to remember something that has no aspect?

original: de ji ltar na ma nges pa las don grub ce na /
analyzed: de ji ltar na ma nges pa las don grub ce na /
translated: How can you establish the meaning of that from something that is indefinite?

original: de ni med de /üîΩ'di ltar / 'di ni phan tshun khyad par du //
analyzed: de ni med de / 'di ltar / 'di ni phan tshun khyad par du //
translated: That is not so.üîΩThus:üîΩThe memory of the object of experience

original: dran pa brjod par 'dod pa yin //
analyzed: dran pa brjod par 'dod pa yin //
translated: is asserted to be distinguished from each other.

original: gsal ba tha dad med pa 'di //
analyzed: gsal ba tha dad med pa 'di //
translated: This clarity that is not different

original: med par gtan tshigs nyid du brjod //
analyzed: med par gtan tshigs nyid du brjod //
translated: is stated to be the reason for its nonexistence.üîΩThus:

original: 'di ltar / rang spyod yul gyis phye med cing //
analyzed: 'di ltar / rang spyod yul gyis phye med cing //
translated: It is not distinguished by its own domain.

original: tha dad par myong med de la //
analyzed: tha dad par myong med de la //
translated: But they are not experienced as different.

original: 'di ni 'di lta 'di ltar ni //
analyzed: 'di ni 'di lta 'di ltar ni //
translated: ‚ÄúIt is like this, not like that‚Äù

original: min zhes tha dad 'di med 'gyur //
analyzed: min zhes tha dad 'di med 'gyur //
translated: ‚Äîthis distinction would not exist.

original: nyams su myong ba tsam gyis ni //
analyzed: nyams su myong ba tsam gyis ni //
translated: By mere experience,

original: tha dad 'ga' zhig rnam 'byed min ;
analyzed: tha dad 'ga' zhig rnam 'byed min ;
translated: no distinction whatsoever is made.

original: / tha dad gsal ba med pa la //
analyzed: / tha dad gsal ba med pa la //
translated: Without a distinct manifestation,

original: rnam 'byed blo med 'tshe stsogs bzhin //
analyzed: rnam 'byed blo med 'tshe stsogs bzhin //
translated: there is no discerning cognition, just as with pain, etc.

original: gal te myong ba de sngon po la sogs pa'i rnam pa so sor nges pa yongs su gsal ba las nyes par bsgyur ba'i dbang gis rnam par phye ba mi skye na /
analyzed: gal te myong ba de sngon po la sogs pa'i rnam pa so sor nges pa yongs su gsal ba las nyes par bsgyur ba'i dbang gis rnam par phye ba mi skye na /
translated: If the memory of the experience of blue, etc., does not arise from the distinct ascertainment of the individual aspects of blue, etc.,

original: de'i tshe rnam par phye nas dran par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe rnam par phye nas dran par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: then at that time there would be no memory of the distinction.

original: 'on te tshogs pa'i khyad par las gdon mi za bar 'ga' zhig tu 'gyur ba yin pas na de nyid las tha dad par dran pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te tshogs pa'i khyad par las gdon mi za bar 'ga' zhig tu 'gyur ba yin pas na de nyid las tha dad par dran pa yin no zhe na /
translated: But if it is from the special collection of causes that it definitely arises in some cases, then it is memory of that very thing, distinct from the experience.

original: de ni mi rung ste /
analyzed: de ni mi rung ste /
translated: That is not correct.

original: gang gi phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir /
translated: Because

original: nyams su myong ba tsam las ni //
analyzed: nyams su myong ba tsam las ni //
translated: by mere experience,

original: tshogs pa'i khyad par las byung bar //
analyzed: tshogs pa'i khyad par las byung bar //
translated: from the special collection of causes,

original: rjes su dpag par bya'i bdag nyid dran pa'i rgyu mtshan du 'gyur ba ma yin @90a * //
analyzed: rjes su dpag par bya'i bdag nyid dran pa'i rgyu mtshan du 'gyur ba ma yin @90a * //
translated: It is not a cause of memory of the self, which is to be inferred,

original: te ; tha dad pa gsal ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: te ; tha dad pa gsal ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no manifestation of a different thing.

original: mi gsal ba'i tha dad pa nyid las kyang mche ba la sogs pa dag la rnam par 'byed pa par 'byed pa dang ldan pa'i dran pa 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: mi gsal ba'i tha dad pa nyid las kyang mche ba la sogs pa dag la rnam par 'byed pa par 'byed pa dang ldan pa'i dran pa 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: And from the difference of the indistinct, there is no memory of the teeth, etc., which is distinguished by the distinction of the one who distinguishes.

original: 'on te de la 'khrul pa med pa'i phyir yul la yang nyams su myong ngo zhes de dran pa yin no ;
analyzed: 'on te de la 'khrul pa med pa'i phyir yul la yang nyams su myong ngo zhes de dran pa yin no ;
translated: But if it is said that it is memory because the object is experienced, since there is no error in that,

original: / des na rang nyid tha dad pa med kyang de tha dad nyid las tha dad par dran pa'i yul du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: / des na rang nyid tha dad pa med kyang de tha dad nyid las tha dad par dran pa'i yul du 'gyur ro //
translated: then, although it is not different from itself, it becomes the object of memory by the difference of that.

original: mtshe ma dag la yang gang gi tshe mi 'dra ba'i dbyig pa la sogs pa dag dang len pa de'i tshe khyad par du nye bar mtshon par 'gyur ba nyid do //
analyzed: mtshe ma dag la yang gang gi tshe mi 'dra ba'i dbyig pa la sogs pa dag dang len pa de'i tshe khyad par du nye bar mtshon par 'gyur ba nyid do //
translated: And in the case of twins, when they take up different objects, such as a stick, then they are distinguished by the difference of the object.

original: dper na yul gyi dbang gis myong ba rtag pa de bzhin du dran par 'gyur ba las kyang yin no //
analyzed: dper na yul gyi dbang gis myong ba rtag pa de bzhin du dran par 'gyur ba las kyang yin no //
translated: For example, just as experience is permanent by the power of the object, so also is memory.

original: des na rnam par shes pa dran no zhes tha snyad du byed do zhe na /
analyzed: des na rnam par shes pa dran no zhes tha snyad du byed do zhe na /
translated: Therefore, it is conventionally said that consciousness remembers.

original: de ni mi legs te /
analyzed: de ni mi legs te /
translated: This is not good.

original: yul gyi rnam pa nyid med par ji ltar yul ni dran par 'gyur /
analyzed: yul gyi rnam pa nyid med par ji ltar yul ni dran par 'gyur /
translated: How can one remember an object without the aspect of the object?

original: rnam pa de ni 'das pa yi //
analyzed: rnam pa de ni 'das pa yi //
translated: The aspect is not the past object.

original: don gyis min par rtogs ma yin //
analyzed: don gyis min par rtogs ma yin //
translated: It is not understood to be the object.

original: de ni da lta ba yin na de'i dran par ji ltar brjod /
analyzed: de ni da lta ba yin na de'i dran par ji ltar brjod /
translated: If it is present, how can it be called memory?

original: gal te rnam pa de dran pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te rnam pa de dran pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If it is said that the aspect is memory,

original: nyams su myong ba yang ci ste ma yin /
analyzed: nyams su myong ba yang ci ste ma yin /
translated: why is experience not so?

original: rnam pa dang bcas pa'i myong ba las de'i rnam pa can gyi dran pa skyed pa zhes bya ba ni 'thad pa yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa dang bcas pa'i myong ba las de'i rnam pa can gyi dran pa skyed pa zhes bya ba ni 'thad pa yin no //
translated: It is reasonable to say that memory having the aspect arises from experience having the aspect.üîΩThus:

original: 'di ltar / gal te don las dran 'byung na //
analyzed: 'di ltar / gal te don las dran 'byung na //
translated: If memory arises from the object,

original: khyad par med phyir kun la 'ang 'gyur //
analyzed: khyad par med phyir kun la 'ang 'gyur //
translated: it would arise from all, since there is no distinction.

original: dngos rnams rgyang ring stsogs nyid na'ang //
analyzed: dngos rnams rgyang ring stsogs nyid na'ang //
translated: Even when things are far away,

original: dran par skye ba mthong ba yin //
analyzed: dran par skye ba mthong ba yin //
translated: memory is seen to arise.

original: 'on te myong las brten nas ni //
analyzed: 'on te myong las brten nas ni //
translated: But if memory is based on experience,

original: deng kyi de nyid rgyu 'gyur mod //
analyzed: deng kyi de nyid rgyu 'gyur mod //
translated: the present is the cause of that.

original: don med par yang nyams myongs las //
analyzed: don med par yang nyams myongs las //
translated: And also from the experience of what is useless,

original: dran pa skye bas srid phyir ro //
analyzed: dran pa skye bas srid phyir ro //
translated: Memory arises, because it is possible.

original: gal te rnam par shes pa rnam pa dang bcas par ma yin na ci ltar de'i rnam pa can du dra /
analyzed: gal te rnam par shes pa rnam pa dang bcas par ma yin na ci ltar de'i rnam pa can du dra /
translated: If consciousness does not have aspects, how can it be said that it has the aspect of that?

original: 'di ltar rnam par she spa la dran pa'i rtogs pas dmigs pa rnam pa las ma gtogs par ni shin tu mngon par brtson pas kyang dmigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar rnam par she spa la dran pa'i rtogs pas dmigs pa rnam pa las ma gtogs par ni shin tu mngon par brtson pas kyang dmigs pa ma yin no //
translated: Because the cognition of memory has as its object the aspect of consciousness, and nothing else, even though one strives, one does not apprehend the object as separate from the aspect.

original: gang zhig mos pas ji ltar yul du byas pa de ni de lta bu nyid du zhes shes par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: gang zhig mos pas ji ltar yul du byas pa de ni de lta bu nyid du zhes shes par bya ba yin no //
translated: It is known that the object is just as it was made by the mind.

original: de'i phyir dran pa las gnyi ga'i rang bzhin du grub pa dang / rang rig pa yang rigs pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir dran pa las gnyi ga'i rang bzhin du grub pa dang / rang rig pa yang rigs pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is established that memory has the nature of both, and it is reasonable that there is self-awareness.

original: de ltar slob dpon gyis rang rig par bya ba nyid kyang zhes so //
analyzed: de ltar slob dpon gyis rang rig par bya ba nyid kyang zhes so //
translated: Thus, the Acarya says, ‚ÄúIt is established that there is self-awareness.‚Äù

original: yang bshad pa /
analyzed: yang bshad pa /
translated: Again, it is said:

original: tshul gnyis sgrub par byed pas kyang //
analyzed: tshul gnyis sgrub par byed pas kyang //
translated: Even by the proof of the two modes,

original: rang rig phal cher grub pa yin //
analyzed: rang rig phal cher grub pa yin //
translated: Self-awareness is mostly established.

original: rang gi ngo bor gyur snang ba //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bor gyur snang ba //
translated: The appearance that is the nature of itself

original: de tshe @90b myong bar rtogs phyir ro //
analyzed: de tshe @90b myong bar rtogs phyir ro //
translated: because it is understood at that time through experience.

original: gal te tshul gnyis sgrub par byed pas rang rig pa rab tu grub pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te tshul gnyis sgrub par byed pas rang rig pa rab tu grub pa ma yin nam /
translated: If it is not established by the proof of the two modes, is it not established by reflexive awareness?

original: phal cher ji ltar brjod ce na //
analyzed: phal cher ji ltar brjod ce na //
translated: Why is it said to be mostly so?

original: de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not so.

original: tshul gnyis sgrub par byed pas gtsor ni tshul gnyis nyid grub pa yin la /
analyzed: tshul gnyis sgrub par byed pas gtsor ni tshul gnyis nyid grub pa yin la /
translated: By the proof of the two modes, the two modes themselves are established primarily,

original: zhar la rang rig pa yang yin no //
analyzed: zhar la rang rig pa yang yin no //
translated: and reflexivity is established incidentally.

original: gang gi phyir rang gi ngo bor gyur pa'i snang ba de'i tshe rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir rang gi ngo bor gyur pa'i snang ba de'i tshe rtogs pa yin no //
translated: Because when there is appearance as its own nature, it is understood at that time.

original: rang rig pa las gzhan gyis ni rtogs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rang rig pa las gzhan gyis ni rtogs pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not understood by anything other than reflexive awareness.

original: gal te rang rig pa zhes bya ba bdag nyid 'dzin par byed pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te rang rig pa zhes bya ba bdag nyid 'dzin par byed pa ma yin nam /
translated: If it is said that what is called reflexive awareness does not apprehend itself,

original: des na de nyid gzung ba dang 'dzin pa yang yin no //
analyzed: des na de nyid gzung ba dang 'dzin pa yang yin no //
translated: then it is both the apprehended and the apprehender.

original: gang gis de las grub par 'gyur ba de ltar bdag nyid las 'gyur ba ni dpe 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gis de las grub par 'gyur ba de ltar bdag nyid las 'gyur ba ni dpe 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no //
translated: But there is no example of anything that is established from itself.

original: mar me la sogs pa bzhin du gsal bar bya ba dang gsal bar byed pa'i dngos po yin no zhe na /
analyzed: mar me la sogs pa bzhin du gsal bar bya ba dang gsal bar byed pa'i dngos po yin no zhe na /
translated: It is like a lamp, for example, which is both the object that is illuminated and the illuminator.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, it is not like that.

original: mar me la sogs pa ni gsal bar byed pa nyid yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: mar me la sogs pa ni gsal bar byed pa nyid yod pa ma yin te /
translated: A lamp, for example, does not have the nature of an illuminator,

original: gsal bar byed pa gzhan la ltos pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gsal bar byed pa gzhan la ltos pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it does not depend on another illuminator.

original: ji ltar gsal bar bya ba dang gsal bar byed pa nyid kyis go nas dper 'gyur /
analyzed: ji ltar gsal bar bya ba dang gsal bar byed pa nyid kyis go nas dper 'gyur /
translated: How can it be an example for the illumination of an object and the illuminator?

original: gang tshe de dag gzung yin pa //
analyzed: gang tshe de dag gzung yin pa //
translated: When they are apprehended,

original: de tshe dbang po 'dzin byed 'gyur //
analyzed: de tshe dbang po 'dzin byed 'gyur //
translated: then the sense faculty is the apprehender.

original: blo dbang gnyis ni rnag bdag nyid //
analyzed: blo dbang gnyis ni rnag bdag nyid //
translated: The two, the mind and the sense faculty,

original: rig par nges pa ma yin te //
analyzed: rig par nges pa ma yin te //
translated: are not ascertained as the nature of awareness.

original: de'i phyir rang rig pa zhes bya ba med pa nyid do //
analyzed: de'i phyir rang rig pa zhes bya ba med pa nyid do //
translated: Therefore, there is no such thing as reflexive awareness.

original: gal te bdag 'dzin par byed pa'i rang bzhin dang gzung bar bya ba nyid du yang khyed kyis 'dod pa ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: gal te bdag 'dzin par byed pa'i rang bzhin dang gzung bar bya ba nyid du yang khyed kyis 'dod pa ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: But isn‚Äôt it accepted that the self has the nature of a grasper and is the object of grasping?

original: ma yin te /üîΩ'di ltar / der yang chos kyi dbye ba las //
analyzed: ma yin te / 'di ltar / der yang chos kyi dbye ba las //
translated: No, it is not.üîΩBecause,

original: gzung dang 'dzin pa'i tshul nyid do //
analyzed: gzung dang 'dzin pa'i tshul nyid do //
translated: in that case, it would be the mode of the object grasped and the grasper.

original: rdzas kyi tshul gyis gzung ba ste //
analyzed: rdzas kyi tshul gyis gzung ba ste //
translated: It is apprehended as a substance,

original: de las gzhan par 'dzin pa med //üîΩrdzas gzhan thun mong ma yin pa bdag nyid tshul las ni 'dzin par byed pa yin la /
analyzed: de las gzhan par 'dzin pa med // rdzas gzhan thun mong ma yin pa bdag nyid tshul las ni 'dzin par byed pa yin la /
translated: but not as something different from that.üîΩIt is apprehended as a substance, but not as something different from that.

original: thun mong ba rdzas nyid kyis gzung ba'i phyir rigs pa yin no //
analyzed: thun mong ba rdzas nyid kyis gzung ba'i phyir rigs pa yin no //
translated: It is reasonable that it is apprehended as a substance, but not as something different from that, because it is the common nature of all consciousnesses.

original: khyed la ni 'di thams cad ci yang mi rung ngo //
analyzed: khyed la ni 'di thams cad ci yang mi rung ngo //
translated: But for you, all of this is impossible.

original: gzhan la kho rab tu grags pa tsam gyis ni dpe ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan la kho rab tu grags pa tsam gyis ni dpe ma yin te /
translated: It is not a proper example to cite something that is well known to others,

original: rang gis rtogs pa'i thabs ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na ;
analyzed: rang gis rtogs pa'i thabs ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhe na ;
translated: because it is not a means of understanding for oneself.

original: de ni 'di ltar ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni 'di ltar ma yin te /
translated: This is not the case.

original: gzung dang 'dzin pa'i dngos po ni //
analyzed: gzung dang 'dzin pa'i dngos po ni //
translated: The entities of object and subject

original: don dam du na yod ma yin //
analyzed: don dam du na yod ma yin //
translated: do not exist ultimately.

original: gzhan gyis rtogs min rang bzhin ni //
analyzed: gzhan gyis rtogs min rang bzhin ni //
translated: The nature of things is not understood by others,

original: de lta de min las ldog phyir //
analyzed: de lta de min las ldog phyir //
translated: because it is not different from that which is and is not.

original: gang la gsal bar byed pa gzhan rtogs pa med pa de nyid la bdag nyid gsal byed do zhes brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: gang la gsal bar byed pa gzhan rtogs pa med pa de nyid la bdag nyid gsal byed do zhes brjod pa yin no //
translated: It is said that that which is not understood by another is itself the illuminator.

original: gzhan gyis @91a * //
analyzed: gzhan gyis @91a * //
translated: It is not understood by another,

original: gsal ba las ldog pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gsal ba las ldog pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not different from that which is illuminated.

original: 'di ltar gzungs la sogs pa snang ba la gsal bar byed pa gzhan med pa de ltar yang bstan zin to //
analyzed: 'di ltar gzungs la sogs pa snang ba la gsal bar byed pa gzhan med pa de ltar yang bstan zin to //
translated: Thus, it has been shown that there is no other illuminator of the dhƒÅra·πáƒ´, etc.

original: de nyid kyi phyir sgron ma dpe nyid do //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir sgron ma dpe nyid do //
translated: For that very reason, the lamp is the example.

original: mig gi byed pa nyid kyang mun khung du don mi rtogs la sgro na ma nye ba las de rtogs pa'i phyir ro ;
analyzed: mig gi byed pa nyid kyang mun khung du don mi rtogs la sgro na ma nye ba las de rtogs pa'i phyir ro ;
translated: The function of the eye is not to apprehend objects in the dark, but to apprehend them when a lamp is nearby.

original: / gsal bar bya ba yin no //
analyzed: / gsal bar bya ba yin no //
translated: It is the illuminator.

original: mar me la sogs pa de lta ma yin no //
analyzed: mar me la sogs pa de lta ma yin no //
translated: A lamp, etc. is not like that.

original: de la dbang po 'dzin par byed pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de la dbang po 'dzin par byed pa yang ma yin te /
translated: Nor is the eye the apprehender,

original: rang gi ngo bos gsal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bos gsal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is clear by its own nature.

original: bde ba la sogs pa de dag la yang rig par byed pa gzhan skye ba ma yin no //
analyzed: bde ba la sogs pa de dag la yang rig par byed pa gzhan skye ba ma yin no //
translated: And in those, pleasure, etc. there is no arising of another illuminator.

original: bdag gi bde ba la sogs pa gzung ba yin na ni /
analyzed: bdag gi bde ba la sogs pa gzung ba yin na ni /
translated: If those, pleasure, etc. were apprehended by the self,

original: phyi rol yin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: phyi rol yin par 'gyur ro //
translated: they would be external.

original: 'phrod pa 'du bas bsdus pa las yin na ni /
analyzed: 'phrod pa 'du bas bsdus pa las yin na ni /
translated: If they were included in the collection of the sense faculties,

original: de nyid rang rig par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nyid rang rig par 'gyur ro //
translated: that itself would be self-awareness.

original: 'phrod pa 'du ba la tshad ma med do //
analyzed: 'phrod pa 'du ba la tshad ma med do //
translated: There is no valid cognition of the collection of the sense faculties.

original: 'di yang bstan zin to //
analyzed: 'di yang bstan zin to //
translated: This has already been shown.

original: gal te gzung bar bya bar mngon par 'dod pa'i gzugs la sogs pa rnams rang rig par khas len na ;
analyzed: gal te gzung bar bya bar mngon par 'dod pa'i gzugs la sogs pa rnams rang rig par khas len na ;
translated: If you accept that forms, etc., which are held to be objects of perception, are reflexive awareness,

original: gzugs la sogs pa'o snyam du rtogs par 'gyur te /
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa'o snyam du rtogs par 'gyur te /
translated: then it would be understood that ‚Äúforms, etc.‚Äù

original: bdag bzhin no //
analyzed: bdag bzhin no //
translated: are like the self.

original: de bzhin du bde ba dag ces bya bar 'gyur ro zhe na de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin du bde ba dag ces bya bar 'gyur ro zhe na de ni ma yin te /
translated: And likewise, it would be understood that ‚Äúhappiness, etc.‚ÄùüîΩare like the self. But that is not so.üîΩFor example,üîΩis it not the case that the thought ‚Äúwhite,

original: 'di ltar / da ni dkar sham sngo bsangs zhes //
analyzed: 'di ltar / da ni dkar sham sngo bsangs zhes //
translated: blue, etc.‚Äù

original: de ltar rtogs mngon med dam ci //üîΩde lta na yang lus ldan pa'i //
analyzed: de ltar rtogs mngon med dam ci // de lta na yang lus ldan pa'i //
translated: does not arise in the same way?üîΩEven so, the fact that forms, etc.

original: gzugs stsogs gzung ba yin pa nyid //
analyzed: gzugs stsogs gzung ba yin pa nyid //
translated: are perceived by the body is not accepted.

original: lus la du ba'i gzugs la sogs pa dag ni nga'o snyam pa'i rtogs pas 'dzin pa nyid do //
analyzed: lus la du ba'i gzugs la sogs pa dag ni nga'o snyam pa'i rtogs pas 'dzin pa nyid do //
translated: The forms, etc. of the body are perceived by the thought ‚ÄúI am.‚Äù

original: de la khyed kyi 'dod pas rang rig pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: de la khyed kyi 'dod pas rang rig pa yang ma yin no //
translated: But you do not accept reflexive awareness.

original: gal te nga gzugs so snyam pa ma mthong ba des na gzung bar bya ba nyid yin gyi /
analyzed: gal te nga gzugs so snyam pa ma mthong ba des na gzung bar bya ba nyid yin gyi /
translated: If you say that because the thought ‚ÄúI am form‚Äù is not seen, forms, etc. are objects of perception,

original: rang rig par bya ba ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: rang rig par bya ba ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: but are not reflexive awareness,

original: de yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de yang ma yin te /
translated: that is not so.

original: de yod na yang ma mthong ba //
analyzed: de yod na yang ma mthong ba //
translated: For even if they exist, they are not seen.

original: de yi rang bzhin rgyu mtshan min //
analyzed: de yi rang bzhin rgyu mtshan min //
translated: Its nature is not the reason.

original: sngo bsangs la sogs gzugs nyid las //
analyzed: sngo bsangs la sogs gzugs nyid las //
translated: It is not the form itself, such as its being fair.

original: ma rtogs pa ni gnas pa med //
analyzed: ma rtogs pa ni gnas pa med //
translated: The nonapprehension of it is not tenable.

original: gal te gzugs ba la nga'o snyam pa'i rtogs pa 'dir mi 'gyur na /
analyzed: gal te gzugs ba la nga'o snyam pa'i rtogs pa 'dir mi 'gyur na /
translated: If the thought ‚ÄúI am‚Äù did not occur in relation to form,

original: gzugs dkar sham la sogs pa la mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzugs dkar sham la sogs pa la mi 'gyur ro //
translated: it would not occur in relation to a fair form and so on.

original: gzugs la ni nga'o snyam du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzugs la ni nga'o snyam du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: The thought ‚ÄúI am‚Äù would not occur in relation to form.

original: des na nga'o snyam pa'i rtogs pa ni gzung ba nyid kyi rgyu mtshan ma yin la /
analyzed: des na nga'o snyam pa'i rtogs pa ni gzung ba nyid kyi rgyu mtshan ma yin la /
translated: Therefore the thought ‚ÄúI am‚Äù is not the reason for the apprehension of form,

original: gzung ba nyid dang 'gal ba yang ma yin no //
analyzed: gzung ba nyid dang 'gal ba yang ma yin no //
translated: nor is it contradictory to the apprehension of form.

original: 'on te bdag 'brel pa'i bdag nye bar btags nas bdag dkar sham mo zhes rtogs pa yin te nga'i gzugs zhes tha dad par mthong ba'i @91b phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te bdag 'brel pa'i bdag nye bar btags nas bdag dkar sham mo zhes rtogs pa yin te nga'i gzugs zhes tha dad par mthong ba'i @91b phyir ro zhe na /
translated: But if the thought ‚ÄúI am‚Äù occurs in relation to the self that is connected to form, then the thought ‚ÄúI am fair‚Äù occurs because the self is seen as distinct from form.

original: 'o na tha dad pa med pa'i phyir na nga'i dkar sham zhes bya bar mi 'gyur la /
analyzed: 'o na tha dad pa med pa'i phyir na nga'i dkar sham zhes bya bar mi 'gyur la /
translated: But if they are not distinct, then the thought ‚ÄúI am fair‚Äù would not occur,

original: nga'i gzugs so zhes bya bar 'gyur ba 'di la rgyu mtshan ci zhig yod /
analyzed: nga'i gzugs so zhes bya bar 'gyur ba 'di la rgyu mtshan ci zhig yod /
translated: and the thought ‚Äúmy form‚Äù would occur. What is the reason for this?

original: des na rtogs pa 'di ni rgyu mtshan med pa nyid do //
analyzed: des na rtogs pa 'di ni rgyu mtshan med pa nyid do //
translated: Therefore, this cognition is groundless.

original: de'i phyir nga'i snyam pa'i rtogs pa yin te nga'i gzugs la sogs rang rig pa ma yin par mi 'grub po //
analyzed: de'i phyir nga'i snyam pa'i rtogs pa yin te nga'i gzugs la sogs rang rig pa ma yin par mi 'grub po //
translated: Therefore, it is the cognition of ‚ÄúI,‚Äù and it is not established that ‚Äúmy‚Äù form and so on are not reflexive awareness.

original: nga dkar sham mo snyam pa ni nye bar btags pa las 'jug pa ma yin te /
analyzed: nga dkar sham mo snyam pa ni nye bar btags pa las 'jug pa ma yin te /
translated: The thought ‚ÄúI am fair-skinned‚Äù does not occur on the basis of designation,

original: dngos gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no other entity.

original: nga'i bde ba zhes bya ba la nga'o snyam du rtogs pa'i yul gyi dmigs pa tha dad pa'i rang bzhin ni 'ga' yang dmigs pa'i spyod yul du 'gyur ba med do ;
analyzed: nga'i bde ba zhes bya ba la nga'o snyam du rtogs pa'i yul gyi dmigs pa tha dad pa'i rang bzhin ni 'ga' yang dmigs pa'i spyod yul du 'gyur ba med do ;
translated: The object of the cognition ‚Äúmy happiness‚Äù is not observed as a different nature from the object of the cognition ‚ÄúI.‚Äù

original: / dper na mchi gu'i lus zhes bya ba bzhin no //
analyzed: / dper na mchi gu'i lus zhes bya ba bzhin no //
translated: For example, it is like the expression ‚Äúthe body of the lump of clay.‚ÄùüîΩThus:

original: 'di ltar / mchi gu'i sgra yi brjod bya ni //
analyzed: 'di ltar / mchi gu'i sgra yi brjod bya ni //
translated: The referent of the word ‚Äúlump‚Äù

original: rdo ba nyid ni yin par mthong //
analyzed: rdo ba nyid ni yin par mthong //
translated: is seen to be the clay itself.

original: lus kyi sgra yi brjod bya yang //
analyzed: lus kyi sgra yi brjod bya yang //
translated: The referent of the word ‚Äúbody‚Äù

original: de nyid kho na rtogs pa yin //üîΩde bzhin nga yi zhes bya'i sgra'i //
analyzed: de nyid kho na rtogs pa yin // de bzhin nga yi zhes bya'i sgra'i //
translated: is understood to be that itself.üîΩIn the same way, the referent

original: brjod par bya ba lus su rtogs //
analyzed: brjod par bya ba lus su rtogs //
translated: of the word ‚Äúmy‚Äù is understood to be the body.

original: gzugs la sogs pa'i sgra la yang //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa'i sgra la yang //
translated: The referents of the words ‚Äúform‚Äù and so on

original: gzhan yang rtogs pa yong ma yin //
analyzed: gzhan yang rtogs pa yong ma yin //
translated: Moreover, it is not a cognition.

original: te por btags kyang nga'o snyam pa'i dmigs pa ni lus la brten pa'i gzugs la sogs pa las gzhan nye bar mtshon pa ni med do //üîΩdes na nga'i bde ba'o snyam pa'i lus dang 'brel pa nyid dam /
analyzed: te por btags kyang nga'o snyam pa'i dmigs pa ni lus la brten pa'i gzugs la sogs pa las gzhan nye bar mtshon pa ni med do // des na nga'i bde ba'o snyam pa'i lus dang 'brel pa nyid dam /
translated: Even if it is imagined, the object of the thought ‚ÄúI‚Äù is not something other than the form, etc., that is based on the body.

original: thog ma med pa'i bag chags kyi kun du rtogs pa'i khyad par las rtogs pa yin no //
analyzed: thog ma med pa'i bag chags kyi kun du rtogs pa'i khyad par las rtogs pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the thought ‚ÄúI am happy‚Äù is related to the body, or it is a special kind of cognition that arises from beginningless habitual tendencies.

original: 'o na ji ltar rang rig pa yin pa'i phyir lus kyi gzugs la sogs pa la nga'o snyam pa'i rtogs par 'gyur ba de bzhin du rtsig pa la sogs pa yang rtsig pa'o snyam par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'o na ji ltar rang rig pa yin pa'i phyir lus kyi gzugs la sogs pa la nga'o snyam pa'i rtogs par 'gyur ba de bzhin du rtsig pa la sogs pa yang rtsig pa'o snyam par 'gyur ro //
translated: But if it is reflexive awareness, then just as the thought ‚ÄúI‚Äù arises in regard to the body‚Äôs form, etc., the thought ‚Äúwall‚Äù would arise in regard to a wall, etc.

original: ji ltar lus la ltos nas rtsig pa mdun na 'dug ba de bzhin du lus kyang rtsig pa la ltos nas yin par 'gyur na /
analyzed: ji ltar lus la ltos nas rtsig pa mdun na 'dug ba de bzhin du lus kyang rtsig pa la ltos nas yin par 'gyur na /
translated: Just as the wall is in front of the body, so the body would be in front of the wall.

original: 'gyur ba yang ma yin te /
analyzed: 'gyur ba yang ma yin te /
translated: But that is not the case.

original: des na rtsig pa la sogs pa'i rang rig pa nyid ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: des na rtsig pa la sogs pa'i rang rig pa nyid ma yin no zhe na /
translated: Therefore, a wall, etc., is not reflexive awareness.

original: 'di la brjod pa /
analyzed: 'di la brjod pa /
translated: To this we reply:

original: ji ltar rang rig min nyid kyang //
analyzed: ji ltar rang rig min nyid kyang //
translated: Just as a wall, etc., is not the object of the conception of ‚ÄúI,‚Äù

original: rtsig sogs ngar 'dzin byed min pa //
analyzed: rtsig sogs ngar 'dzin byed min pa //
translated: and is not self-knowing,üîΩin the same way, the conception of ‚ÄúI‚Äù

original: de bzhin rang rig nyid yin yang //üîΩrtsig sogs ngar 'dzin byed min pa //üîΩji ltar bag chags dang 'brel las //
analyzed: de bzhin rang rig nyid yin yang // rtsig sogs ngar 'dzin byed min pa // ji ltar bag chags dang 'brel las //
translated: is not self-knowing.üîΩJust as a wall, etc., is not the body

original: rtsig pa la sogs lus min pa //
analyzed: rtsig pa la sogs lus min pa //
translated: because of the connection with the latent propensities,

original: de bzhin byed nges de nyid las //
analyzed: de bzhin byed nges de nyid las //
translated: in the same way, the conception of ‚ÄúI‚Äù

original: ngar 'dzin pa dang bral ba yin //üîΩdper na rtsig pa dang lus gnyis bag chags nges pa'i mthu phan tshun tha dad pa de bzhin du ngar @92a * //
analyzed: ngar 'dzin pa dang bral ba yin // dper na rtsig pa dang lus gnyis bag chags nges pa'i mthu phan tshun tha dad pa de bzhin du ngar @92a * //
translated: is not the object of the conception of ‚ÄúI.‚Äù

original: 'dzin pa'i yul dang cig shos kyi yul yang ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dzin pa'i yul dang cig shos kyi yul yang ma yin no //
translated: For example, just as a wall and the body are different in the power of the latent propensities, in the same way, the object of the conception of ‚ÄúI‚Äù is not the object of the other.

original: de'i phyir 'dzin par byed pa gzhan gyi byed pa'i yul du mi 'thad pa nyid kyis rang rig pa nyid de /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'dzin par byed pa gzhan gyi byed pa'i yul du mi 'thad pa nyid kyis rang rig pa nyid de /
translated: Therefore, because it is not tenable that the object of the conception of ‚ÄúI‚Äù is the object of another conception, it is self-knowing.

original: 'di la ni dpe yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di la ni dpe yod pa ma yin no //
translated: But there is no example of this.

original: gang zhig byin gyis rlobs pa'o //
analyzed: gang zhig byin gyis rlobs pa'o //
translated: It is that which is empowered.

original: gzhan med par rtogs pa de ni rang dbang nyid du rtogs pa yin la /
analyzed: gzhan med par rtogs pa de ni rang dbang nyid du rtogs pa yin la /
translated: The realization of the absence of another is the realization of independence.

original: rtsig pa la sogs pa rig pa dag las yang byin gyis rlob pa po 'ga' yang med pa yin te /
analyzed: rtsig pa la sogs pa rig pa dag las yang byin gyis rlob pa po 'ga' yang med pa yin te /
translated: And there is no one who blesses the wall, etc.,

original: des na rang rgyud du rig pa ma yin pas rang rig pa'i ngo bor grub po //
analyzed: des na rang rgyud du rig pa ma yin pas rang rig pa'i ngo bor grub po //
translated: since they are not conscious. Therefore, since they are not conscious of themselves, they are established as having the nature of self-consciousness.

original: mig ni 'dzin par byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: mig ni 'dzin par byed pa ma yin te /
translated: The eye is not the apprehender,

original: gzugs la sogs pa'i rang bzhin du gzung ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa'i rang bzhin du gzung ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is apprehended as having the nature of form, etc.

original: gsal bar byed pa ni rgyu las khyad par 'ga' yang med do zhes bstan zin cing ston par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gsal bar byed pa ni rgyu las khyad par 'ga' yang med do zhes bstan zin cing ston par 'gyur ro //
translated: It has been shown and will be shown that there is no difference between the cause and the illuminator.

original: des na tha dad pa la ltos nas gsal bar byed pa'i ngo bo ni rgyu'i dngos bo nyid do //
analyzed: des na tha dad pa la ltos nas gsal bar byed pa'i ngo bo ni rgyu'i dngos bo nyid do //
translated: Therefore, the nature of the illuminator depends on difference, and the nature of the cause is itself.

original: gsal bar bya ba ni rang rig pa las so zhes bya bar rigs so //
analyzed: gsal bar bya ba ni rang rig pa las so zhes bya bar rigs so //
translated: It is reasonable to say that the object of illumination is self-consciousness.

original: de lta bu nyid kyang mthong ba'i phyir de lta bu nyid dran pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba 'di rigs pa yin no //üîΩgzhan yang / 'brel mi rtag phyir rtsig pa la //
analyzed: de lta bu nyid kyang mthong ba'i phyir de lta bu nyid dran pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba 'di rigs pa yin no // gzhan yang / 'brel mi rtag phyir rtsig pa la //
translated: It is reasonable to say that it is because of the memory of that very thing that is seen that it is that very thing.üîΩMoreover:üîΩThe apprehension of a cloth

original: dar 'dzin pa ni 'byung mi 'gyur //
analyzed: dar 'dzin pa ni 'byung mi 'gyur //
translated: does not occur in a wall, because of the absence of connection.

original: rtag tu rjes su 'brel pa yis //
analyzed: rtag tu rjes su 'brel pa yis //
translated: It is always connected

original: de ni lus la 'brel pa yin //
analyzed: de ni lus la 'brel pa yin //
translated: with the body, and thus it is connected to the body.

original: de'i phyir rtag tu rjes su 'brel pa ngar 'dzin pa'i rgyun yin pa'i phyir na rtsig pa la sogs pa la 'dzin par 'gyur ba ma yin no zhes bya ba ni rnam par dbye ba yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir rtag tu rjes su 'brel pa ngar 'dzin pa'i rgyun yin pa'i phyir na rtsig pa la sogs pa la 'dzin par 'gyur ba ma yin no zhes bya ba ni rnam par dbye ba yin no //
translated: Therefore, because it is always connected, it is the continuum of the apprehension of the self. It does not apprehend walls, etc. This is the analysis.

original: ngar 'dzin pa'i phyir ni rang rig pa ma yin te /
analyzed: ngar 'dzin pa'i phyir ni rang rig pa ma yin te /
translated: It is not self-awareness because of the apprehension of the self.

original: gzhan la ltos pa med par rig pa de ltar gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan la ltos pa med par rig pa de ltar gnas pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not awareness without depending on another, because it does not exist in that way.

original: 'on te de ni 'dzin par byed pa'i rnam par rig pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te de ni 'dzin par byed pa'i rnam par rig pa yin no zhe na /
translated: But if it is the awareness that apprehends,

original: de yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de yang ma yin te /
translated: that also is not so.

original: 'di ltar / mig stsogs las ni ma gtogs pa //
analyzed: 'di ltar / mig stsogs las ni ma gtogs pa //
translated: Because it is not separate from the eye, etc.,

original: de yi rnam par rig byed phyir //üîΩde kun gzung ba'i rang bzhin du'ang //
analyzed: de yi rnam par rig byed phyir // de kun gzung ba'i rang bzhin du'ang //
translated: it is the awareness of that.üîΩAll of that is also accepted by the proponents of external objects

original: phyi rol smra ba rnams kyis 'dod //
analyzed: phyi rol smra ba rnams kyis 'dod //
translated: as having the nature of the object that is grasped.

original: de las ma gtogs par ni bde ba la sogs pa dmigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de las ma gtogs par ni bde ba la sogs pa dmigs pa ma yin no //
translated: Apart from that, pleasure, etc., is not the object.

original: des na thams cad ltos pa med par rig pa'i phyir rang rig pa nyid do //
analyzed: des na thams cad ltos pa med par rig pa'i phyir rang rig pa nyid do //
translated: Therefore, because it is aware of everything without depending on anything else, it is self-awareness.

original: lus dang cig shos su myong ba'i gzugs la sogs pa dag pas ni tha dad par 'dzin par byed par 'gyur ba gang yin pa gzhan dmigs pa med do //
analyzed: lus dang cig shos su myong ba'i gzugs la sogs pa dag pas ni tha dad par 'dzin par byed par 'gyur ba gang yin pa gzhan dmigs pa med do //
translated: There is no other that would apprehend the form, etc. that are experienced in the body and elsewhere as different, because they are not perceived.

original: bde ba la sogs pa yang lus la sogs las ma gtogs pa med do //üîΩde dag @92b ni rtogs kyang 'dzin par byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: bde ba la sogs pa yang lus la sogs las ma gtogs pa med do // de dag @92b ni rtogs kyang 'dzin par byed pa ma yin te /
translated: And pleasure, etc. do not exist apart from the body, etc.

original: rang gi ngo bo tsam gyi mthar thug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo tsam gyi mthar thug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: They are not apprehended by that, because it is limited to its own nature.

original: bde ba la sogs pa tha dad na gzung bar bya ba nyid tha dad par yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bde ba la sogs pa tha dad na gzung bar bya ba nyid tha dad par yang 'gyur ro //
translated: If pleasure, etc. were different, their being apprehended would also be different.

original: 'gyur ba nyid de 'dod pa la sogs pa tha dad pa sa mi sdug pa la sogs par snang ba'i phyir ro zhe na /üîΩma yin te /
analyzed: 'gyur ba nyid de 'dod pa la sogs pa tha dad pa sa mi sdug pa la sogs par snang ba'i phyir ro zhe na / ma yin te /
translated: It would follow that they are different, because the appearance of foul, etc. is different from the desire, etc.

original: mi sdug pa la sogs pa'i bye brag tu snang na don gyi rang bzhin ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi sdug pa la sogs pa'i bye brag tu snang na don gyi rang bzhin ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: No, because the appearance as a particular foul, etc. is not the nature of the object.

original: phan tshun 'gal ba'i rang bzhin gcig tu rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: phan tshun 'gal ba'i rang bzhin gcig tu rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not logical for a single entity to have mutually contradictory natures.

original: 'dzin par byed pa la ltos pas mi 'gal lo zhes kyang brjod par bya ba ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dzin par byed pa la ltos pas mi 'gal lo zhes kyang brjod par bya ba ma yin te /
translated: Nor can it be said that there is no contradiction because it depends on the apprehender,

original: ltos pa mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ltos pa mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because dependence is untenable.

original: 'dzin par byed pa gzhan la ltos nas ni de bzhin du 'gyur ba ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dzin par byed pa gzhan la ltos nas ni de bzhin du 'gyur ba ma yin te /
translated: It is not the case that it becomes that way in dependence on another apprehender,

original: 'dzin par byed pa rgyu yin par thal pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dzin par byed pa rgyu yin par thal pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it would then follow that the apprehender is the cause.

original: mi sdug pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin yod pa nyid las gsal bar byed pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: mi sdug pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin yod pa nyid las gsal bar byed pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is the existence of the nature of repulsiveness, etc., that is clarified,

original: gal te de yod pa nyid gsal bar byed pa yin na /
analyzed: gal te de yod pa nyid gsal bar byed pa yin na /
translated: then if its existence is clarified,

original: 'o na ji ltar phyis brtags pas gnod par 'gyur /
analyzed: 'o na ji ltar phyis brtags pas gnod par 'gyur /
translated: why is it later refuted by analysis?

original: des na 'di ni gyi na'o //
analyzed: des na 'di ni gyi na'o //
translated: Therefore this is just nonsense.

original: 'on te nye bar bkod pa 'di thams cad ni gzung ba nyid do //üîΩ'dzin par byed pa'i blo gzhan de nyid kyi tshe don gyis go bas rtogs par bya ba yin na /
analyzed: 'on te nye bar bkod pa 'di thams cad ni gzung ba nyid do // 'dzin par byed pa'i blo gzhan de nyid kyi tshe don gyis go bas rtogs par bya ba yin na /
translated: If all of these presentations are the object of apprehension,üîΩand the cognition that apprehends it understands it by implication at that time,

original: de la ltos nas rang rig pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de la ltos nas rang rig pa ma yin no //
translated: then it is not reflexive awareness in dependence on that.

original: des na dran pa dus phyis 'di lta bu nyid du rtogs pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: des na dran pa dus phyis 'di lta bu nyid du rtogs pa yin zhe na /
translated: Therefore, it is understood that memory is just like that at a later time.

original: de yang mi 'thad de /
analyzed: de yang mi 'thad de /
translated: That also is not tenable.

original: 'jig rten rig pa don go bar //üîΩgzung las rang bzhin tha dad du //
analyzed: 'jig rten rig pa don go bar // gzung las rang bzhin tha dad du //
translated: The world understands the meaning of consciousness.

original: shes min de yi rnam pa ni //
analyzed: shes min de yi rnam pa ni //
translated: The consciousness does not exist as a different entity from the object.üîΩThe form of the object is not clearly understood,

original: gsal bar ngo bo ma rtogs phyir //
analyzed: gsal bar ngo bo ma rtogs phyir //
translated: because the nature of the object is not understood.

original: gzugs dang bde ba la sogs pa las tha dad par rnam pa dang ldan pa'i blo ni don gyis go bas tha snyad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyis rtogs pa med do //
analyzed: gzugs dang bde ba la sogs pa las tha dad par rnam pa dang ldan pa'i blo ni don gyis go bas tha snyad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyis rtogs pa med do //
translated: The world that understands the meaning of consciousness does not understand a cognition that possesses an image as a different entity from form, pleasure, etc.

original: nga la blo yod do snyam nas ni gzung ba'i rnam pa las tha dad par so sor nges pa'i rang bzhin rtogs pa med pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i spros pa nyid yin pas 'jig rten kun du 'khrul pa 'ba' zhig tu zad do //
analyzed: nga la blo yod do snyam nas ni gzung ba'i rnam pa las tha dad par so sor nges pa'i rang bzhin rtogs pa med pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i spros pa nyid yin pas 'jig rten kun du 'khrul pa 'ba' zhig tu zad do //
translated: The conceptual proliferation of the thought, ‚ÄúI have a cognition,‚Äù is a mere error in the world, because there is no understanding of a different, individually characterized nature from the image of the object.üîΩIf you think that the nature of the object is definitely ascertained,

original: ci ste yul la sogs pa nges par rnam par gnas pa'i don gyi bdag nyid lus can dang kho na so so rang bzhin nges par rtogs kyi /
analyzed: ci ste yul la sogs pa nges par rnam par gnas pa'i don gyi bdag nyid lus can dang kho na so so rang bzhin nges par rtogs kyi /
translated: then the nature of the body is definitely ascertained as the nature of the object.

original: blo ni de lta bu'i rang bzhin ma yin /
analyzed: blo ni de lta bu'i rang bzhin ma yin /
translated: The mind is not of such a nature.

original: de'i rang bzhin ni gzhal bya gsal bar byed pa 'ba' zhig yin pas des na gzugs la sogs pa bzhin du rang bzhin so sor nges pa 'phrigs pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin ni gzhal bya gsal bar byed pa 'ba' zhig yin pas des na gzugs la sogs pa bzhin du rang bzhin so sor nges pa 'phrigs pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: Its nature is only to illuminate the object. Therefore, like form and so on, it is not established as a distinct, individual nature.

original: de yang mi rung ste /
analyzed: de yang mi rung ste /
translated: This is also unacceptable.

original: rang bzhin ma rtogs pa rnams kyang //
analyzed: rang bzhin ma rtogs pa rnams kyang //
translated: Even those who do not understand the nature of the mind

original: @93a * // gal te 'dzin pa nyid yin na //üîΩri bong sogs kyi rva dag kyang //
analyzed: @93a * // gal te 'dzin pa nyid yin na // ri bong sogs kyi rva dag kyang //
translated: If it is the apprehender,

original: 'dzin par byed pa ci ste min //
analyzed: 'dzin par byed pa ci ste min //
translated: why does it not apprehend the horns of a rabbit?

original: gal te de dag de ltar ni //
analyzed: gal te de dag de ltar ni //
translated: If it is like that,

original: rtogs med blo la rtogs pa med //üîΩnga yi blo yod do snyam pa yang gzugs la sogs pa las gzhan pa'i bdag nyid rig pa ma yin te gsal bar byed pa'i nang du chud pa gzugs la sogs pa'i khyad par nyid rang bzhin du gyur pa'i chos kyi khyad par la brten nas de ltar
analyzed: rtogs med blo la rtogs pa med // nga yi blo yod do snyam pa yang gzugs la sogs pa las gzhan pa'i bdag nyid rig pa ma yin te gsal bar byed pa'i nang du chud pa gzugs la sogs pa'i khyad par nyid rang bzhin du gyur pa'i chos kyi khyad par la brten nas de ltar
translated: the mind that does not understand does not understand.

original: bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: bstan pa yin no //
translated: The thought ‚Äúmy mind exists‚Äù is not aware of a self that is different from form and so on. It is taught that the mind is a special feature of form and so on that is included in the illuminator. It is a special feature of phenomena that is by nature a special feature of form and so on.

original: gzugs la sogs pa'i lkog tu gyur pa dang / ma grub pa thun mong ma yin pa la gsal bzhin pa'i gzugs nyid ni gzugs kyi khyad par yin pa nyid kyis ni /
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa'i lkog tu gyur pa dang / ma grub pa thun mong ma yin pa la gsal bzhin pa'i gzugs nyid ni gzugs kyi khyad par yin pa nyid kyis ni /
translated: The form, etc., that is hidden and not established is the specific form of the manifest form itself.

original: rigs mthun pa'i gzugs las kyang ldog pa yin no //
analyzed: rigs mthun pa'i gzugs las kyang ldog pa yin no //
translated: By that very fact, it is distinguished from form of a homogeneous kind.

original: des ni ldog pa'i khyad par gyi chos tha dad pa des na gzugs la sogs pa'i blo zhes brjod pa gang zhen pas 'jug pa yin no //
analyzed: des ni ldog pa'i khyad par gyi chos tha dad pa des na gzugs la sogs pa'i blo zhes brjod pa gang zhen pas 'jug pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the cognition of form, etc., is said to be engaged by that which is distinguished by the distinction of exclusion.

original: de'i phyir mthong ba'i dus dang dran pa'i dus na blo gzhan med pa'i phyir gzugs la sogs pa'i rnam pa nyid kyis ni /
analyzed: de'i phyir mthong ba'i dus dang dran pa'i dus na blo gzhan med pa'i phyir gzugs la sogs pa'i rnam pa nyid kyis ni /
translated: Therefore, because there is no other cognition at the time of seeing and the time of remembering, the aspect of form, etc.,

original: rang rig pa grub ces bya ba ni grub pa'i mtha' yin no //üîΩdes na / gzung 'dzin dag ni gcig yin na //
analyzed: rang rig pa grub ces bya ba ni grub pa'i mtha' yin no // des na / gzung 'dzin dag ni gcig yin na //
translated: is established as self-awareness. This is the tenet.üîΩTherefore, the object and subject are one.

original: de gcig rtogs par nges pa ni //
analyzed: de gcig rtogs par nges pa ni //
translated: If that one is ascertained as realized,

original: gzhan yang rtogs pa 'am gzhan yang rtogs par 'gyur na /
analyzed: gzhan yang rtogs pa 'am gzhan yang rtogs par 'gyur na /
translated: then either another is realized or another is not realized.

original: gzhan ma rtogs na gzhan yang mi rtogs so zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di yang gsal ba yin no //
analyzed: gzhan ma rtogs na gzhan yang mi rtogs so zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba 'di yang gsal ba yin no //
translated: and if one does not understand the other, one does not understand the other.

original: gzugs la sogs pa'i rang bzhin dang // gsal bar byed pa'i rang bzhin yang rtogs pa nyid de /
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa'i rang bzhin dang // gsal bar byed pa'i rang bzhin yang rtogs pa nyid de /
translated: The nature of form, etc., and the nature of the illuminator are understood.

original: 'di la the tshom ci zhig yod //
analyzed: 'di la the tshom ci zhig yod //
translated: What is the doubt here?

original: gang yang 'jig par byed pa nyid dran pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: gang yang 'jig par byed pa nyid dran pa nyid yin te /
translated: And what is remembered is the very destruction.

original: bdag cig zhig mthong bar gyur to zhes dran pa'i phyir te zhes smras pa de la khyad par ni 'dzin par byed pa la the tshom za ba yin la /
analyzed: bdag cig zhig mthong bar gyur to zhes dran pa'i phyir te zhes smras pa de la khyad par ni 'dzin par byed pa la the tshom za ba yin la /
translated: Because of the memory, ‚ÄúI saw it at one time,‚Äù the doubt is about the apprehender.

original: spyi la ni gzung ba la'ang the tshom mi za ba yin no //
analyzed: spyi la ni gzung ba la'ang the tshom mi za ba yin no //
translated: But in the case of the universal, there is no doubt even in the case of the apprehended.

original: nga'i zhes bya ni 'jig rten lus dang 'brel pa ston pa yin la /
analyzed: nga'i zhes bya ni 'jig rten lus dang 'brel pa ston pa yin la /
translated: The word ‚Äúmy‚Äù indicates the body related to the world.

original: lus de yang gsal bya nyid yin gyi gsal bar byed pa gzhan ni med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lus de yang gsal bya nyid yin gyi gsal bar byed pa gzhan ni med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And that body is the illuminator, because there is no other illuminator.

original: 'di yang bshad zin pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'di yang bshad zin pa nyid do //
translated: This has already been explained.

original: 'on te gzhan gyi bsam pa /
analyzed: 'on te gzhan gyi bsam pa /
translated: But if there is another doubt of the opponent,

original: gzugs la sogs pa rtogs blo gzhan yang /
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa rtogs blo gzhan yang /
translated: Also, the cognition that realizes form and so on

original: yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: yod pa ma yin te /
translated: does not exist.

original: de bden pa /
analyzed: de bden pa /
translated: If it were true,

original: de lta na yang rang rig min //
analyzed: de lta na yang rang rig min //
translated: then it would not be reflexive awareness,

original: de ni gzhan gyis 'dzin phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni gzhan gyis 'dzin phyir ro //
translated: because it is apprehended by another.

original: zhes bya ba yin na /
analyzed: zhes bya ba yin na /
translated: This is what you say,

original: de ni mi rung ste /
analyzed: de ni mi rung ste /
translated: but that is not correct.

original: de dngos can min blo yis ni //
analyzed: de dngos can min blo yis ni //
translated: The cognition that does not have that as its object

original: shes @93b 'ga' ji ltar myong ba yin //
analyzed: shes @93b 'ga' ji ltar myong ba yin //
translated: how could it experience it?

original: des rang ngo bo myong med phyir //
analyzed: des rang ngo bo myong med phyir //
translated: Because it does not experience its own nature,

original: nyams su myong lus ldog par 'gyur //
analyzed: nyams su myong lus ldog par 'gyur //
translated: the experience would be reversed.

original: gal te de'i dus phyis 'byung ba don go ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin de'i rnam pa can ma yin pa'i blo gzhan gyis shes par 'dod na /
analyzed: gal te de'i dus phyis 'byung ba don go ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin de'i rnam pa can ma yin pa'i blo gzhan gyis shes par 'dod na /
translated: If you assert that a later cognition that occurs at a different time and that does not have the aspect of that object, such as the understanding of the meaning, knows it,

original: de'i tshe rig pa 'gag pa yin te /
analyzed: de'i tshe rig pa 'gag pa yin te /
translated: then at that time the consciousness would cease to exist.

original: de ni skad cig ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni skad cig ma yin te /
translated: That is because you accept that it is momentary

original: blo gzhan gyi dus su ni sdod pa ma yin no zhes khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: blo gzhan gyi dus su ni sdod pa ma yin no zhes khas blangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: and that it does not remain at the time of the other cognition.

original: des na myong ba phyi ma'i dus su myong ba snga ma 'gags pas ji ltar myong ba yin /
analyzed: des na myong ba phyi ma'i dus su myong ba snga ma 'gags pas ji ltar myong ba yin /
translated: Therefore, since the earlier experience ceases at the time of the later experience, how could it experience it?

original: rang gi ngo bo yang rig pa ma yin pa'i phyir dang / gzung bar bya ba'i rang bzhin yang med pas myong ba ma lus pa 'jig par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo yang rig pa ma yin pa'i phyir dang / gzung bar bya ba'i rang bzhin yang med pas myong ba ma lus pa 'jig par 'gyur ro //
translated: and because it has no nature of being awareness, and because it has no nature of being an object, all experience would be destroyed.

original: rang gi ngo bo med pa ni myong bar nus pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo med pa ni myong bar nus pa ni ma yin te /
translated: That which has no nature of its own is not able to experience.

original: myong ba ni thams cad du rang gi ngo bo myong ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: myong ba ni thams cad du rang gi ngo bo myong ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because experience is always the experience of its own nature.

original: sngon gyi myong ba nye bar gnas pa ma yin pa ni /
analyzed: sngon gyi myong ba nye bar gnas pa ma yin pa ni /
translated: The previous experience does not endure.

original: rang gi ngo bo ni med pa yin pa'i phyir myong ba snga ma myong ba phyi mas myong ba ma yin no //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo ni med pa yin pa'i phyir myong ba snga ma myong ba phyi mas myong ba ma yin no //
translated: Because it has no nature of its own, the previous experience is not experienced by the later experience.

original: rang gi rang bzhin yang myong bar mi 'dod do //
analyzed: rang gi rang bzhin yang myong bar mi 'dod do //
translated: Nor is it asserted that its own nature is experienced.

original: mthong ba yang ma yin te /
analyzed: mthong ba yang ma yin te /
translated: Nor is it seen,

original: de ni lus kyi rnam pa dang 'brel pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni lus kyi rnam pa dang 'brel pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is connected with the form of the body.

original: lus kyi rnam pa yin yang rang rig par khas mi len pa'i phyir /
analyzed: lus kyi rnam pa yin yang rang rig par khas mi len pa'i phyir /
translated: Even if it were the form of the body, it is not accepted as being self-awareness.

original: thug pa med par thal bar 'gyur ro zhes bstan cing ston par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thug pa med par thal bar 'gyur ro zhes bstan cing ston par 'gyur ro //
translated: It is taught and will be taught that it would lead to an infinite regress.

original: gzhan yang blo gzhan gyis nyams su myong ba yin no zhes bya ba 'di yang mi rung ste /
analyzed: gzhan yang blo gzhan gyis nyams su myong ba yin no zhes bya ba 'di yang mi rung ste /
translated: Moreover, it is not tenable to say, ‚ÄúIt is experienced by another mind.‚Äù

original: 'di ltar / don du snang ba dang ldan zhes //
analyzed: 'di ltar / don du snang ba dang ldan zhes //
translated: It is said that the mind is associated with the appearance of objects.

original: de ni phyi rol mngon phyogs snang //
analyzed: de ni phyi rol mngon phyogs snang //
translated: It appears to be external.

original: blo la 'dzin par byed pa'i blo //
analyzed: blo la 'dzin par byed pa'i blo //
translated: The mind that apprehends the object

original: rtag tu bdag la nang mngon phyogs //üîΩgzhan gzhan gyis 'dzin pa ni /
analyzed: rtag tu bdag la nang mngon phyogs // gzhan gzhan gyis 'dzin pa ni /
translated: is always directed internally.

original: phyi rol ma yin par rtogs par nus pa ma yin no //
analyzed: phyi rol ma yin par rtogs par nus pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not possible to understand that the mind that apprehends the object is external.

original: blo las rtag tu nang nyid du snang ba yin no //
analyzed: blo las rtag tu nang nyid du snang ba yin no //
translated: It always appears internally.

original: 'on te bdag nyid kyi blo nang gi ngo bor snang zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te bdag nyid kyi blo nang gi ngo bor snang zhe na /
translated: But if the mind appears as an internal entity,

original: dran pas 'dzin pas na yang blo //
analyzed: dran pas 'dzin pas na yang blo //
translated: the mind is apprehended by memory.

original: nang nyid du ni gsal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nang nyid du ni gsal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: It is clearly internal.

original: gang gi tshe bdag gi pa'i blo dran pas dmigs pa de'i tshe yang phyi rol du snang bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang gi tshe bdag gi pa'i blo dran pas dmigs pa de'i tshe yang phyi rol du snang bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: When the mind that belongs to the self is observed by memory, it does not appear externally.

original: 'on te de ni dus tha dad pas de ltar snang ngo zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te de ni dus tha dad pas de ltar snang ngo zhe na /
translated: But if it appears in that way because of a difference in time,

original: 'dir rang gi ngo bo tha dad pa'i phyir de ltar yin no zhes ci ste mi 'dod /
analyzed: 'dir rang gi ngo bo tha dad pa'i phyir de ltar yin no zhes ci ste mi 'dod /
translated: Why not accept that it is so because of the difference in their natures?

original: thad dad pa'i rnam pa mi snang ba ni 'dzin par byed pa las gzhan yin no zhes nges par nus pa ma yin no //
analyzed: thad dad pa'i rnam pa mi snang ba ni 'dzin par byed pa las gzhan yin no zhes nges par nus pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not possible to ascertain that the appearance of difference is due to something other than the apprehender.

original: des na nang nyid du nyams su myong ba'i blo ni rang rig pa'i rang bzhin nyid do zhes rigs so //üîΩyul mtshungs @94a * //
analyzed: des na nang nyid du nyams su myong ba'i blo ni rang rig pa'i rang bzhin nyid do zhes rigs so // yul mtshungs @94a * //
translated: Therefore, it is reasonable to say that the cognition that experiences itself is the nature of reflexive awareness.

original: pa nyid kyis de ltar myong pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: pa nyid kyis de ltar myong pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is experienced in that way due to the similarity of the object,

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: that is not so.

original: yul mtshungs kyang rang gi ngo bo tha dad pa nyid du 'dzin pa yin no //
analyzed: yul mtshungs kyang rang gi ngo bo tha dad pa nyid du 'dzin pa yin no //
translated: Even though the object is similar, it is apprehended as having a different nature.

original: 'dres pas rnam par dbyer med pa ni gsal ba nyid do //
analyzed: 'dres pas rnam par dbyer med pa ni gsal ba nyid do //
translated: The inseparability due to mixing is the clarity itself.

original: de'i phyir gyi blo gzhan gyis 'dzin pa de'i ltar na de phyi rol nyid du snang bar 'gyur ro zhes rigs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir gyi blo gzhan gyis 'dzin pa de'i ltar na de phyi rol nyid du snang bar 'gyur ro zhes rigs so //
translated: Therefore, it is reasonable to say that when it is apprehended by another cognition, it appears as external.üîΩMoreover,

original: gzhan yang / yul gang gis ni snang ba gang //
analyzed: gzhan yang / yul gang gis ni snang ba gang //
translated: it is also obtained that the object by which it appears

original: des de myong min zhes pa'ang 'thob //
analyzed: des de myong min zhes pa'ang 'thob //
translated: is not experienced by that.

original: yul gang gang gi snang ba gang zhig shes pa la gnas pa'i don de yul du snang ba'i shes pas rig pa yin par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: yul gang gang gi snang ba gang zhig shes pa la gnas pa'i don de yul du snang ba'i shes pas rig pa yin par mi 'gyur te /
translated: The object that is the basis of the appearance of any object whatsoever would not be cognized by the consciousness that appears as the object.

original: rang gi ngo bor 'gyur ba'i don du snang ba myong ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bor 'gyur ba'i don du snang ba myong ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no experience of the appearance of the object as its own nature.

original: rang rig pas yul gyi snang ba nyams su myong na ni /
analyzed: rang rig pas yul gyi snang ba nyams su myong na ni /
translated: If the experience of the appearance of the object by reflexive awareness were the experience of the object,

original: don gyis na don de yang mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: don gyis na don de yang mi 'gyur ro //
translated: then the object would not be different from that.

original: don myong ba ni 'di nyid yin //
analyzed: don myong ba ni 'di nyid yin //
translated: This is the experience of the object.

original: shing la sogs pa me long gi rnam pas 'dzin pa bzhin no //
analyzed: shing la sogs pa me long gi rnam pas 'dzin pa bzhin no //
translated: It is like the reflection of a tree, etc., being apprehended by a mirror.

original: rang rig pa ma yin na ni /
analyzed: rang rig pa ma yin na ni /
translated: If there were no reflexive awareness,

original: thams cad cir yang mi rung bar 'gyur ro //üîΩgal te de dang 'dra ba las //
analyzed: thams cad cir yang mi rung bar 'gyur ro // gal te de dang 'dra ba las //
translated: everything would be impossible.

original: myong gzhan ci yod cis 'dod na //
analyzed: myong gzhan ci yod cis 'dod na //
translated: If you ask, ‚ÄúWhat other experience of that is there?‚Äù

original: gal te blo ni de'i ngo bor //
analyzed: gal te blo ni de'i ngo bor //
translated: If the mind is produced in the aspect of that,

original: skyes na de nyid don myong yin //
analyzed: skyes na de nyid don myong yin //
translated: that itself is the experience of the object.

original: de yi rang bzhin rig med na //
analyzed: de yi rang bzhin rig med na //
translated: If the nature of that is not known,

original: don rig par ni 'gyur ma yin //
analyzed: don rig par ni 'gyur ma yin //
translated: the object is not known.

original: rang rig pa gzhan med mod /
analyzed: rang rig pa gzhan med mod /
translated: Although there is no other reflexive awareness,

original: de med pas na de med par 'gyur ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de med pas na de med par 'gyur ba ni ma yin no //
translated: it is not the case that it does not exist because that does not exist.

original: rang rig pa med pas sngon po sngon po ma yin par 'gyur ba ni ma yin pa de bzhin du blo blo ma yin par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rang rig pa med pas sngon po sngon po ma yin par 'gyur ba ni ma yin pa de bzhin du blo blo ma yin par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: And just as blue is not non-blue because of the non-existence of self-awareness, so the mind is not non-mind because of the non-existence of self-awareness.

original: gzhan rig pas blo yin gyi /
analyzed: gzhan rig pas blo yin gyi /
translated: The mind is mind because of the awareness of another,

original: rang rig pas ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rang rig pas ni ma yin no //
translated: but not because of self-awareness.

original: don gyi rang bzhin nyid myong ba'i mtshan nyid yin gyi /
analyzed: don gyi rang bzhin nyid myong ba'i mtshan nyid yin gyi /
translated: The nature of the object is characterized by experience,

original: rang rig pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rang rig pa ni ma yin te /
translated: but not by self-awareness,

original: bdag kyang blo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bdag kyang blo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the self is mind itself.

original: des na bdag la gnas pa de'i rnam pa ni rang rig pa ma yin yang blo nyid do zhe na /üîΩgal te de ltar na rang rig pa med kyang sngar gyi don gyi rnam pa tsam las sam /
analyzed: des na bdag la gnas pa de'i rnam pa ni rang rig pa ma yin yang blo nyid do zhe na / gal te de ltar na rang rig pa med kyang sngar gyi don gyi rnam pa tsam las sam /
translated: Therefore, although the aspect of that which is based on the self is not self-awareness, it is mind.üîΩIf that is so, then even without self-awareness, the mind would be the experience of the aspect of the object, or it would be another.

original: gzhan gyis yin par 'gyur na de'i tshe /üîΩ'dra ba thams cad phan tshun du //
analyzed: gzhan gyis yin par 'gyur na de'i tshe / 'dra ba thams cad phan tshun du //
translated: At that time,

original: myong ba nyid ni thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: myong ba nyid ni thob par 'gyur //
translated: all similar things would be mutually experienced.

original: rang rig pa ma yin na de'i tshe rnam pa tsam zhig lus pa yin no //
analyzed: rang rig pa ma yin na de'i tshe rnam pa tsam zhig lus pa yin no //
translated: If there is no self-awareness, then only the aspect remains.

original: de'i tshe yang blo dang khyad par med pa nyid do //
analyzed: de'i tshe yang blo dang khyad par med pa nyid do //
translated: At that time, it would be no different from the mind.

original: de'i rnam pa tsam gyis blo nyid yin na ni der yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i rnam pa tsam gyis blo nyid yin na ni der yang 'gyur ro //
translated: If it is the mind itself that has the aspect of that, then it is that.

original: des na don gzhan dang 'dra ba'i don yang blo nyid de blo'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //üîΩdon gyi phyir na ma yin ni zhe na /
analyzed: des na don gzhan dang 'dra ba'i don yang blo nyid de blo'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i phyir ro // don gyi phyir na ma yin ni zhe na /
translated: Therefore, the object that is like something else is the mind itself, because it has the characteristics of the mind.üîΩIf you say that it is not for the sake of the object,

original: don zhes bya ba ni 'di ci yin ma yin pa'o zhe @94b na ;
analyzed: don zhes bya ba ni 'di ci yin ma yin pa'o zhe @94b na ;
translated: then what is this so-called object?

original: blo ma yin pa nyid don yin par 'gyur pas na gcig kyang rab tu mi 'grub po //
analyzed: blo ma yin pa nyid don yin par 'gyur pas na gcig kyang rab tu mi 'grub po //
translated: Since it would be the object that is not the mind, it is not established as one.

original: des na blo ni rang rig pa tsam nyid du zad do zhes bya bar rigs so //
analyzed: des na blo ni rang rig pa tsam nyid du zad do zhes bya bar rigs so //
