original: gzhan tshe gzhan du gal te rig //üîΩ'di ni bde ba gang yin zhes //
analyzed: gzhan tshe gzhan du gal te rig // 'di ni bde ba gang yin zhes //
translated: If it were aware of the other,

original: bya ba 'di ni rtogs ma yin //
analyzed: bya ba 'di ni rtogs ma yin //
translated: then this would not be the experience of pleasure.

original: ci ste yang gal te /
analyzed: ci ste yang gal te /
translated: But if you think that

original: sngar khyad par ma mthong ba de lta na yang phyis mthong ba las 'gal ba ci yod snyam na de yang mi rung ste ;
analyzed: sngar khyad par ma mthong ba de lta na yang phyis mthong ba las 'gal ba ci yod snyam na de yang mi rung ste ;
translated: even though the difference was not seen previously, later it is seen and there is no contradiction, that also is not correct.üîΩThus:

original: 'di ltar / gal te khyad par khyad par can //
analyzed: 'di ltar / gal te khyad par khyad par can //
translated: If the difference and the one with the difference

original: dag na ma 'dres par mthong bas //
analyzed: dag na ma 'dres par mthong bas //
translated: were seen unmixed,üîΩthen the difference and the one with the difference

original: de yi cho na khyad par dang // khyad par can du rtogs mi 'gyur //
analyzed: de yi cho na khyad par dang // khyad par can du rtogs mi 'gyur //
translated: would not be cognized.

original: rtag tu 'ba' zhig pa dang 'ba' zhig pa nyid du 'gyur ba dag ni mthong ba tsam gyis khyad par dang khyad par can nyid du rtogs par nus pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rtag tu 'ba' zhig pa dang 'ba' zhig pa nyid du 'gyur ba dag ni mthong ba tsam gyis khyad par dang khyad par can nyid du rtogs par nus pa ma yin no //
translated: The one that is always alone and the one that is alone would not be able to be cognized as the difference and the one with the difference merely through seeing.üîΩMoreover:

original: gzhan yang ; 'dra ba las ni myong zhes pa'ang //
analyzed: gzhan yang ; 'dra ba las ni myong zhes pa'ang //
translated: The experience of the similar

original: sngar nyid rnam par bsal ba yin //
analyzed: sngar nyid rnam par bsal ba yin //
translated: has already been refuted.

original: 'di ni 'dra ba'o zhes gzhan gyi rig pa med par 'dra ba tsam skyes pas na de rig pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni 'dra ba'o zhes gzhan gyi rig pa med par 'dra ba tsam skyes pas na de rig pa ma yin no //
translated: ‚ÄúThis is similar to that‚Äù is not a cognition of another. It is a mere similarity that arises. Therefore, it is not a cognition.

original: mthong ba bdag nyid 'drar 'dzin na //
analyzed: mthong ba bdag nyid 'drar 'dzin na //
translated: If it grasps the similarity of what is seen,

original: don ni sngar mthong yod min pas //
analyzed: don ni sngar mthong yod min pas //
translated: the object is not seen previously.üîΩHow is it ascertained by that?

original: ji ltar de ni mthong ba dang // 'dra ba yin par des nges 'gyur //
analyzed: ji ltar de ni mthong ba dang // 'dra ba yin par des nges 'gyur //
translated: ‚ÄúIt is similar to what is seen.‚Äù

original: 'dra ba nyid kyang mi 'dod pa //
analyzed: 'dra ba nyid kyang mi 'dod pa //
translated: If similarity is not accepted,

original: gang yin de la gnyis mthong med //üîΩde tshe don dang shes pa'am //
analyzed: gang yin de la gnyis mthong med // de tshe don dang shes pa'am //
translated: then there is no seeing of two.üîΩAt that time, how can there be

original: de dag smos su ga la yod //
analyzed: de dag smos su ga la yod //
translated: an object, a cognition, or their designation?

original: 'ba' zhig mthong ba la ni 'dra ba rtogs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'ba' zhig mthong ba la ni 'dra ba rtogs pa ma yin te /
translated: Similarity is not cognized by seeing only one.

original: 'di dang 'di 'dra ba yin no zhes rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di dang 'di 'dra ba yin no zhes rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is cognized as ‚Äúthis is similar to that.‚Äù

original: don dang mthong ba dang 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dag la ni lhan cig rtogs pa med pa'i phyir na /
analyzed: don dang mthong ba dang 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dag la ni lhan cig rtogs pa med pa'i phyir na /
translated: Objects, seeing, the past, and the future are not cognized simultaneously.

original: de ltar rtogs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de ltar rtogs pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, they are not cognized in that way.

original: de sgro 'dogs na ni rnam par shes pa nyid yin gyi don rtogs pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de sgro 'dogs na ni rnam par shes pa nyid yin gyi don rtogs pa ni ma yin te /
translated: If it is superimposed, it is just consciousness, not the cognition of an object.

original: phyis kyi de la yang rang rig pa med na ni thug pa med pa'i nyes pa bshad zin to //
analyzed: phyis kyi de la yang rang rig pa med na ni thug pa med pa'i nyes pa bshad zin to //
translated: And if the latter were not self-cognizing, the fault of infinite regress would ensue, as has already been explained.

original: gang zhig 'dra ba yang mi 'dod pa de la ni don rtogs pa yang yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gang zhig 'dra ba yang mi 'dod pa de la ni don rtogs pa yang yod pa ma yin te /
translated: But if one does not accept even the similarity [of the object to the cognition], then there is no apprehension of the object.

original: der sgro 'dogs pa yod pa srid pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: der sgro 'dogs pa yod pa srid pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: For it is impossible to superimpose what is nonexistent.

original: mthong ba phyi ma don dang mi 'dra ba'i rang bzhin du rtogs pa na /
analyzed: mthong ba phyi ma don dang mi 'dra ba'i rang bzhin du rtogs pa na /
translated: When the subsequent cognition is cognized as having a nature that is not similar to the object,

original: de'i rang bzhin med pa nyid kyis na de yang sgro 'dogs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin med pa nyid kyis na de yang sgro 'dogs pa ma yin te /
translated: then, because of the absence of that nature, it is not a superimposition.

original: de'i rang bzhin khas mi len pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin khas mi len pa'i phyir ro //
translated: For one does not accept that nature.

original: @100b rang ngo bos rtogs pa na yang don gzhan nyid du zad do //
analyzed: @100b rang ngo bos rtogs pa na yang don gzhan nyid du zad do //
translated: When one cognizes the nature of the object, it is simply the object itself.

original: de'i phyir gang zhig don yin zhing /
analyzed: de'i phyir gang zhig don yin zhing /
translated: So what is the object, and what is the cognition?

original: gang zhig ni rnam par shes pa yin yang ci zhig gang gis shes te /
analyzed: gang zhig ni rnam par shes pa yin yang ci zhig gang gis shes te /
translated: What is it, and who is it that cognizes it?

original: des na brjod pa ldog pas kha rog 'dug par bya'o //
analyzed: des na brjod pa ldog pas kha rog 'dug par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, since the expression is reversed, one should remain silent.

original: mthong ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: mthong ba ma yin nam /
translated: Isn't it seen?

original: ka ba la sogs pa ni don nyid du dmigs pa yin te /
analyzed: ka ba la sogs pa ni don nyid du dmigs pa yin te /
translated: The pillar and so on are indeed observed as the object itself.

original: mthong ba mi 'thad do zhes bya ba ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: mthong ba mi 'thad do zhes bya ba ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: But it is not tenable that it sees itself.

original: 'di la lan btab zin to //
analyzed: 'di la lan btab zin to //
translated: We have already answered this.

original: gal te mthong na rang gi ngo bos mthong ba yin no zhes so //
analyzed: gal te mthong na rang gi ngo bos mthong ba yin no zhes so //
translated: If it sees, it sees by virtue of its own nature.

original: de nas dkar po la sogs pa mthong ba na de'i rnam pa gang yin pa de gal te rang bzhin gzhan yin na de'i tshe /
analyzed: de nas dkar po la sogs pa mthong ba na de'i rnam pa gang yin pa de gal te rang bzhin gzhan yin na de'i tshe /
translated: Then, when it sees white and so on, if the aspect that is the object of that seeing has a different nature from itself,

original: dkar po la sogs pa gsal bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dkar po la sogs pa gsal bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: then it does not illuminate white and so on.

original: ci ste rang dngos 'o na de //
analyzed: ci ste rang dngos 'o na de //
translated: But if it is by virtue of its own nature,

original: rang nyid rab tu gsal bar 'gyur //
analyzed: rang nyid rab tu gsal bar 'gyur //
translated: then it would illuminate itself.

original: gal te mthong ba gsal bar shes pa'i rang bzhin nyid yin na ni /
analyzed: gal te mthong ba gsal bar shes pa'i rang bzhin nyid yin na ni /
translated: If seeing has the nature of illuminating consciousness,

original: de'i tshe rang nyid gsal ba yin te /
analyzed: de'i tshe rang nyid gsal ba yin te /
translated: then at that time it illuminates itself,

original: gsal ba gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gsal ba gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no other illuminator.

original: 'o na te rang gi ngo bos gsal ba ma yin na de'i tshe ;
analyzed: 'o na te rang gi ngo bos gsal ba ma yin na de'i tshe ;
translated: But if it does not illuminate by virtue of its own nature,

original: de'i rang bzhin mi gsal na /
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin mi gsal na /
translated: then its nature is not illuminated.

original: don mi gsal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: don mi gsal bar 'gyur te /
translated: Then the object would not be illuminated,

original: gang gi phyir snang ba'i rang bzhin mi gsal na /
analyzed: gang gi phyir snang ba'i rang bzhin mi gsal na /
translated: because if the nature of illumination is not illuminated,

original: don gsal ba zhes bya ba ma yin no //
analyzed: don gsal ba zhes bya ba ma yin no //
translated: it is not called the illumination of the object.

original: gzhan la brjod pa'i don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: gzhan la brjod pa'i don ni 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning of what is said to others is this.

original: gzung ba gsal ba'i rnam par snang ba gang yin pa 'di ni /
analyzed: gzung ba gsal ba'i rnam par snang ba gang yin pa 'di ni /
translated: That which appears as the clear aspect of the object

original: nang du zhugs pa blo de lkog tu gyur pa yin na /
analyzed: nang du zhugs pa blo de lkog tu gyur pa yin na /
translated: is the internal mind, and if the mind is hidden,

original: snang ba yang lkog tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: snang ba yang lkog tu 'gyur ro //
translated: then the appearance is also hidden.

original: des na snang ba yongs su gsal ba'i rang bzhin ni mi gsal ba nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na snang ba yongs su gsal ba'i rang bzhin ni mi gsal ba nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, the nature of the clear appearance would be unclear.

original: de lta yin dang rjes su dpag pa'i shes pa bzhin du don lkog tu gyur pa'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta yin dang rjes su dpag pa'i shes pa bzhin du don lkog tu gyur pa'i rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: If that were so, then like inferential cognition, the nature of the object would be hidden.

original: rjes su dpag pa la yang gsal bar snang ba lkog tu gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa la yang gsal bar snang ba lkog tu gyur pa yin no //
translated: In inference, the clear appearance is hidden.

original: gal te rjes su dpag pa'i shes pa de yang mi gsal ba'i rnam pa snang ba ma yin na ni der yang don rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te rjes su dpag pa'i shes pa de yang mi gsal ba'i rnam pa snang ba ma yin na ni der yang don rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: If the appearance of the inferential cognition is not in the form of an unclear image, then the object would be realized.

analyzed: gzhan gyis kyang ni de spyod 'gyur //

analyzed: gzung bar bya ba nyid kyis rig pa yin na /

analyzed: bdag nyid kyi bde ba rig pas bde ba nyid du 'gyur ro zhe na /

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /

analyzed: gzhan gyi tsan dan gyis sim par byed pa ni ma yin no //

original: 'on te yid dge ji ltar yin //
analyzed: 'on te yid dge ji ltar yin //

original: rang gi tsan dan gyis sim byed //
analyzed: rang gi tsan dan gyis sim byed //

original: gzhan gyi la ci de 'gyur ram //
analyzed: gzhan gyi la ci de 'gyur ram //

original: de ni gdung byed bdag nyid dam //
analyzed: de ni gdung byed bdag nyid dam //

original: yid dge min la tshul ji ltar //
analyzed: yid dge min la tshul ji ltar //

analyzed: de la rang gi bde skyes yin // gzhan gyi bde ba rig pa la /

original: 'di lta nyid du rab brten bya //
analyzed: 'di lta nyid du rab brten bya //

original: gang gi rang gi ma skyes pa //
analyzed: gang gi rang gi ma skyes pa //

original: de tshe ci ste 'di bden min //
analyzed: de tshe ci ste 'di bden min //

original: rang gi bde bas bde zhe na //
analyzed: rang gi bde bas bde zhe na //

original: ma yin rang bzhin dbyer med phyir //
analyzed: ma yin rang bzhin dbyer med phyir //

original: ring phyir de yi rang bzhin nyid //
analyzed: ring phyir de yi rang bzhin nyid //

original: rig na ring ba ci zhig yod //
analyzed: rig na ring ba ci zhig yod //

original: gal te ma rig phyir de lta //
analyzed: gal te ma rig phyir de lta //

original: min na rig na rang rig nyid //
analyzed: min na rig na rang rig nyid //

original: bdag nyid kun gyis reg pa ni //
analyzed: bdag nyid kun gyis reg pa ni //

original: rang rig gi ni mtshan nyid yin //
analyzed: rang rig gi ni mtshan nyid yin //

original: phyogs gcig gis ni reg yin na //
analyzed: phyogs gcig gis ni reg yin na //

analyzed: de las gzhan pa rig ma yin //

analyzed: bdag gam lus rang rig par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: rang rig pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: 'on te rjes su zhugs kyang bde ba rig par rnam par 'gyur ba ni ma yin te /

analyzed: ji ltar yang rung ba ni ma yin no //

original: gzhan gyi bde ba rig pa la ni /
analyzed: gzhan gyi bde ba rig pa la ni /

analyzed: gzhan gyi bde ba dang de las dngos su skyes pa ma yin no //

analyzed: de ni rtags las skyes pa yin te /

analyzed: yul las ni ma yin no //

analyzed: rjes su dpag pa'i sgo nas gzhan gyi bde ba rig pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: gal te blo rig gzhan min na //

analyzed: dmigs pa byed pa gzhan la yang //

analyzed: gnyis de gdon mi za bar yod //

analyzed: gzhan pha rol gyi bde ba la dmigs pas kyang de'i rang bzhin nyid 'dzin par byed pa yin te / des na der snang ba nyid ni khas blangs @102a * //

analyzed: pa nyid las grub pa nyid do //

analyzed: des na rtags las mthong ba ni ma yin gyi /

analyzed: mig la sogs ba dang mtshungs pa yin pa'i phyir don gyi de las skyes pa nyid du 'gyur ba'i gnyi gar 'gyur bas khyad par med do //

original: ci ste de las skyes min zhing //
analyzed: ci ste de las skyes min zhing //

original: der snang can yang ma yin no ;
analyzed: der snang can yang ma yin no ;

analyzed: mi 'dzin de ni cung zad kyang //

original: dngos min zhes kyang sngar bshad do //
analyzed: dngos min zhes kyang sngar bshad do //

analyzed: khas blangs pa ni tshad ma'i stobs la brten par 'gyur ba ma yin no //

original: des na don dam pa ni 'di nyid de /
analyzed: des na don dam pa ni 'di nyid de /

analyzed: blo rtags las skyes par mi rigs pa dang / der snang ba yang ma yin pa nyid na ni de lta na ni /

analyzed: gal te spyi snang ba yin te /

analyzed: 'o na ni blo yang de'i rnam pas stong pa nyid de /

original: des ni 'di'i blo'i rnam par yang mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: des ni 'di'i blo'i rnam par yang mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: Therefore, the aspect of the cognition of that does not occur.

original: de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni ma yin te /
translated: That is not so, because

original: blo ni nye bar gzhag pa yis //
analyzed: blo ni nye bar gzhag pa yis //

analyzed: de dang de 'brel par rig pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Because it is known in connection with that.

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, it is not,

original: gzhan la 'brel pa rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan la 'brel pa rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //

original: gzhan gyi rig min rang @102b bzhin ni //
analyzed: gzhan gyi rig min rang @102b bzhin ni //

original: khyod kyi yin zhes brjod pa de //
analyzed: khyod kyi yin zhes brjod pa de //
translated: You say, ‚ÄúIt is yours.‚Äù

original: rgyal po'i bka' byung the ma skas kyi //
analyzed: rgyal po'i bka' byung the ma skas kyi //
translated: The king‚Äôs order is like a ladder

original: rim pas steng du gnas pa yin //
analyzed: rim pas steng du gnas pa yin //
translated: by which you ascend to the higher.

original: dpyod pa byed pa gzhan dag kyang khyod la rig pa 'di lta bu yod do zhes nges par byed pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: dpyod pa byed pa gzhan dag kyang khyod la rig pa 'di lta bu yod do zhes nges par byed pa ni ma yin te /

original: 'di nyid kyis rtogs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di nyid kyis rtogs pa ma yin te /

original: 'di 'di'i ma yin no zhes rtogs pa'i phyir ro ;
analyzed: 'di 'di'i ma yin no zhes rtogs pa'i phyir ro ;

analyzed: /'on te gzhan gyis kyang rang bzhin de nyid rtogs pa yin no //
translated: But if the nature of the other is understood,

original: de lta na 'ang bde ba la spyod pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de lta na 'ang bde ba la spyod pa ni ma yin no //

original: bde ba spyod pa'i mngon sum gyis yin gyi /
analyzed: bde ba spyod pa'i mngon sum gyis yin gyi /

original: rjes su dpag pas ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: rjes su dpag pas ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: not through inference.

original: 'di la brjod pa /
analyzed: 'di la brjod pa /
translated: In response to this, we say:

original: gal te de la 'dzin byed kyang //
analyzed: gal te de la 'dzin byed kyang //
translated: If you grasp it,

original: mngon sum nyid ni min zhe na //
analyzed: mngon sum nyid ni min zhe na //
translated: If you say that it is not direct perception,

original: don mtshungs tha dad de gang las //
analyzed: don mtshungs tha dad de gang las //
translated: then how can it be different, having the same object?

original: rang gi ngo bo mngon du byed pa nyid ni mngon sum yin no zhes bstan zin te /
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo mngon du byed pa nyid ni mngon sum yin no zhes bstan zin te /
translated: It has been explained that direct perception is the manifestation of its own nature.

original: des na rnam pa mtshungs bdag la dbye ba mi 'thad do //
analyzed: des na rnam pa mtshungs bdag la dbye ba mi 'thad do //
translated: Therefore, it is not tenable that there is a difference in the aspect of the object.

original: rgyu'i dbye ba tha dad do zhe na /
analyzed: rgyu'i dbye ba tha dad do zhe na /
translated: If you say that there is a difference in the cause,

original: 'o na ni rang gi ngo bo tha dad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'o na ni rang gi ngo bo tha dad par 'gyur ro //
translated: then there would be a difference in its own nature.

original: gal te rgyu tha dad pa med pa mi 'thad pa'i phyir rgyu tha dad par khas len pa de lta na yang tha dad pa ni rang gi ngo bo kho nar rigs so //
analyzed: gal te rgyu tha dad pa med pa mi 'thad pa'i phyir rgyu tha dad par khas len pa de lta na yang tha dad pa ni rang gi ngo bo kho nar rigs so //
translated: If you accept that there is a difference in the cause because it is untenable that there is no difference in the cause, then even in that case, the difference would be reasonable only in its own nature.

original: gnyi ga'i rang bzhin yang mngon du byed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir rgyu tha dad par yang mi rigs so //
analyzed: gnyi ga'i rang bzhin yang mngon du byed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir rgyu tha dad par yang mi rigs so //
translated: And because the nature of both is the manifestation of its own nature, it is also unreasonable that there is a difference in the cause.

original: mthong ngo zhe na /
analyzed: mthong ngo zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is seen,

original: rang gi ngo bo tha dad par yang khas blang dgos so //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo tha dad par yang khas blang dgos so //
translated: then you must accept that there is a difference in its own nature.

original: des rnam pa mtshungs pa nyid mi rung ngo //
analyzed: des rnam pa mtshungs pa nyid mi rung ngo //
translated: Therefore, it is not reasonable that there is sameness in the aspect of the object.

original: 'on te rgyu'i bye brag las rtogs pa'i rang bzhin nyid khyad par yod pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te rgyu'i bye brag las rtogs pa'i rang bzhin nyid khyad par yod pa yin no zhe na /
translated: Or, is it that the nature of the cognition itself is different, due to the difference of the cause?

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, it is not so.

original: rtogs pa khyad par yod kyang gsal ba'i rnam pa nyid ni mngon sum yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtogs pa khyad par yod kyang gsal ba'i rnam pa nyid ni mngon sum yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Even though the cognition is different, the aspect of the manifestation is perception.

original: ma mthong don gcig ldan sogs kyis //
analyzed: ma mthong don gcig ldan sogs kyis //
translated: The cognition of the other‚Äôs pleasure is not perception, because it is not the cognition of the same object, etc.

original: gal te myong bas nges yin na //
analyzed: gal te myong bas nges yin na //
translated: If it is ascertained by experience,

original: gzhan ni rnam kun mi 'dzin 'gyur //
analyzed: gzhan ni rnam kun mi 'dzin 'gyur //
translated: then the other‚Äôs cognition would not grasp everything.

original: myong ba'i dbye ba bsal zin to //
analyzed: myong ba'i dbye ba bsal zin to //
translated: The division of experience has already been refuted.

original: ci ste yang rnam pa tha dad pa med kyang ma mthong ba'i dbang gis mngon sum dang cig shes su nges pa yin no //
analyzed: ci ste yang rnam pa tha dad pa med kyang ma mthong ba'i dbang gis mngon sum dang cig shes su nges pa yin no //
translated: Even if there is no difference in the aspect, it is ascertained as perception by the power of not seeing.

original: de bzhin du dbang po ldan pa la sogs pa /
analyzed: de bzhin du dbang po ldan pa la sogs pa /
translated: In the same way, it is by the possession of the sense faculty, etc.

original: don gcig la 'du ba la sogs pa las kyang yin no //
analyzed: don gcig la 'du ba la sogs pa las kyang yin no //
translated: and by the combination of the same object, etc.

original: 'di ltar bdag gi bdag dang 'du ba'i bde ba ni bdag gi yin la /
analyzed: 'di ltar bdag gi bdag dang 'du ba'i bde ba ni bdag gi yin la /
translated: Thus, the pleasure of the combination with the self is mine,

original: gzhan gyi ni de lta bu ma yin no des na gzhan gyi bde ba rig pa na bde ba nyid du 'gyur ba ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gzhan gyi ni de lta bu ma yin no des na gzhan gyi bde ba rig pa na bde ba nyid du 'gyur ba ma yin no zhe na /
translated: but the other‚Äôs is not like that. Therefore, when the other‚Äôs pleasure is known, it does not become pleasure for oneself.

original: gal te mngon sum du byed pa nyid yod pa'i phyir rnam pa tha dad pa med kyang mngon sum dang / mngon sum ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid du nges pa yin na de'i tshe /
analyzed: gal te mngon sum du byed pa nyid yod pa'i phyir rnam pa tha dad pa med kyang mngon sum dang / mngon sum ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid du nges pa yin na de'i tshe /
translated: If, although the aspects are not different, there is a definite difference between direct perception and non-direct perception because of the existence of the act of direct perception,

original: @103a * // mngon sum nyid la yang mngon sum dang mngon sum ma yin par nges pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: @103a * // mngon sum nyid la yang mngon sum dang mngon sum ma yin par nges pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: then at that time, even in direct perception, there would be a definite difference between direct perception and non-direct perception.

original: de lta yin na yang don tha dad par brtags pas ci zhig bya ste /
analyzed: de lta yin na yang don tha dad par brtags pas ci zhig bya ste /
translated: Even if that were so, what would be the use of imagining a difference in object?

original: ma mthong ba dang ldan pas dngos po gcig nyid de lta bu ma yin bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: ma mthong ba dang ldan pas dngos po gcig nyid de lta bu ma yin bar 'gyur te /
translated: That one thing would not be as it is because of the possession of non-seeing.

original: bde ba nyid sdugs sngal la sogs pa yin no zhes so //
analyzed: bde ba nyid sdugs sngal la sogs pa yin no zhes so //
translated: It would be as if pleasure were pain, etc.

original: des na tha dad par yang mi rigs so //
analyzed: des na tha dad par yang mi rigs so //

original: 'di yang ma mthong ba'i bye brag nyid las yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'di yang ma mthong ba'i bye brag nyid las yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that this is also due to the difference of non-seeing,

original: 'gyur mod rang rig pa'i rnam pa tha dad pa yang de bzhin du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'gyur mod rang rig pa'i rnam pa tha dad pa yang de bzhin du 'gyur ro //
translated: it is so, but the difference of the aspects of self-awareness would be the same.

original: de nyid kyi phyir gzhan rnam pa thams cad du 'dzin par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir gzhan rnam pa thams cad du 'dzin par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: For that very reason, the other would not apprehend in any way.

original: don mtshungs pa la myong ba tha dad pa yang bsal zin pa nyid do //
analyzed: don mtshungs pa la myong ba tha dad pa yang bsal zin pa nyid do //
translated: The objection that the experience of the object is different from the experience of the cognition has already been refuted.

original: mig la sogs pa yang gsal ba tha dad pa nyid las brtag pa yin te /
analyzed: mig la sogs pa yang gsal ba tha dad pa nyid las brtag pa yin te /
translated: The eye, etc. are also postulated on the basis of the difference in the manifestation.üîΩThus:

original: 'di ltar / dang po gsal ba mthong gyur pa //
analyzed: 'di ltar / dang po gsal ba mthong gyur pa //
translated: The manifestation is first seen.

original: de la mngon sum nyid du gnas //
analyzed: de la mngon sum nyid du gnas //
translated: It is present as direct perception.

original: mi gsal bar ni rtogs pa de //
analyzed: mi gsal bar ni rtogs pa de //
translated: The cognition of the non-manifest

original: mngon sum bdag nyid du mthong min //
analyzed: mngon sum bdag nyid du mthong min //
translated: is not seen as direct perception.

original: gsal ba nyid dang dkar po rtogs pas yul du byas pas na 'jig rten mngon sum nyid du byas pa yin no //
analyzed: gsal ba nyid dang dkar po rtogs pas yul du byas pas na 'jig rten mngon sum nyid du byas pa yin no //
translated: The manifestation itself is the object, because it is the object of the cognition of the white, etc.

original: gang gi phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir /
translated: Therefore,

original: mig la sogs pa'i rgyu yod kyang /
analyzed: mig la sogs pa'i rgyu yod kyang /
translated: even though the cause of the eye, etc. exists,

original: gang gi tshe gsal bar snang bar ma rtogs pa ni bdag gi 'ga' zhig mi gsal ba nyid du mthong ba yin na /
analyzed: gang gi tshe gsal bar snang bar ma rtogs pa ni bdag gi 'ga' zhig mi gsal ba nyid du mthong ba yin na /
translated: when the manifestation is not cognized, the non-manifest is seen by some as the self.

original: de mngon sum du rtogs pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni 'jig rten dag gcig pa kho na'o //
analyzed: de mngon sum du rtogs pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di ni 'jig rten dag gcig pa kho na'o //
translated: That is not cognized as direct perception. This is exactly the same for the world.

original: 'on te gsal ba nyid du 'gyur ba'i dbang po las skyes pa ni mngon sum yin no //
analyzed: 'on te gsal ba nyid du 'gyur ba'i dbang po las skyes pa ni mngon sum yin no //
translated: Or, that which arises from the sense faculty that becomes the manifestation is direct perception.

original: 'di ltar / gsal las yang dag 'dzin pa nyid //
analyzed: 'di ltar / gsal las yang dag 'dzin pa nyid //
translated: From the clear, there is the very apprehension of the real.üîΩFrom the sense faculty, there is the very awareness.

original: dbang po las ni nye bar rig / gnyis med phyir na gnyis po ni //
analyzed: dbang po las ni nye bar rig / gnyis med phyir na gnyis po ni //
translated: Since there is no duality, the two

analyzed: nye bar gnas pa nyid dang gsal ba nyid du rtogs pa'i yul gang yin pa de nyid 'jig rten mngon sum du 'dod pa yin no //

analyzed: dbang po med par ni nye bar gnas pa rtogs pa yin pas /
translated: Since there is no awareness of the presence of an object without a sense faculty,

analyzed: de'i yan lag ma tshang ba'i phyir mngon sum ma yin par 'gyur ro zhe na /

original: de ni mi rung ste 'di ltar /
analyzed: de ni mi rung ste 'di ltar /
translated: That is not correct, because:üîΩThe near and the distant are not the cause

original: nye ba dang ni gzhan pa dag / mngon sum cig shos rgyu ma yin //
analyzed: nye ba dang ni gzhan pa dag / mngon sum cig shos rgyu ma yin //
translated: of the other direct perception.

original: gzhan du bya rgod la sogs pa'i //
analyzed: gzhan du bya rgod la sogs pa'i //
translated: Otherwise, the vulture‚Äôs

analyzed: des na de dag gi rig pa mngon sum ma yin par 'gyur ram ci /

original: 'on te @103b de yang /
analyzed: 'on te @103b de yang /

original: de yi gsal ba de nyid ni //
analyzed: de yi gsal ba de nyid ni //
translated: then the clarity of that object

analyzed: thag ring min zhes rjod byed de //
translated: is not distant, it is said.

original: dang po'i nus pa la ltos nas //
analyzed: dang po'i nus pa la ltos nas //
translated: In dependence on the capacity of the first,

original: ring dang mi ring rnam par gnas //
analyzed: ring dang mi ring rnam par gnas //

analyzed: gang zhig gsal ba nyid du blta bar nus pa de nyid ring ba ma yin no zhe na /
translated: If it is seen as clear, then that very object is not distant.

original: gal te de lta na yang /
analyzed: gal te de lta na yang /
translated: But even if that is so,

original: gsal bar mthong ba thams cad ni //üîΩgal te thag ring mi 'dod na //
analyzed: gsal bar mthong ba thams cad ni // gal te thag ring mi 'dod na //
translated: all that is seen as clearüîΩif it is not accepted as distant,

analyzed: de min na 'di thag ring bas //

original: dbang po 'di yi rgyu ma yin //
analyzed: dbang po 'di yi rgyu ma yin //

analyzed: thams cad du gzhan gyi bde ba rig pa na bde ba nyid du 'gyur te /

original: mngon sum du byas pas so //
analyzed: mngon sum du byas pas so //

original: myong la nyams myong mtshungs pa na //
analyzed: myong la nyams myong mtshungs pa na //
translated: of others,

analyzed: de yang de bzhin gdung bar 'gyur //

translated: The yogis who are not logicians, such as the Lokayatas and the Carvakas,

original: de ni nges pa mngon sum gyis gzhan gyi bde ba la sogs pa rig pa na rnal 'byor pa de dag kyang /
analyzed: de ni nges pa mngon sum gyis gzhan gyi bde ba la sogs pa rig pa na rnal 'byor pa de dag kyang /

analyzed: 'dod chags la sogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro //

original: 'on te / gsal te yul dbang dus med pas //
analyzed: 'on te / gsal te yul dbang dus med pas //

original: de las 'byung ba'i sdug bsngal ni //
analyzed: de las 'byung ba'i sdug bsngal ni //

original: de dag la ni skye min na //
analyzed: de dag la ni skye min na //
translated: does not arise for them.

original: 'on te gang la dbang po dang yul phrad pas bde ba la sogs pas skye ba de nyid la sogs pa tha snyad bya bar 'os pa yin no //
analyzed: 'on te gang la dbang po dang yul phrad pas bde ba la sogs pas skye ba de nyid la sogs pa tha snyad bya bar 'os pa yin no //
translated: But it is appropriate to designate as pleasure, etc., that which arises from the contact of sense faculty and object.

original: rnal 'byor pa la ni bud med la sogs pa'i yul dang phrad pa las bde ba la sogs pa skye ba ma yin te /
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa la ni bud med la sogs pa'i yul dang phrad pa las bde ba la sogs pa skye ba ma yin te /
translated: For the yogi, pleasure, etc., do not arise from contact with objects such as women.

original: des na de ltar 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: des na de ltar 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is not like that.

original: gal te dbang po dang yul las skyes pa ma yin na ni /
analyzed: gal te dbang po dang yul las skyes pa ma yin na ni /
translated: If it does not arise from sense faculty and object,

original: bde ba la sogs pa de de'i yin no zhe na /
analyzed: bde ba la sogs pa de de'i yin no zhe na /
translated: then that pleasure, etc., is not of that.

original: de yang mi rung ste /
analyzed: de yang mi rung ste /
translated: That also is not correct.üîΩThus:

original: 'di ltar / sdug bsngal skye ba 'gyur nyid ni //
analyzed: 'di ltar / sdug bsngal skye ba 'gyur nyid ni //
translated: The arising of suffering is just suffering.

original: sdug bsngal myong min 'on kyang ni //
analyzed: sdug bsngal myong min 'on kyang ni //
translated: But it is not the experience of suffering.

original: sdug bsngal shes pa skyes pa yin //
analyzed: sdug bsngal shes pa skyes pa yin //
translated: Rather, the arising of the knowledge of suffering.

original: gang gi phyir /
analyzed: gang gi phyir /
translated: Because:

original: sdug bsngal la sogs myong min par //
analyzed: sdug bsngal la sogs myong min par //
translated: Without the experience of suffering, etc.,

original: gdung dang phan 'dogs rgyu ma yin //üîΩ'di ltar / phan tshun lus kyi dbang po phrad pa las byung ba /
analyzed: gdung dang phan 'dogs rgyu ma yin // 'di ltar / phan tshun lus kyi dbang po phrad pa las byung ba /
translated: there is no cause for harm or benefit.üîΩThus:

original: skyes pa dang bud med kyi bde ba @104a * //
analyzed: skyes pa dang bud med kyi bde ba @104a * //
translated: The pleasure of men and women arises from the contact of their respective sense faculties.

original: la spu ldang ba la sogs pa skyed par byed pa'i cha thun mong ma yin nam /
analyzed: la spu ldang ba la sogs pa skyed par byed pa'i cha thun mong ma yin nam /
translated: Is the aspect that generates the bristling of the hairs, etc. not unshared?

original: de lta'o zhe na thun mong du dga' ba nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta'o zhe na thun mong du dga' ba nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: If you say that it is, then pleasure would be shared.

original: de'i phyir rang rig pa yin na bde ba nyid du 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: de'i phyir rang rig pa yin na bde ba nyid du 'gyur gyi /
translated: Therefore, if there is self-awareness, there would be pleasure.

original: gzhan du ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan du ni ma yin no //
translated: But it is not so.

original: rang rig pa tsam ni skye ba tsam dang / mig la sogs pa dang ldan pa yang med pa ma yin pas na bde ba nyid gnyi ga la yang mtshungs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rang rig pa tsam ni skye ba tsam dang / mig la sogs pa dang ldan pa yang med pa ma yin pas na bde ba nyid gnyi ga la yang mtshungs par 'gyur ro //
translated: Since mere self-awareness is merely produced and is not without the eye, etc., pleasure would be the same for both.

original: de la der goms pa med pa'i phyir ro zhe na ma yin te /
analyzed: de la der goms pa med pa'i phyir ro zhe na ma yin te /
translated: If you say that it is not so because there is no cultivation of that,

original: goms pas ni bde ba tsam byed pa yin na /
analyzed: goms pas ni bde ba tsam byed pa yin na /
translated: then if cultivation merely produces pleasure,

original: de ni skyes pa'i phyir myong ba mtshungs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ni skyes pa'i phyir myong ba mtshungs par 'gyur ro //
translated: since it is produced, there would be the same experience.

original: khyed la rnam par dbye ba 'di ji ltar zhe na /üîΩbshad pa / gang tshe rang nyid sdug bsngal gyi //
analyzed: khyed la rnam par dbye ba 'di ji ltar zhe na / bshad pa / gang tshe rang nyid sdug bsngal gyi //
translated: How is this distinction for you?üîΩIt is said:üîΩWhen one‚Äôs own nature

original: rang gi ngo bor snang ba ni //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bor snang ba ni //
translated: appears as the nature of suffering,

original: gdung yin de mi shes min pa //
analyzed: gdung yin de mi shes min pa //
translated: it is not that it is not known.

original: de tshe de ltar thal mi 'gyur //
analyzed: de tshe de ltar thal mi 'gyur //
translated: At that time, it is not the case that such a consequence would follow.

original: gang zhig bde ba rang rig pa de ni /
analyzed: gang zhig bde ba rang rig pa de ni /
translated: That which is the self-awareness of pleasure,

original: bde ba nyid la rnal 'byor ba gang gzhan gyi bde ba la sogs pa dmigs pa tsam gyi rnal 'byor ba de ni chags pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: bde ba nyid la rnal 'byor ba gang gzhan gyi bde ba la sogs pa dmigs pa tsam gyi rnal 'byor ba de ni chags pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: that yogin is not one who is attached, etc. because he is a yogin who has as his object only the pleasure of others, etc.

original: des na rnal 'byor pa de dag de'i sdug bsngal la sogs pas gdung bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na rnal 'byor pa de dag de'i sdug bsngal la sogs pas gdung bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, those yogins are not tormented by the suffering of others, etc.

original: me la sogs pa myong ba'i ji ltar gdung zhe na /
analyzed: me la sogs pa myong ba'i ji ltar gdung zhe na /
translated: How can they be tormented by the experience of fire, etc.?

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: No, they cannot be,

original: rnal 'byor pa la de med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa la de med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are yogins, and that does not exist for them.

original: gzhan la ji ltar 'gyur ce na /
analyzed: gzhan la ji ltar 'gyur ce na /
translated: How can it be otherwise for others?

original: me la sogs pa ni de lta bu nyid rigs pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: me la sogs pa ni de lta bu nyid rigs pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not reasonable that fire, etc.

original: rang rig pas byed pa'i bde ba la sogs pa gang yin pa de dag ni de las gzhan du ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang rig pas byed pa'i bde ba la sogs pa gang yin pa de dag ni de las gzhan du ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: are like that, and because those pleasures, etc. which are produced by self-awareness are not other than that.

original: rig pa thams cad myong bar mtshungs par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: rig pa thams cad myong bar mtshungs par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: All cognitions are not the same in their experience.

original: des na shes pa thams cad kyis //
analyzed: des na shes pa thams cad kyis //
translated: Therefore, all cognitions

original: dmigs myong dag ni tha dad yin //
analyzed: dmigs myong dag ni tha dad yin //
translated: have different objects and experiences.

original: don dang 'du ba dmigs ba de //
analyzed: don dang 'du ba dmigs ba de //
translated: The object, the collection, and the perception are

original: rang rig gsal ba dag myong yin //
analyzed: rang rig gsal ba dag myong yin //
translated: the experience of the clear self-awareness.

original: de'i rnam par 'jog par nus pa ni myong ba'i dmigs pa yin la /
analyzed: de'i rnam par 'jog par nus pa ni myong ba'i dmigs pa yin la /
translated: The object of experience is that which is able to posit its aspects.

original: bdag gi ngo bo rang nyid gsal ba ni rig pa yin no //
analyzed: bdag gi ngo bo rang nyid gsal ba ni rig pa yin no //
translated: The clear self-nature is awareness.

original: des na bde ba dang rig pa gdung bar byed kyi de'i rnam pa nye bar 'jog pa tsam gyis ni ma yin no //
analyzed: des na bde ba dang rig pa gdung bar byed kyi de'i rnam pa nye bar 'jog pa tsam gyis ni ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, pleasure and awareness are experienced, not merely the positing of their aspects.

original: de nyid la khyad par ci yod ce na /
analyzed: de nyid la khyad par ci yod ce na /
translated: What is the difference between them?

original: don dam par ni ci yang med de /
analyzed: don dam par ni ci yang med de /
translated: Ultimately, there is nothing at all.

original: bde ba dang de'i rnam pa ni khyad par 'ga' yang med do //
analyzed: bde ba dang de'i rnam pa ni khyad par 'ga' yang med do //
translated: There is no difference between pleasure and its aspects.

original: 'on kyang bdag nyid des zin par sems pa nang gi sdug bsngal lo zhes nges par zad do //
analyzed: 'on kyang bdag nyid des zin par sems pa nang gi sdug bsngal lo zhes nges par zad do //
translated: However, when the mind is grasped by that [pleasure], it is definitely internal suffering.

original: rnal 'byor pa rnams ni de lta ma yin pas na de bzhin nyid du bde ba nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa rnams ni de lta ma yin pas na de bzhin nyid du bde ba nyid ma yin no //
translated: Yogis do not have that, so it is not pleasure in reality.

original: de'i phyir rnam par shes @104b pa ni rang rig pa nyid de /
analyzed: de'i phyir rnam par shes @104b pa ni rang rig pa nyid de /
translated: Therefore, consciousness is self-awareness.

original: de lta ma yin na bde ba la sogs pa'i rnam par dbye ba srid pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na bde ba la sogs pa'i rnam par dbye ba srid pa ma yin no //
translated: Otherwise, the distinction of pleasure and so on would not be possible.

original: shes rab la sogs pa goms pa'i khyad par nyid las ma yin nam /
analyzed: shes rab la sogs pa goms pa'i khyad par nyid las ma yin nam /
translated: Is it not the case that the difference in the degree of habituation to wisdom, etc.

original: de dag na snang bzhin pa'i don dang mi mthun pa ma yin na //
analyzed: de dag na snang bzhin pa'i don dang mi mthun pa ma yin na //
translated: is not in accord with the object that appears to them?

original: don de yang shes rab la sogs pa'i rang bzhin ni ma yin te /
analyzed: don de yang shes rab la sogs pa'i rang bzhin ni ma yin te /
translated: And that object is not of the nature of wisdom, etc.

original: de la goms pas mi 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la goms pas mi 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because one does not engage in it through habituation to it.

original: de la goms pas don mngon par 'du byed pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: de la goms pas don mngon par 'du byed pa ni ma yin no //
translated: Habituation to it does not produce the object.

original: de'i phyir don las tha dad pa'i shes rab de ni rnam pa dang bcas pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir don las tha dad pa'i shes rab de ni rnam pa dang bcas pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, that wisdom which is different from the object has an aspect.

original: shes rab la sogs pa rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ma yin pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: shes rab la sogs pa rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ma yin pa ma yin nam /
translated: But is it not the case that wisdom, etc. are not of the nature of consciousness?

original: des de rnam pa med pa yin yang rnam par shes pa rnam pa med par mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: des de rnam pa med pa yin yang rnam par shes pa rnam pa med par mi 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: Even though it does not have an aspect, consciousness does not become devoid of aspects.

original: de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni ma yin te /
translated: That is not so.

original: shes rab de ni rnam byed de //
analyzed: shes rab de ni rnam byed de //
translated: That wisdom is a mental factor.

original: ci ltar de 'dzin yid kyang yin //
analyzed: ci ltar de 'dzin yid kyang yin //
translated: How is it a mental consciousness?

original: de don 'dzin yang don rnams ni //
analyzed: de don 'dzin yang don rnams ni //
translated: The object of that is also an object.

original: med na de phyir rnam shes kyang //
analyzed: med na de phyir rnam shes kyang //
translated: But if the object does not exist, then consciousness does not exist.

original: gal te shes rab don gyi khyad par 'dzin pa yin yang rnam par shes pa yin na ni /
analyzed: gal te shes rab don gyi khyad par 'dzin pa yin yang rnam par shes pa yin na ni /
translated: If wisdom is a consciousness that apprehends the particular object,

original: rnam par shes pa yang rnam pa med par don ci ste mi 'dzin /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa yang rnam pa med par don ci ste mi 'dzin /
translated: then why does consciousness not apprehend the object without a form?

original: de yang rnam pa med du zad mod ce na /
analyzed: de yang rnam pa med du zad mod ce na /
translated: And that also would be without a form.

original: de ni mi rung ste 'di ltar /
analyzed: de ni mi rung ste 'di ltar /
translated: That is not correct.

original: shes rab ces kyang skad cig la //
analyzed: shes rab ces kyang skad cig la //
translated: In one moment, wisdom

original: dag pa'i don ni snang ba yin //
analyzed: dag pa'i don ni snang ba yin //
translated: appears as a pure object.

original: de yang rjes dpag gzhan dag ni //
analyzed: de yang rjes dpag gzhan dag ni //
translated: And the other inferences

original: shes rab nyid du mi 'thad phyir ;
analyzed: shes rab nyid du mi 'thad phyir ;
translated: are not tenable as wisdom.

original: / de yang rnam pa dang bcas pa yin no zhes bstan cing ston par 'gyur ba nyid do //
analyzed: / de yang rnam pa dang bcas pa yin no zhes bstan cing ston par 'gyur ba nyid do //
translated: And that also has a form. This has been taught and will be taught.

original: gal te rnam par shes pa rang rig par mi 'dod na /
analyzed: gal te rnam par shes pa rang rig par mi 'dod na /
translated: If you do not accept that consciousness is reflexive awareness,

original: de'i tshe don 'ga' yang rtogs pa med pa'i phyir tha snyad med pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe don 'ga' yang rtogs pa med pa'i phyir tha snyad med pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: then there would be no realization of any object at all, and so there would be no conventions.

original: de la bshad pa ni /
analyzed: de la bshad pa ni /
translated: The explanation of that is as follows.

original: gzhan yang mngon sum med pa na //üîΩblo ni rtags la ltos par 'gyur //
analyzed: gzhan yang mngon sum med pa na // blo ni rtags la ltos par 'gyur //
translated: Moreover, if there is no perception,üîΩthe mind would rely on a reason.

original: de yang dbang po don nam blo //
analyzed: de yang dbang po don nam blo //
translated: And that would be a sense object or the mind.

original: yang na yid byed snga mar 'gyur //
analyzed: yang na yid byed snga mar 'gyur //
translated: or else, it is the former attention.

original: rgyu 'bras tshogs pa 'di dag las //
analyzed: rgyu 'bras tshogs pa 'di dag las //
translated: From this collection of causes and effects,

original: 'brel pa can gzhan yod min te //
analyzed: 'brel pa can gzhan yod min te //
translated: there is no other related entity.

original: nus pa mthong ba med phyir ro //
analyzed: nus pa mthong ba med phyir ro //
translated: Because a capacity is not seen.

original: de la 'khrul phyir dbang po min //
analyzed: de la 'khrul phyir dbang po min //
translated: The sense faculty is not the cause, because of error.

original: mngon sum nyid ma yin pa na lkog tu gyur pa'i yul can rjes su dpag pa dang 'jug pa yin /
analyzed: mngon sum nyid ma yin pa na lkog tu gyur pa'i yul can rjes su dpag pa dang 'jug pa yin /
translated: When it is not direct perception, it is inference or testimony that has an imperceptible object.

original: de yang rtags las yin la /
analyzed: de yang rtags las yin la /
translated: And that is from a logical reason.

original: rtags de yang dbang po la sogs pa'i yid la byed pa'i mthar thug pa yin te /
analyzed: rtags de yang dbang po la sogs pa'i yid la byed pa'i mthar thug pa yin te /
translated: And that logical reason is ultimately based on the attention of the sense faculties and so on,

original: 'brel pa dang ldan pa gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'brel pa dang ldan pa gzhan med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no other related entity.

original: don gyis go ba yang 'brel pa mthong ba nyid las yin no //üîΩde ni mthong ba gzhan du mi 'jug pa'i @105a * //
analyzed: don gyis go ba yang 'brel pa mthong ba nyid las yin no // de ni mthong ba gzhan du mi 'jug pa'i @105a * //
translated: Understanding the meaning is also from seeing the relation.üîΩThat is because it engages in the seen,

original: phyir ro zhes bya bas 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyir ro zhes bya bas 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it does not engage in the unseen.

original: de la re zhig dbang po ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de la re zhig dbang po ni ma yin te /
translated: In that regard, the sense faculty is not the cause,

original: 'khrul pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'khrul pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because of error.

original: rtags ni 'khrul pa med pa yin na /
analyzed: rtags ni 'khrul pa med pa yin na /
translated: If the logical reason is without error,

original: dbang po ni /
analyzed: dbang po ni /
translated: the sense faculty

original: de lta ma yin par mi 'thad pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de lta ma yin par mi 'thad pa ma yin te /
translated: is not tenable as that.

original: rgyu nyid du khas blang bar bya'o //
analyzed: rgyu nyid du khas blang bar bya'o //
translated: It must be accepted that it is the cause.

original: nus pa yang 'bras bu ma mthong bar mi nges so ;
analyzed: nus pa yang 'bras bu ma mthong bar mi nges so ;
translated: And the capacity is not ascertained without seeing the effect.

original: / don yang de bzhin /
analyzed: / don yang de bzhin /
translated: And the object is also like that.

original: yang dbang po bzhin du 'khrul pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yang dbang po bzhin du 'khrul pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And also because of error, like the sense faculties.

original: blo yid byed /
analyzed: blo yid byed /
translated: The mind is the mental activity.

original: shes yin de yang ma grub nyid //
analyzed: shes yin de yang ma grub nyid //
translated: And that is not established.

original: blo ni rtags ma yin te /
analyzed: blo ni rtags ma yin te /
translated: The mind is not the reason,

original: de ni bsgrub nyid yin pas ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni bsgrub nyid yin pas ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the thesis itself and is not established.

original: yid la byed pa yang sngar gyi blo de nyid yin la /
analyzed: yid la byed pa yang sngar gyi blo de nyid yin la /
translated: The mental activity is just that previous mind.

original: dar yang skyes pa'i dus su ma grub na //
analyzed: dar yang skyes pa'i dus su ma grub na //
translated: And if it is not established at the time of arising,

original: gzhan gyi tshe ji ltar grub /
analyzed: gzhan gyi tshe ji ltar grub /
translated: how could it be established at another time?üîΩThus:

original: 'di ltar / ma grub pa ni rtags nyid min //
analyzed: 'di ltar / ma grub pa ni rtags nyid min //
translated: The nonestablished is not the reason.

original: rtags ni grub par 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: rtags ni grub par 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: The reason is the established.

original: de lta ma yin par rtags nyid yin na ni /
analyzed: de lta ma yin par rtags nyid yin na ni /
translated: If it were not so, and the reason itself were not established,

original: thams cad rtags nyid du 'gyur bas thams cad kyi thams cad grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thams cad rtags nyid du 'gyur bas thams cad kyi thams cad grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: then everything would be the reason, and everything would be established.

original: ci ste yang re zhig gsal bar 'gyur ba'i don ni mngon sum du grub pha nyid do //
analyzed: ci ste yang re zhig gsal bar 'gyur ba'i don ni mngon sum du grub pha nyid do //
translated: But if the object that is to be clarified is established by direct perception itself,üîΩand

original: de lta ma yin na don zhes bya bar yod par mi 'gyur bas tha snyad med par 'gyur ba'i phyir 'gro ba long zhing lkugs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na don zhes bya bar yod par mi 'gyur bas tha snyad med par 'gyur ba'i phyir 'gro ba long zhing lkugs par 'gyur ro //
translated: If it were not so, then the so-called object would not exist, and so there would be no conventions, and the world would be blind and dumb.

original: don yod pa tsam las kyang don gsal bar 'gyur ba ma yin te /
analyzed: don yod pa tsam las kyang don gsal bar 'gyur ba ma yin te /
translated: And the object is not manifested by the mere existence of the object,

original: de lta ma yin na thams cad gsal bar thal bas thams cad mthong bar thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na thams cad gsal bar thal bas thams cad mthong bar thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: because if it were so, then it would follow, absurdly, that everything would be manifested, and so it would follow, absurdly, that everyone would see everything.

original: des na gang la don gsal ba nyid du gyur pa de ni blo yin no //
analyzed: des na gang la don gsal ba nyid du gyur pa de ni blo yin no //
translated: Therefore that which is the manifestation of the object is the mind.

original: de nyid kyi phyir te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir te /
translated: It is for that reason that

original: ma shes par ni blo gsal yang dmigs pa med de /
analyzed: ma shes par ni blo gsal yang dmigs pa med de /
translated: even though the mind is clear, without the object being known, it is not perceived.

original: shes pa ni rjes su dpag pa las rtogs so zhes bshad pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: shes pa ni rjes su dpag pa las rtogs so zhes bshad pa yin no zhe na /
translated: It is understood through inference that there is consciousness.

original: 'di la la na /
analyzed: 'di la la na /
translated: To this we reply:

original: gal te don gsal rtogs yin par //
analyzed: gal te don gsal rtogs yin par //
translated: If you accept that the object is manifested by the mind,

original: 'dod na de nyid shes min nam //
analyzed: 'dod na de nyid shes min nam //
translated: then is it not the case that the mind itself is not known?

original: 'dis ni gsal 'gyur don gsal te //
analyzed: 'dis ni gsal 'gyur don gsal te //
translated: The object is manifested by that which is clear,

original: gsal ba nyams su myong min na //
analyzed: gsal ba nyams su myong min na //
translated: but if the clear mind is not experienced,

original: de yis gsal 'gyur mi nges phyir //
analyzed: de yis gsal 'gyur mi nges phyir //
translated: then it is not ascertained that it is that which is clear.

original: gal te gsal ba rtags yin na //
analyzed: gal te gsal ba rtags yin na //
translated: If the clear mind is the reason,

original: 'on te gsal bar 'gyur pa'i don rtags yin yang bla ste rnam pa thams cad du gsal ba nyams su myong dgos te ;
analyzed: 'on te gsal bar 'gyur pa'i don rtags yin yang bla ste rnam pa thams cad du gsal ba nyams su myong dgos te ;
translated: But even if the meaning is clear, it is still necessary to experience it in all its aspects,

original: gsal bar gyur pa myong ba ni gsal bar myong ba sngon du 'gro ba can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gsal bar gyur pa myong ba ni gsal bar myong ba sngon du 'gro ba can yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the experience of the clear is preceded by the experience of the clear.

original: dus gcig gi tshe nyams su myong ba'i gsal ba ni gzhan gyi tshe khyad par gyur pa yin pa /
analyzed: dus gcig gi tshe nyams su myong ba'i gsal ba ni gzhan gyi tshe khyad par gyur pa yin pa /
translated: The clear that is experienced at one time is different at another time,

original: rnam pa thams cad du mngon sum gyis myong bar 'gyur ba yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad du mngon sum gyis myong bar 'gyur ba yin no //
translated: and it is experienced in all its aspects by perception.

original: rjes su dpag pas myong ba yin na ni @105b thug pa med do //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pas myong ba yin na ni @105b thug pa med do //
translated: If it is experienced by inference, there is an infinite regress.

original: don gyis gsal ba de mngon sum yin na ni /
analyzed: don gyis gsal ba de mngon sum yin na ni /
translated: If the clear meaning is perception,

original: blo yang mngon sum nyid do //
analyzed: blo yang mngon sum nyid do //
translated: then the mind is also perception.

original: des na gsal ba lkog tu gyur pa nyid kyis don lkog tu gyur te /
analyzed: des na gsal ba lkog tu gyur pa nyid kyis don lkog tu gyur te /
translated: Therefore, the meaning is hidden by the hiddenness of the clear,

original: des na rtags ma yin no //
analyzed: des na rtags ma yin no //
translated: and so it is not a reason.

original: 'on te las nyid du snang ba'i don gzung bar bya ba'i ming gi rnam grangs can gyi rtags yin no //
analyzed: 'on te las nyid du snang ba'i don gzung bar bya ba'i ming gi rnam grangs can gyi rtags yin no //
translated: But if the reason is the meaning that appears as the object to be grasped, which is a synonym for the name,

original: las nyid ni bya ba med bar 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: las nyid ni bya ba med bar 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: But the action itself does not become nonexistent.

original: bya ba yang blo yin no //
analyzed: bya ba yang blo yin no //
translated: And the action is the activity of the mind.

original: de smras pa ni /
analyzed: de smras pa ni /
translated: This is what he says:üîΩIt is perceived as direct perception,

original: de ni phyi rol yul dag dang // 'brel bas mngon sum nyid du dmigs //
analyzed: de ni phyi rol yul dag dang // 'brel bas mngon sum nyid du dmigs //
translated: because it is related to external objects.

original: 'di la brjod pa ni /
analyzed: 'di la brjod pa ni /
translated: The reply to this is:

original: las nyid 'gar yang gzhan du min //
analyzed: las nyid 'gar yang gzhan du min //
translated: The action itself is not anywhere else.

original: bya bas byas pa'i khyad par ni //
analyzed: bya bas byas pa'i khyad par ni //
translated: The distinction of the action that is done

original: bya ba tsam nyid rjes dpog 'gyur //
analyzed: bya ba tsam nyid rjes dpog 'gyur //
translated: is inferred to be just the action itself.

original: gal te las nyid ces bya ba //
analyzed: gal te las nyid ces bya ba //
translated: If the so-called action

original: bya ba byas pa'i khyad par yin na byas pa tsam nyid du rjes su dpag par 'gyur mod /
analyzed: bya ba byas pa'i khyad par yin na byas pa tsam nyid du rjes su dpag par 'gyur mod /
translated: is the distinction of the action that is done, then it is inferred to be just the action itself.

original: blo'i bya ba ni rjes su dpag pa ma yin no //
analyzed: blo'i bya ba ni rjes su dpag pa ma yin no //
translated: But the activity of the mind is not inferred.

original: dngos po'i rang bzhin las gzhan pa'i bya ba ni yang med do //üîΩ'di ltar / byed po'am las la gnas pa ni //
analyzed: dngos po'i rang bzhin las gzhan pa'i bya ba ni yang med do // 'di ltar / byed po'am las la gnas pa ni //
translated: And there is no activity that is different from the nature of a thing.üîΩThus:

original: bya bar brjod kyi gzhan ma yin //üîΩbyed po la gnas byed po las //
analyzed: bya bar brjod kyi gzhan ma yin // byed po la gnas byed po las //
translated: It is said to be the action that exists in the agent or the object, not anything else.üîΩThe agent does not exist apart from the action,

original: gzhan min las gnas las las med //
analyzed: gzhan min las gnas las las med //
translated: and the object does not exist apart from the action.

original: de'i phyir mthong ba snang ba dang // gzhan la las ni gzhan ma yin //
analyzed: de'i phyir mthong ba snang ba dang // gzhan la las ni gzhan ma yin //
translated: and for others, it is not other.

original: 'on te don ni gzung ba nyid du rig pa yin la /
analyzed: 'on te don ni gzung ba nyid du rig pa yin la /
translated: But if it is asserted that the object is the object of perception,

original: blo ni 'dzin pa nyid du yin te /
analyzed: blo ni 'dzin pa nyid du yin te /
translated: and the mind is the subject of perception,

original: 'di ltar ngas blo don du bzung ngo zhes rtogs pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'di ltar ngas blo don du bzung ngo zhes rtogs pa yin no zhe na /
translated: then it is understood that ‚ÄúI perceive the object with the mind.‚Äù

original: de yang mi rung ste /
analyzed: de yang mi rung ste /
translated: That also is not correct.

original: de tshe blo ni byed pa ste //
analyzed: de tshe blo ni byed pa ste //
translated: At that time, the mind is the agent,

original: 'dzin pa nyid ni de las gzhan //üîΩde nyid yin 'gyur blo gzhan ni //
analyzed: 'dzin pa nyid ni de las gzhan // de nyid yin 'gyur blo gzhan ni //
translated: and the subject of perception is different from that.üîΩIf it were the same, then why would

original: ci yi phyir na rtogs par byed //
analyzed: ci yi phyir na rtogs par byed //
translated: another mind understand it?

original: gal te don las mthong gzhan na //
analyzed: gal te don las mthong gzhan na //
translated: If seeing were different from the object,

original: rang bzhin su yis mthong bar 'gyur //üîΩbya ba byas pa'i /üîΩ'on te gsal te don nyid kyi //
analyzed: rang bzhin su yis mthong bar 'gyur // bya ba byas pa'i / 'on te gsal te don nyid kyi //
translated: then by what means would one see its nature?üîΩThe object is not seen.

original: khyad par 'ga' zhig yin 'dod na //
analyzed: khyad par 'ga' zhig yin 'dod na //
translated: But if it is asserted that the object itself is the difference that is clarified,

original: de'i tshe / skye ba dang ni 'jig med pa'i //
analyzed: de'i tshe / skye ba dang ni 'jig med pa'i //
translated: then at that time,

original: don la khyad par 'ga' yang med //
analyzed: don la khyad par 'ga' yang med //
translated: there would be no difference at all in the object,üîΩwhich is neither produced nor destroyed.

original: blo 'dzin pa de ni de'i tshe don skye ba ni khas mi len to //
analyzed: blo 'dzin pa de ni de'i tshe don skye ba ni khas mi len to //
translated: At that time, the mind does not accept the production of the object.

original: 'dzin par byed pa'i rtogs pa ni grub pa nye bar 'jog pa yin te /
analyzed: 'dzin par byed pa'i rtogs pa ni grub pa nye bar 'jog pa yin te /
translated: The cognition that apprehends is the establishment of the object.

original: blos ni ji ltar gnas pa bzhin 'dzin pa tsam byed pa yin no //
analyzed: blos ni ji ltar gnas pa bzhin 'dzin pa tsam byed pa yin no //
translated: The mind merely apprehends the object as it is.

original: gzung ba tsam nyid kyis ni khyad par du 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: gzung ba tsam nyid kyis ni khyad par du 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: It is not distinguished by the mere apprehension of the object.

original: rang bzhin gzhan du 'dzin na yang 'khrul pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rang bzhin gzhan du 'dzin na yang 'khrul pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: If it apprehends the object as different, it would be mistaken.

original: de'i rang bzhin du 'dzin na yang snga ma phyi ma'i rang bzhin nyid 'dzin par thal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin du 'dzin na yang snga ma phyi ma'i rang bzhin nyid 'dzin par thal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: If it apprehends it as the nature of the object, it would follow that it apprehends the nature of the object as prior and posterior.

original: ji ltar sgron sogs rang dus dang / 'brel pa bum sogs gsal byed pa //
analyzed: ji ltar sgron sogs rang dus dang / 'brel pa bum sogs gsal byed pa //
translated: If you say that just as a lamp illuminates itself and other things at the same time,

original: de bzhin shes pa'ang yin zhe na /üîΩde la'ang @106a * //
analyzed: de bzhin shes pa'ang yin zhe na / de la'ang @106a * //
translated: so too does cognition,

original: brtsad pa mtshungs pa nyid //
analyzed: brtsad pa mtshungs pa nyid //
translated: then the same objection applies to that.

original: gal te don rnams ji lta bu yin pa de lta bu nyid sgron mas mngon bar gsal bar byed na /
analyzed: gal te don rnams ji lta bu yin pa de lta bu nyid sgron mas mngon bar gsal bar byed na /
translated: If a lamp illuminates objects just as they are,

original: des kyang dus kyi mtha' dag khyab par gsal bar byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des kyang dus kyi mtha' dag khyab par gsal bar byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: then it would illuminate all of time.

original: gzhan du na 'khrul pa tsam nyid do //
analyzed: gzhan du na 'khrul pa tsam nyid do //
translated: Otherwise, it would be mere error.

original: 'on te 'dzin pa'i dus su don gzhan skyes pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te 'dzin pa'i dus su don gzhan skyes pa yin no zhe na /
translated: But if you say that at the time of the apprehension, the object is produced as another,

original: de'i tshe / de 'dod na yang shes so //
analyzed: de'i tshe / de 'dod na yang shes so //
translated: then even if you accept that,

original: skad cig 'jig par thal bar 'gyur //
analyzed: skad cig 'jig par thal bar 'gyur //
translated: it would follow that it would be momentary and disintegrate.

original: gal te 'di rtogs pa'i rang bzhin ma yin pa las ldog pa'i rang bzhin du skye ba yin na /
analyzed: gal te 'di rtogs pa'i rang bzhin ma yin pa las ldog pa'i rang bzhin du skye ba yin na /
translated: If it is produced as having a nature that is the opposite of that which is not the nature of the realization,

original: shes pa dang dus mtshungs pa nyid kyis skad cig ma rang rig pa nyid yin pa'i phyir don gzhan brtags pas ci bya /
analyzed: shes pa dang dus mtshungs pa nyid kyis skad cig ma rang rig pa nyid yin pa'i phyir don gzhan brtags pas ci bya /
translated: since it is simultaneous with consciousness, it is reflexive awareness itself. Therefore, what is the use of positing another object?

original: gal te blo ni 'dzin bar byed pa nyid du rtogs la /
analyzed: gal te blo ni 'dzin bar byed pa nyid du rtogs la /
translated: But if you say that the mind is realized to be the apprehender,

original: don ni gzung ba nyid du rtogs so zhes bstan pa ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: don ni gzung ba nyid du rtogs so zhes bstan pa ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: and the object is realized to be the apprehended,

original: gal te don g-yo ba med pa'i rang bzhin yin no //
analyzed: gal te don g-yo ba med pa'i rang bzhin yin no //
translated: if the object is a nature that is not moving,

original: gang gi tshe de lta bu'i rang bzhin skye ba de'i tshe ni de lta bur gyur par skye'o zhes brjod pa na /
analyzed: gang gi tshe de lta bu'i rang bzhin skye ba de'i tshe ni de lta bur gyur par skye'o zhes brjod pa na /
translated: when it is produced as such a nature, it is said that it is produced as such.

original: de ltar don gzung ba nyid du ji ltar brjod par 'gyur /
analyzed: de ltar don gzung ba nyid du ji ltar brjod par 'gyur /
translated: In that case, how could it be said that the object is the apprehended?

original: ngas blo gzung ngo zhes bya ba'i tha snyad rtogs pa skyes pa tsam las gzhan du cung zad kyang rtogs par byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: ngas blo gzung ngo zhes bya ba'i tha snyad rtogs pa skyes pa tsam las gzhan du cung zad kyang rtogs par byed pa ma yin no //
translated: The expression I understand is nothing but the arising of a cognition; it does not at all make anything understood.

original: de skad du bshad pa ni /
analyzed: de skad du bshad pa ni /
translated: This is what is said.

original: dngos po'i 'brel pa mtha' dag ni skyed par byed pa nyid kyis nye bar sbyor ba'i khyad par gyi rgyu dang 'bras bu'i cha'i khyad par las gnas skabs kyi khyad bar bstan pa'i phyir gzhan du rnam par gzhag par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: dngos po'i 'brel pa mtha' dag ni skyed par byed pa nyid kyis nye bar sbyor ba'i khyad par gyi rgyu dang 'bras bu'i cha'i khyad par las gnas skabs kyi khyad bar bstan pa'i phyir gzhan du rnam par gzhag par bya ba yin no //
translated: The entire connection of entities is established by the difference of the cause and effect parts that are connected by the act of producing, and the difference of the states is taught by that. Therefore, it is to be established elsewhere.

original: tha snyad la ni dngos po grub pa ma yin te /
analyzed: tha snyad la ni dngos po grub pa ma yin te /
translated: But in conventional usage, entities are not established,

original: de ni gzhan du yang 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni gzhan du yang 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because that is also tenable in other cases.üîΩ Thus:

original: 'di ltar / rang gi rgyu yi dngos po las //
analyzed: 'di ltar / rang gi rgyu yi dngos po las //
translated: From the entity that is its cause,

original: don 'di sngar yang yod pa yin //
analyzed: don 'di sngar yang yod pa yin //
translated: this object existed previously.

original: de lta de ltar dngos 'di la //
analyzed: de lta de ltar dngos 'di la //
translated: Thus, thus, this entity

original: de yi mthong ba 'di skyes so //
analyzed: de yi mthong ba 'di skyes so //
translated: has this seeing arisen from it.

original: mngon sum rjes dpag dag gis ni //
analyzed: mngon sum rjes dpag dag gis ni //
translated: By direct perception and inference,

original: don 'di rtogs pa nyid ma yin //
analyzed: don 'di rtogs pa nyid ma yin //
translated: this object is not understood.

original: des na 'jig rten tha snyad 'di //
analyzed: des na 'jig rten tha snyad 'di //
translated: Therefore, this conventional usage of the worldüîΩ is not established by the power of entities.

original: long ba brgyud pa 'ba' zhig go //
analyzed: long ba brgyud pa 'ba' zhig go //
translated: It is a mere succession of blind events.

original: gzhan yang gal te don gyi khyad par 'ga' zhig nyid gzung ba yin na de'i tshe /
analyzed: gzhan yang gal te don gyi khyad par 'ga' zhig nyid gzung ba yin na de'i tshe /
translated: Moreover, if the specific object is apprehended,

original: de yang shes pa shes ma gyur //
analyzed: de yang shes pa shes ma gyur //
translated: then the cognition is not cognized.

original: gal te shes pa rtags yin na //üîΩshes su yongs su bcad med par //
analyzed: gal te shes pa rtags yin na // shes su yongs su bcad med par //
translated: If the cognition is the evidence,üîΩthen the cognition is not ascertained.

original: de shes shes bya de gang las //
analyzed: de shes shes bya de gang las //
translated: How is that cognition known?

original: gal te shes 'gyur nyid du ni //
analyzed: gal te shes 'gyur nyid du ni //
translated: If it is ascertained as the cognition itself,

original: yongs bcad de de'i rang bzhin nyid //
analyzed: yongs bcad de de'i rang bzhin nyid //
translated: then it is the nature of that.

original: blo gzhan don med khyad par ni //
analyzed: blo gzhan don med khyad par ni //
translated: The other cognition is meaningless.

original: de nyid de ltar rab tu brjod //
analyzed: de nyid de ltar rab tu brjod //
translated: The difference is expressed in that way.

original: shes 'gyur nyid du bcad @106b med kyang //
analyzed: shes 'gyur nyid du bcad @106b med kyang //
translated: Even if it is not ascertained as the cognition itself,

original: de ni ji ltar go byed yin //üîΩdon shes zhes bya bar shes pa ni /
analyzed: de ni ji ltar go byed yin // don shes zhes bya bar shes pa ni /
translated: how is it the cause of understanding?üîΩThe cognition called ‚Äúcognizing the object‚Äù

original: shes pa zhes byar rtogs pa yin //
analyzed: shes pa zhes byar rtogs pa yin //
translated: is understood as ‚Äúcognizing.‚Äù

original: don shes tsam du shes pa ni /
analyzed: don shes tsam du shes pa ni /
translated: The cognition called ‚Äúmere cognition of the object‚Äù

original: de'i don nyid du rig pa yin //
analyzed: de'i don nyid du rig pa yin //
translated: is known as ‚Äúthat object itself.‚Äù

original: de yi ngo bor rig pas na //
analyzed: de yi ngo bor rig pas na //
translated: Since it is known as its nature,

original: don rnams de yi ngo bor gnas //
analyzed: don rnams de yi ngo bor gnas //
translated: the objects abide in its nature.

original: dkar po nyid du rig pa'i don //
analyzed: dkar po nyid du rig pa'i don //
translated: The object known as ‚Äúwhiteness‚Äù

original: de las dkar po gzhan nam ci //
analyzed: de las dkar po gzhan nam ci //
translated: is nothing but whiteness.

original: de ltar 'di ni bshad zin pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar 'di ni bshad zin pa yin no //
translated: Thus, this has been explained.

original: 'on te mthong ba gzhan nyid yin na de'i tshe mthong bar gyur pa zhes yongs su mi gcod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'on te mthong ba gzhan nyid yin na de'i tshe mthong bar gyur pa zhes yongs su mi gcod par 'gyur ro //
translated: But if seeing is different from seeing, then at that time, it would not be ascertained that it is seeing.

original: de bshad pa ni /üîΩma thong ba mthong 'gyur min gzhan gyis //
analyzed: de bshad pa ni / ma thong ba mthong 'gyur min gzhan gyis //
translated: The explanation of that is:üîΩThe unseen does not become seen.

original: mthong 'gyur 'ga' yang mthong 'gyur med //
analyzed: mthong 'gyur 'ga' yang mthong 'gyur med //
translated: There is no seeing whatsoever of that which is seen.

original: gal te mthong ba mthong bar 'gyur ba las gzhan ma mthong ba yin na ji ltar mthong bar gyur pa'i rang bzhin yongs su gcod /
analyzed: gal te mthong ba mthong bar 'gyur ba las gzhan ma mthong ba yin na ji ltar mthong bar gyur pa'i rang bzhin yongs su gcod /
translated: If seeing is different from seeing, then how is the nature of seeing ascertained?

original: de lta ma yin na gzhan gyis mthong bar gyur pa la yang /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na gzhan gyis mthong bar gyur pa la yang /
translated: If it were not so, then even if it were seen by another,

original: 'di ni gzhan gyis mthong bar gyur pa'o zhes mthong bar gyur ba'i tha snyad du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di ni gzhan gyis mthong bar gyur pa'o zhes mthong bar gyur ba'i tha snyad du 'gyur ro //
translated: it would be the convention of seeing, ‚ÄúThis is seen by another.‚Äù

original: ji ltar mthong ba tsam las ngas mthong ba'o zhes de'i mthong bas don gyi khyad par mthong ba las yin pa de bzhin du khyad bar de gzhan gyi mthong ba la yang gdon mi za bar 'dod pa'i phyir 'di ni gzhan gyis mthong bar 'gyur ba'o zhes byaüîΩbar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ji ltar mthong ba tsam las ngas mthong ba'o zhes de'i mthong bas don gyi khyad par mthong ba las yin pa de bzhin du khyad bar de gzhan gyi mthong ba la yang gdon mi za bar 'dod pa'i phyir 'di ni gzhan gyis mthong bar 'gyur ba'o zhes bya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus one would say, ‚ÄúThis is seen by another.‚Äù

original: 'on te khyad par de ni gcig nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: 'on te khyad par de ni gcig nyid ma yin te /
translated: But if you say that specific object is not the same,

original: des na gzhan gyis mthong bar gyur pa ma mthong ba'i phyir dang / rang gis mthong bar gyur pa ma mthong ba'i phyir rang gis mthong ba zhes bya ba de nyid rtogs pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: des na gzhan gyis mthong bar gyur pa ma mthong ba'i phyir dang / rang gis mthong bar gyur pa ma mthong ba'i phyir rang gis mthong ba zhes bya ba de nyid rtogs pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: then because that which is seen by another is not seen, and that which is seen by oneself is not seen, then that which is called ‚Äúseen by oneself‚Äù is not understood.

original: de yang mi rung ste /
analyzed: de yang mi rung ste /
translated: That also is not correct.

original: 'di ltar / khyad par de gzhan mthong ba las //
analyzed: 'di ltar / khyad par de gzhan mthong ba las //
translated: Because that specific object is seen by another,

original: yod phyir rang blo rtogs par 'gyur //
analyzed: yod phyir rang blo rtogs par 'gyur //
translated: one‚Äôs own mind is understood.

original: gal te khyad par mang po yin pa de lta na yang /
analyzed: gal te khyad par mang po yin pa de lta na yang /
translated: Even if there are many specific objects,

original: de dag rang gis rig par bya ba de dag nyid ma yin pas de dag gis kyang mthong bar 'gyur ba nyid yin te /
analyzed: de dag rang gis rig par bya ba de dag nyid ma yin pas de dag gis kyang mthong bar 'gyur ba nyid yin te /
translated: Since they are not the objects of their own awareness, they are seen by others.

original: des na rang dang gzhan gyi blo rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na rang dang gzhan gyi blo rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, one‚Äôs own mind and the mind of another are realized.

original: des na mthong bar gyur pa ni rang nyid rig par bya bar 'gyur dgos so //
analyzed: des na mthong bar gyur pa ni rang nyid rig par bya bar 'gyur dgos so //
translated: Therefore, that which is seen must be the object of one‚Äôs own awareness.

original: 'on te de yang rig pa gzhan gyis mthong bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te de yang rig pa gzhan gyis mthong bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: But if that is known by another awareness,

original: de lta yin na de la yang rtogs par 'gyur ba nyid yod par gyur pas thug pa med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta yin na de la yang rtogs par 'gyur ba nyid yod par gyur pas thug pa med par 'gyur ro //
translated: then there would be an infinite regress, because that would also have to be seen by another awareness.

original: 'on te mthong bar gyur pa nyid gcig kho na yin na /
analyzed: 'on te mthong bar gyur pa nyid gcig kho na yin na /
translated: But if only one sees,

original: de lta na ni gzhan gyis mthong ba la yang khyad par de nyid yin pas rang gi blo rtogs pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta na ni gzhan gyis mthong ba la yang khyad par de nyid yin pas rang gi blo rtogs pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: then the mind of another would be known by oneself, because that would be the same as seeing oneself.

original: gang gi tshe ji srid du gzhan gyis @107a * //
analyzed: gang gi tshe ji srid du gzhan gyis @107a * //
translated: When one sees the mind of another,üîΩit is not seen by oneself.

original: mthong bar gyur ba nyid gzhan gyis rtogs pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: mthong bar gyur ba nyid gzhan gyis rtogs pa de'i tshe /
translated: But if one sees the mind of another,

original: bdag gis mthong bar gyur ba nyid med kyang /
analyzed: bdag gis mthong bar gyur ba nyid med kyang /
translated: it is not seen by oneself.

original: gzhan gyis mthong bar gyur pa mthong bas rang gi blo rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan gyis mthong bar gyur pa mthong bas rang gi blo rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: But if it is seen by another, then one‚Äôs cognition is known.üîΩBut that which is seen is not different in terms of self and other.üîΩBut if it is seen by itself, then one‚Äôs cognition is known.üîΩBut if it is seen by another, then one‚Äôs cognition is known.üîΩBut if it is seen by itself, then one‚Äôs cognition is known.

analyzed: gzhan gyis mthong bar gyur pa nyid rtogs pas rang gi blo rtogs par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: 'on te mthong bar gyur pa nyid gang yin pa de rang gi blo rtogs pa yin yang /

analyzed: nga 'am 'di zhes ga las yin // de la gzhan ltos gang gis kyang //
translated: When one has realized the very seeing?üîΩAnd there is no reversal

original: bzlog pa nyid ni yod ma yin //
analyzed: bzlog pa nyid ni yod ma yin //

original: rang rig ngo bor gyur na ni //
analyzed: rang rig ngo bor gyur na ni //

analyzed: de bzlog pas ni 'gyur ma yin //

original: rang rig gzhan gyis myong zhes pa //
analyzed: rang rig gzhan gyis myong zhes pa //

analyzed: ha cang bab chol ches pa nyid //
